EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteFlagRequiresManualKill=位置演算体不会在二个周期没有子演算体或位置操作附着于它的情况下销毁自身。有时候保留一个位置操作让不同的演算体来利用也是很有用的。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpActionCenter=选择对应的CActorAction的中心，通常来说就是创建它的游戏效果的中心。 /// Selects the center of the corresponding CActorAction, which is typically the center of the game Effect that created it.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpActionImpact=选择对应的CActorAction的同步游戏世界轰击点。 /// Selects the synchronous game world impact point of the corresponding CActorAction.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpActionLaunch=选择对应的CActorAction的同步游戏世界发射点。 /// Selects the synchronous game world launch point of the corresponding CActorAction.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpAttachSourceAutomatic=在可能的情况下采用宿主选项，否则采用链式选项。 /// Act like the Host value in this enum if possible, otherwise act like the Chain value.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpAttachSourceChain=在包含附着位置操作的位置操作链中涉及的模型中的查找附着点。从位置操作链的头部开始，查找可附着的点。第一个找到的有效模型将胜出。 /// Look for the attach point inside a model actor referred to by a site op earlier in the site op chain containing the attach site op.  Starts at the beginning of the site op chain and asks each site op if it has a host variable pointing to a model actor.  The first site op with a valid model actor wins.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpAttachSourceHost=在这个位置操作对应的宿主的模型中查询附着点。 /// Look for the attach point inside the model actor that the site op's corresponding host reference is referring to.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicActorBearings=输出父演算体的方位。这可以用于将附着位置定于相对模型原点带一定偏移的地方。 /// Outputs the bearings of the parent actor.  This can be used by hosted attaches to offset attach point positions from the origin of the model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicActorPosition=只输出父演算体的位置。 /// Outputs only the position of the parent actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicCreatorBearings=输出创建了这个位置操作的父演算体的演算体的方位。 /// Outputs the bearings of the actor that created the site op's parent actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicCreatorPosition=只输出创建了这个位置操作的父演算体的演算体的位置。 /// Outputs only the position of the actor that created the site op's parent actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicInitialBearings=仅仅在该位置操作初始化时输出父演算体的方位。即使父演算体的方位之后有所变化，这个位置操作输出的方位也不会改变。 /// Outputs the bearings of the parent actor at the site op's initialization time.  The bearings output by the site op do not change even if the parent actor's bearings change later.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicScopeBearings=输出包含该位置操作的父演算体的域的方位。 /// Outputs the bearings of the scope containing the site op's parent actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicScopePosition=只输出包含该位置操作的父演算体的域的位置。 /// Outputs only the position of the scope containing the site op's parent actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBasicWorldPosition=输出WorldPosition字段所指定的绝对世界位置。 /// Outputs an absolute world position specified in data, via the WorldPosition field.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBillboardUnobstructable=将演算体附着于贴近镜头的广告板位置，但仍对它们进行缩放，使它们显得仍然位于这个位置操作的宿主所在的位置。这使得幽灵的核弹定位红点可以永远显示，不论有任何模型覆盖了它。 /// Positions actors hosted off the billboard site right next to the camera, but scales them to appear to be at the site's host's location.  Makes the Ghost's Nuke laser spot show up, regardless of what is covering it.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpBillboardUseTowardsCameraDistance=将演算体附着于一个跟镜头有着一定投射距离的广告板位置。可以用来让飞行单位显得位于它们地面位置的顶部（方便敌人选中它们），但仍然显得像是在飞行。 /// Positions actors hosted off the billboard site a specified distance along the ray to the camera.  Can be used to make flying units appear to be on top of their ground position (so enemies may target them more easily), while also appearing to be flying.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpDeltaSumFlagRespectIncomingRotation=应用输入到位置操作的旋转的差值总和而非所属演算体的旋转。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpDeltaSumFlagZOffsetOnly=只测量指定附着点之间的本地空间Z轴偏移。当不启用时，差值总和会计算每个偏移的本地x，y，z的坐标总合。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpOrientAttachPointToBearings=综合了位置和旋转选项的功能。 /// Combines the functionality of the Position and Rotation options.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpOrientAttachPointToPosition=输出一个位置，使得该位置操作的父演算体中指定的附着点成为发送给该位置操作的位置。可以用于将子模型附着到父模型上，却不使用子模型的原点来附着。通过这一位置操作，客户端数据可以将一个武器的“手握”附着点（而不是这个武器的“原点”附着点）附着到父模型的“手”附着点上。 /// Output a position that causes the site op's parent actor's specified attach point to be at the position sent into the site op.  Can be used to connect a child model to a parent model at a child attach point that is other than the Origin.  With this site op, client data could attach a weapon handle attach point (rather than the weapon model's Origin attach point) to a parent model's Hand attach point.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpOrientAttachPointToRotation=输出一个位置，使得该位置操作的父演算体中指定的附着点与被发送给该位置操作的附着点一致。（这不是旋转附着点本身，而会把点的整个模型按照那个附着点旋转起来。） /// Output a rotation that causes the site op's parent actor's specified attach point to have the same rotation as the rotation sent into the site op.  (This does not just rotate the attach point itself but instead orients the entire model around that attach point.)
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpPhysicsImpactNormal=输出物理轰击的位置。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpRotatorAccumulateAndSetRotation=用于每次旋转数据移交给位置运算时，旋转总是一致的场合。我们希望它显得总是在旋转，因此我们必须累加上原有的旋转，因为每次旋转数据移交给位置运算时总是一致的。比方说，当我们想要让一个简单的独立模型在它本身的域里面旋转起来的时候，而且位置操作获得的方位输入值是直接从它的域中取得的。 /// For cases where the rotation is the same every time it is passed to the site op.  We need to appear to be continuously rotating and advancing the rotation each frame, so we must accumulate previous rotations, because the rotation coming into the site op is always the same.  For instance, when we are rotating a simple standalone model in its own scope and the site op gets its input bearings from that scope.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpRotatorAddRotationChange=用于每次旋转数据移交给位置运算时，由于位置操作本身的原因而导致旋转不一致的场合。比方说，当使用CActorSiteOpRotator旋转一个演算体，而且CActorSiteOpRotator是位置操作链里面第一个位置操作的时候。在这种情况下，被累加的旋转是保存在位置操作的外部而非内部的，就如AccumulateAndSetRotation选项。 /// For cases where the rotation is different every time it is passed to the site op, because of the site op itself.  For instance, when a CActorSiteOpRotator rotates an actor and the CActorSiteOpRotator is the first site op in the site op chain.  In cases like this, the accumulated rotation is stored externally to the site op, rather that in the site op itself, as with the AccumulateAndSetRotation value.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpShadowFlagNoLowerThanBaseHeight=确保位置操作不会输出低于地图基础高度的位置值。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpShadowFlagNoLowerThanWater=确保位置操作不会输出低于输入位置的水体高度的位置值。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTerrainAndWaterFlagFollowWaves=输出一个与水面的波峰波谷相关的位置。使得演算体在水面上浮动时显得更加真实。要是不设置这一标旗，那么输出的位置只会直接捕捉水体平面的高度，并将之发送给位置操作。 /// Outputs a position that accounts for wave and trough height.  Enable actors to appear to float realistically on the surface of the water.  If this is not set, the output position merely captures the height of the water plane at the position sent into the site op.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTerrainAndWaterFlagPassThroughIfNoWater=使这个位置操作在对应位置没有水体的时候显得不存在。可以被用来实现血液在没有水的时候洒在地上，但有水的时候却会浮到水面上的效果（假如血液出现的位置水面以下）。 /// Causes the site op to act as if it was not in the site op chain if there is no water at the position sent into the site op.  Can be used to have blood appear on the ground if there is no water, but appear on the surface of the water if the point where the blood appears is underwater.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTetherFlagDisabled=不修改坐标
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTetherFlagMax=只限制坐标上限范围。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTetherFlagMin=只限制坐标下限范围。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTetherFlagMinMax=把坐标限制在最小值和最大值之间。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTipabilityFlagNoLowerThanBaseHeight=确保这个位置操作永远不输出比地图基础高度更低的位置。方便用来实现平时必须遵循摇摆度，但在鼠标掠过山谷的时候却不显示的光标。 /// Ensures the site op never outputs positions that are lower the map's base height.  Good for cursors that have to respect tipability, but should not disappear when the mouse moves over canyons.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOpTipabilityFlagNoLowerThanScope=确保这个位置操作永远不输出低于它们的域本身的z轴坐标的位置。方便用来实现遵循摇摆度，但同时必须与光标域中其它视觉特效持平的光标。 /// Ensures the site op never outputs positions that are lower than z value of their containing scope.  Good for cursors that have to respect tipability, but need to stay aligned with whatever other visuals are in the cursor's scope.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOrbiterTypeAbsolute=相对世界空间的默认旋转进行环绕，不理会输入旋转。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSiteOrbiterTypeRelative=相对一个输入旋转进行环绕，对CActorSiteOrbiter来说，这通常是指父演算体的旋转。对CActorSiteOpOrbiter来说，则是输入到位置操作中的旋转参数。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundFlagUpdateVisibility=允许演算体在出入战场迷雾或者受到其它因素的影响时自动更新自身的可见性。这一标旗几乎总为真，但通常会针对死亡音效关闭它。在这种情况下，演算体创建时会设置一次可见性，但此后将不再更新。（这样玩家就能听到完整的死亡音效，即便目标在音效播放的半途中已经消失在战场迷雾中。） /// Enables the actor to update its visibility in response to whether or not it is under the fog of war, and various other factors.  It is almost always true, but is often turned off for death sounds.  In this case, the visibility is set once during the actor's creation and then never updated.  (This is so the player can hear the full death sound, even when the target disappears under the fog of war.)
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundPlayModeAll=立刻播放所有音效层。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundPlayModeRandom=以随机的顺序依次播放音效层。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundPlayModeSequence=以固定顺序依次播放音效层。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundValueSourceActor=使用演算体的值。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundValueSourceCombine=综合计算演算体和音效的值。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSoundValueSourceSound=使用音效的值。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSplatHeightAutomatic=对标记为AOELayer的泼溅图来说，相当于MinimumTerrain选项，对其他的泼溅图来说，相当于Normal选项。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSplatHeightMinimumActor=泼溅图将以拥有它的演算体的z分量为最低绘制位置。 /// At its lowest, the splat draws itself at the z value of its owning actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSplatHeightMinimumTerrain=泼溅图将以地图的基础高度的z分量为最低绘制位置。 /// At its lowest, the splat draws itself at the z value of the map's base height.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorSplatHeightNormal=不作限制；泼溅图将寻找任意可以投射它的地形，并将自身投射上去。 /// Unrestricted; the splat can draw itself at whatever height it finds terrain to map itself to.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorStepDirectionBackward=跳到前一个对象。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorStepDirectionForward=跳到下一个对象。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermCutsceneStatus=目标：CActorCutscene。当测试参数指定的条件为真时返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermIsActorLocalPlayer=谨慎使用这一条件，它可能导致潜在的问题。不应用这一条件来持续地阻止演算体的创建。在对应演算体属于本地玩家的时候返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermModelMaterialApplied=目标：CActorModel and CActorModelMaterial。当用在CActorModelMaterial上时，当材质当前正被应用时返回真。当用在CActorModel上时，当有任何材质被应用时返回真，若指定任何名称参数，条件会判断指定材质是否被应用。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermPlayerId=若目标演算体的玩家ID位于指定区间内（包含边界）则返回真。还可使用refKey来指定并检测任意其它演算体，而非包含该条件事件的那个演算体。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermRefEquals=假如指定的演算体引用指向同一个演算体则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermRefExists=假如指定的演算体引用（诸如::Main或::actor.SomeRefName）指向一个存活的演算体时返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermTeamId=假如目标演算体的控制玩家属于指定队伍则返回真。可选参数RefName让这个条件可以对任意的演算体进行判定，而不是只能判定该条件正在过滤的接收演算体。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTermTextureFileAliasIsValid=若文件别名指向的文件存在于用户硬盘上或与当前地图相关的Mod中，则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainDeformerFlagDestroysFoliage=当CActorTerrainDeformer修改地形时，它将销毁自身效果范围内的所有植被模型。植被模型是指地图上的自动生成的花草环境模型，如通常用来让地形显得更为真实。 /// When the CActorTerrainDeformer modifies terrain, it destroys foliage within its area of effect.  Foliage is small ambient models like bits of grass that are auto-generated on the terrain to make the map feel more immersive.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainDeformerFlagRestoreOnDestroy=当CActorTerrainDeformer死亡时将地形重设回它的原本状态。方便用来实现一些临时创建弹坑的法术，用了这个标旗，地图作者们就无需担心重复使用这类法术是否会对整张地图的地形上及其可玩性和明确性造成影响。 /// Restores terrain to its original state when the CActorTerrainDeformer dies.  Enables spells to crater terrain temporarily, so that the map developer does not need to worry that repeated spell use will damage the playability and clarity of the map.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainDeformerFlagRestoreOnHidden=当CActorTerrainDeformer被隐藏时将地形重设回它的原本状态。 /// Restores terrain to its original state when the CActorTerrainDeformer is hidden.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainDeformerFlagRestoreOnMovement=在演算体移动时移除原有的地形变形并将之重新应用在新的位置。当关闭这个标旗时，移动CActorTerrainDeformer就像是在地图上绘制连续的地形变形。当开启时，地形变形看上去会随着CActorTerrainDeformer的移动而移动。 /// Removes and then reapplies terrain deformation as the actor moves.  With this flag off, moving the CActorTerrainDeformer will appear to paint terrain deformation on the map.  When the flag is on, a single terrain deformation appears to move with the CActorTerrainDeformer.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainDeformerFlagUseUnitFootprint=设置了这个选项后，假如CActorTerrainDeformer属于一个单位演算体，它将获取这个单位的游戏逻辑足印，并将之当成自身的效果范围。 /// If this option is set, and the CActorTerrainDeformer belongs to a unit scope, it acquires the game synchronous footprint of the unit and uses that as its area of effect.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTerrainSquibVisualFlagOneShot=开启时，地形爆裂模型将随着单位的移动而周期性地被创建。关闭时，一个单独的模型将在单位通过特定地形类型时被重复利用。单次的地形爆裂比持续性的版本视觉效果来的好，但从执行效率的角度看，对资源的消耗要大得多。 /// When on, terrain squibs are separate models that are created periodically as the unit moves.  When off, a single model plays continuously for as long as the unit moves across a particular terrain type.  OneShot terran squibs can look better than continuous ones, but they are typically far more costly from a performance perspective.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextAlignmentBottom=将文本沿着容器的底部对齐。在水平对齐方面会优先考虑右对齐。 /// Aligns text to the bottom of the containing region.  Considered right for horizontal alignment.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextAlignmentCenter=居中文本。 /// Centers text.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextAlignmentLeft=左对齐。在垂直对齐方面会优先考虑上对齐。 /// Left justification.  Considered top for vertical alignment.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextAlignmentRight=右对齐。在垂直对齐方面会优先考虑下对齐。 /// Right justification.  Considered bottom for vertical alignment.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextAlignmentTop=将文本沿着容器的顶部对齐。在水平对齐方面会优先考虑左对齐。 /// Aligns text to the top of the containing region.  Considered left for horizontal alignment.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextOptionConformToTerrain=开启时，以映射到地形上的表现方式来绘制文本。关闭时，在地形上放绘制文本，并使其像广告板一样永远朝向镜头。 /// If on, draws the text as if it were texture mapped onto the terrain itself.  If off, draws text just above the terrain and billboards it towards the camera.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextOptionUseTerrainHeight=尚不支持。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTextOptionUseWalkableHeight=尚不支持。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorThresholdTestAbove=当条件测试的值等于或大于条件的输入值时返回真。 /// Return true if value the term is testing is equal to or above the term's input value.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorThresholdTestBelow=当条件测试的值小于条件的输入值时返回真。 /// Return true if value the term is testing is below the term's input value.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTiltTypeAny=尝试使用Mover选项，但假如没有移动器，则使用NoMover选项。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTiltTypeMover=从包含该CActorSiteOpTilter的域的CUnit的移动器中获得向量。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTiltTypeNoMover=从CActorSiteOpTilter的父演算体获得向量。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagAnimProps=复制由AnimGroupApply消息所指定的持续性的动画名称。 /// Copy persistent anim props that have been assigned via the AnimGroupApply message.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagAnimator=尽最大可能地复制源演算体的动画堆栈，即使并不是所有动画都对新演算体适用。 /// Copy as much of the source actor's animation stack as possible, given that the model of the new actor may not have all of the same animations available.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagFOWColor=复制源演算体的战场迷雾染色。 /// Copy the source actor's fog of war tinting color.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagFOWShader=复制源演算体是否使用着色器来渲染战场迷雾的标旗。 /// Copy from the source actor whether to use a shader to render fog of war.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagModel=复制源演算体所包含的模型。 /// Copy the model contained by the source actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagModelMaterials=复制源演算体上应用的模型材质。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagPosition=复制源演算体的位置。 /// Copy the source actor's position.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagRotation=复制源演算体的旋转。 /// Copy the source actor's rotation.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagStatus=复制源演算体状态变量。你可以用StatusSet、StatusIncrement和 StatusDecrement等消息来控制这些状态变量。 /// Copy the source actor's status variables, which can be created and manipulated with messages like StatusSet, StatusIncrement and StatusDecrement.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransferFlagTextures=尽最大可能复制源演算体的动态纹理。比方说，假如新建的演算体可以显示印花，那么它就会复制源演算体的印花纹理。 /// Copy the source actor's dynamic textures, to the extent that it is possible.  For example, this copies the source actor's decal textures, provided it is possible to display them on the newly created actor.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransitionIn=逐渐过度到摇动状态。 /// Transition in the rocking motion, increasing it from nonexistent to fully in effect.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorTransitionOut=逐渐从摇动状态中退出。 /// Transition out the rocking motion, decreasing it from full effect to nonexistent.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagAutomateWalkDirections=让单位自动寻找并播放方向行走动画，诸如Walk,A。假如模型中有此类动画。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagShowBlobShadow=将演算体标记为会在低阴影画质下绘制块状阴影。这个功能是完全由数据实现的，而非游戏代码。 /// Marks a unit actor as displaying a blob shadow on the low shadow graphics setting.  This feature is implemented in data, not code.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagStandAnimBirthVariation=使得单位被创建时使用随机的站立动作偏移。使用了这个标旗后，通过建造而产生的建筑单位在最初出现时将不会保持同样的姿势。 /// Causes the unit to start at a random offset into its stand animation when it is first created.  With this flag, units that are created from a construction building do not all appear in the exact same pose when they first appear.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagSuppressDefaultStatusBar=阻止生命栏显示在单位身上。对一些巨型的Boss怪物很有用。你可能想要为它们设计自定义的生命栏。 /// Prevents health bars from appearing on the unit.  Useful for large boss creatures, where a standard health bar would appear tiny in proportion.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagSuppressStandIntro=告知单位不要在停止移动时播放“站立,开始”动画，即便单位的模型拥有这个动画。 /// Tells the unit to not play Stand, Start animations when it stops moving, even if it has them in its model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagSuppressWalkIntro=告知单位不要在开始移动时播放“行走,开始”动画，即便单位的模型拥有这个动画。 /// Tells the unit to not play Walk, Start animations when it starts moving, even if it has them in its model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorUnitFlagSuppressWalkOutro=告知单位不要在开始移动时播放“行走,结束”动画，即便单位的模型拥有这个动画。 /// Tells the unit to not play Walk, End animations when it starts moving, even if it has them in its model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorValidateUnitFlagIncludeDerivedSnapshot=使得ValidateUnit条件在游戏逻辑单位并不存在的时候仍能运作。我们建议你一直使用这个标旗，这个选项在这里只是为了确保能够兼容旧版地图。 /// Enables the ValidateUnit term to function even when the underlying synchronous game unit is not present.  It is probably always better to use this flag, but it is optional to ensure legacy compatibility.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorViewerTreatsAsDetected=假如ViewerTreatsUnitAs条件判断所在域中的单位从正在观察它的玩家的视角来看处于被侦测状态，那么就返回真。用来给被侦测的幻象单位染色。 /// Returns true if the unit in the scope in which the ViewerTreatsUnitAs term is run is being observed as detected from the viewing player's perspective.  Used to tint detected Hallucinations.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationCaster=效果施法者。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationCasterAlly=效果施法者的盟友。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationCasterEnemy=效果施法者的敌人。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationCasterNeutral=对效果施法者中立的玩家。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationSource=效果源。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationSourceAlly=效果源的盟友。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationSourceEnemy=效果源的敌人。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationSourceNeutral=对效果源中立的玩家。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationTarget=效果目标。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationTargetAlly=效果目标的盟友。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationTargetEnemy=效果目标的敌人。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_actorVisibilityAtCreationTargetNeutral=对效果目标中立的玩家。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagClosingFull=开启时，代表动画元组必须完整地播放它的关闭动画，而不论它是否仍在播放它的开启动画。适用于一些开启和关闭动画并不互为镜像的场合。关闭时，动画元组将按照当前的开启动画进度来设置关闭动画的起始点（这个功能称为动画元组反弹。）。假如一个动画元组刚刚播放了25%的开门动作，这时候你关闭这个元组，那么元组反弹会使其从75%的进度开始播放关门动画。 /// When on, specifies that the bracket animation should play its closing animation fully, regardless of whether it was still in its opening animation.  Useful when opening and closing animations are not mirror images of one another.  When off, a bracket animation plays its closing animation starting at a point that matches its progress into the opening animation (known as a rebounding bracket animation).  If the bracket got 25% of the way into opening a door, when it was told to close, a rebound bracket animation would start its closing door animation 75% of the way to completion.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagContentNonLooping=当这个标旗开启而ContentPlayOnce标旗关闭时，代表内容动画只会播放一次，并在之后一直保持内容动画的最后一帧，直到收到AnimBracketStop消息。 /// When on in conjunction with the ContentPlayOnce flag being off, indicates that the content animation is to play once and then hold in place on the final frame of the animation, until an AnimBracketStop message is sent.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagContentPlayOnce=开启时，代表内容动画只能被播放一次。关闭时，内容动画将一直播放直到收到AnimBracketStop消息。 /// When on, signifies that the content animation should be played just once.  When off, the content animation plays until the AnimBracketStop message is sent.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagDontResetOnUnhide=这一动画不会在另一个隐藏了它的动画被移除时重置。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagFullMatch=当启用时，代表该动画元组所指定的动画属性将以FullMatch的方式来寻找匹配动画。这意味着元组动画必须拥有和元组消息中所制定的属性（除变体外）完全相同的动画属性。这可以用来避免意外匹配到不想要的动画。例如，当一个模型拥有GLsand, B动画却没有GLstand时，环境希望播放一个GLstand却不想播放GLstand, B，除非有一个全局动画属性B被特别添加了。若没有FullMatch，就不可能只播放GLstand而避开GLstand, B。（若没有添加全局的动画组属性B）
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagInstant=开启时，跳过开启动画，并直接跳到内容动画。当要在地图初始化时创建一个飞行兵营时非常合适——在这种情况下，兵营需要显得一直在飞行，而不是会有一个从升起到飞行的转换动画。这时候你就需要跳过让兵营升起的开启动画。 /// When on, skips the opening animation and jumps straight to the content animation.  Useful in situations like when a map creates a flying Barracks at map initialization -- in this scenario the Barracks needs to appear to be flying instantly, rather than appearing as if it is transitioning to flying by lifting off.  This would not be possible without the ability to suppress the transitioning open animation that shows the Barracks lifting off and starting to fly.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagNoMismatchQueryProps=当启用时，代表该动画元组所指定的动画属性将以NoMismatchQueryProps的方式来寻找匹配动画。这意味着最终的元组动画不能拥有（除变体外）任何未被查询动画属性所指定的动画属性。但查询动画属性却可能含有未出现在最终动画中的动画属性。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStartFlagOpeningPlayForever=开启时，播放开启动画，直到收到AnimBracketStop消息。适合拿来组建没有内容动画的动画元组；开启动画将一直保持在最后一帧而不会切换到内容动画。关闭时，开启动画照常结束，并自动转换到下一个动画（内容或关闭）。 /// When on, plays the opening animation until an AnimBracketStop message is sent.  Serves as a way to make bracket animations without a content animation; instead, the opening animation holds on its last frame and serves as a makeshift content animation.  When off, the opening animation finishes as normal and transitions to whatever animation is next, whether content or closing.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStateExitReasonCleared=动画元组状态完成的原因是收到AnimBracketClear消息。 /// The animation bracket state finished because the actor received the AnimBracketClear message.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStateExitReasonComplete=动画元组状态完成的原因是正常播放完毕。 /// The animation bracket state finished because it completed normally.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animBracketStateExitReasonModelSwap=动画元组状态完成的原因是模型切换而导致动画被取消。这种情况不会被视作收到AnimBracketClear消息，因为我们有时候需要在模型被切换后播放动画元组。另外，在动画元组播放完成后销毁演算体是很常见的，但这时候我们不会希望演算体因为切换了模型而被销毁。 /// The animation bracket state finished because a model swap canceled the animation.  This case is not treated as a clear, because it is frequently necessary to keep the bracket animation running after the model swap.  It is common for data to kill an actor when its bracket animation is done, and it is necessary to be able to differentiate the model swap case so as not to do this.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagAssetDrivenLooping=使用内置于素材中的'Looping'标旗来决定该动画是否循环播放，而非PlayForever或NonLooping标旗。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagDontResetOnUnhide=这一动画不会在另一个隐藏了它的动画被移除时重置。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagFullMatch=通过演算体消息播放一段动画需要设置一系列的动画属性，方便系统寻找匹配的动画（例如，'Walk, Start'）。这一选项指定最终播放的动画的动画属性与指定的动画属性完全一致（除了变体属性外）。想要完全匹配，一个动画必须没有任何额外的动画属性，而且不能缺少请求集合中的任何一个动画属性。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagNoMismatchQueryProps=通过演算体消息播放一段动画需要设置一系列的动画属性，方便系统寻找匹配的动画（例如，'Walk, Start'）。这一选项指定最终播放的动画不能拥有任何未存在于请求动画属性集合中的动画属性（除了变体属性外），但请求动画属性集合可以拥有未在最终播放的动画中出现的动画属性。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagNonLooping=假如设为真，而且PlayForever也设为真，这一标旗代表动画奖正常播放，但会永久停留在最后一帧。假如为假，而PlayForever标旗为真，代表动画将被视为循环动画并重复播放，每次播放时都会随机选择该动画的不同变体。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagPlayForever=让系统一直播放所请求的动画直到主动停止。假如动画未被标记为NonLooping，那么每次播放完成后系统接着播放一个随机的变体。这种方式可以用来对一个发呆的单位播放持续的Stand动画，并会在不同的站立动画变体间变换，以使模型显得像一个真实的活物。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagRandomStartOffset=让动画以随机的初始偏移来进行播放。用于当给一组单位同时发动移动命令时，行走中的单位不至于永远以相同的步伐前进。它们都会以不同的开始点来播放各自的行走动画（即使这些动画实际上完全相同），这能使游戏显得更加自然。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animFlagVariationMatch=需要指定变体属性。首先会对指定动画进行最佳匹配，然后会确保结果动画使用了指定的变体。当指定动画没有变体时会被忽略。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animGroupApplyFlagClosingFull=开启时，代表动画元组必须完整地播放它的关闭动画，而不论它是否仍在播放它的开启动画。适用于一些开启和关闭动画并不互为镜像的场合。关闭时，动画元组将按照当前的开启动画进度来设置关闭动画的起始点（这个功能称为动画元组反弹。）。假如一个动画元组刚刚播放了25%的开门动作，这时候你关闭这个元组，那么元祖反弹会使其从75%的进度开始播放关门动画。 /// When on, specifies that the bracket animation should play its closing animation fully, regardless of whether it was still in its opening animation.  Useful when opening and closing animations are not mirror images of one another.  When off, a bracket animation plays its closing animation starting at a point that matches its progress into the opening animation (known as a rebounding bracket animation).  If the bracket got 25% of the way into opening a door, when it was told to close, a rebound bracket animation would start its closing door animation 75% of the way to completion.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animGroupApplyFlagInstant=开启时，跳过开启动画，并直接跳到消息所触发的新的动画组。当要在地图初始化时创建一个飞行兵营时非常合适——在这种情况下，兵营需要显得一直在飞行，而不是会有一个从升起到飞行的转换动画。这时候你就需要跳过让兵营升起的开启动画。 /// When on, skips the opening animation and jumps straight to whatever animations are trigged by the addition of the new animation property group.  Useful in situations like when a map creates a flying Barracks at map initialization -- in this scenario the Barracks needs to appear to be flying instantly, rather than appearing as if it is transitioning to flying by lifting off.  This would not be possible without the ability to suppress the transitioning open animation that shows the Barracks lifting off and starting to fly.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animMatchTypeBest=使用最佳匹配方案。动画系统会寻找与第一个请求动画属性一致的动画，并会尝试尽可能多地将动画中的动画属性与请求中其它的动画属性相匹配。最终将播放一个拥有最多一致属性和最少的不一致属性的动画。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animMatchTypeFull=使用完全匹配方案。动画系统会寻找与请求的动画属性集完全一致的动画。额外的变体并不会使动画失去候选资格，除非请求本身指定了一个变体动画属性。换句话说，Stand, Start可匹配到Stand, Start, 01和Stand, Start, 02，但Stand, Start, 01只能匹配到Stand, Start, 01。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animMatchTypeNoMismatchQueryProps=使用NoMismatchQueryProps匹配方案。动画系统会寻找不包含任何未被请求中所指定的属性的动画（变体属性除外），但请求中可能会拥有为出现在最终动画中的属性。这一规则附加在最佳匹配方案之上。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animSetTimeFlagScaled=开启时，代表消息所发送的时间已经被缩放过了。因此将目标动画的时间设置为1秒（已缩放），同时目标动画原长度为2秒，但是时间缩放比例为0.5，结果会导致目标动画的播放进度被设为它总长度的25%处。关闭时，代表消息所发送的时间未经缩放，对一个原长度为2秒的动画，它将永远使其播放进度被设为50%而不管目标动画的时间缩放比例。 /// When on, the time that is being sent is already in scaled time.  So a time of one second that is scaled sent into an animation that is two seconds long unscaled, but has a time scale of 0.5, means that the animation will be set to have progressed 25% of its duration.  When off, this option means that time is being sent into the animation unscaled.  So, a time of one second sent into an animation that is two seconds long would set the animation to have progressed 50% of its duration, regardless of what its time scale is.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animSetTimeFlagTriggerEventsOnScrub=开启时，当动画时间被改变后，触发中途被跳过的任意事件（如模型事件）。换句话说，当一个动画的当前进度被从A时间跳到了B时间，这个选项将确保动画系统会触发A和B之间的所有动画事件。关闭时修改动画播放的时间进度不会触发任何事件。 /// When on, triggers any intervening events (such as ModelData events) built into the animation when it play time is changed.  In other words, when an animation play time is changed from A to B, this option ensures that the animation system fires off all that animation's events between A and B.  When off, changing the animations play time does not fire any events.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animSetTimeFromCloakChangeStart=设置动画的时间进度为CActorUnit上一次隐身状态改变至今所经历的时间。 /// Set the animation time to progress into the animation by the amount of time that has elapsed since the last cloak change on the CActorUnit.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animSetTimeFromMorphStart=设置动画的时间进度为CActorUnit上一次变形至今所经历的时间。 /// Set the animation time to progress into the animation by the amount of time that has elapsed since the commencement of the last morph on the CActorUnit.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animTimeVariantAsAutomatic=忽略TimeVariant字段直接播放动画，不指定任何形式的时间缩放。 /// Ignore the TimeVariant field and simply play the animation without any animation-specific time scaling.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animTimeVariantAsDuration=将TimeVariant字段诠释为持续时间。如果TimeVariant字段的数字是动画本身的长度的两倍，那么就会产生和把的动画的时间缩放比例设置为0.5一样的效果。 /// Interpret the TimeVariant field as a duration.  When the number in the TimeVariant field is twice as long as the duration of the animation being played, it effectively means to play the animation with a time scale of 0.5.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animTimeVariantAsTimeScale=将TimeVariant字段诠释为时间缩放比例。假如时间缩放比例是个纯小数，代表时间将变得更慢，这会令动画需要更长的时间来完成播放。 /// Interpret the TimeVariant field as a time scale.  A fractional time scale means time is traveling at fractional speed, so it takes longer for the animation to complete.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animTimeVariantAsTimeScaleAbsolute=将TimeVariant字段诠释为绝对时间缩放比例。使用绝对时间缩放比例播放的动画将忽略模型本身被设置的全局时间缩放比例。 /// Interpret the TimeVariant field as an absolute time scale.  An animation played with an absolute time scale plays at that time scale regardless of the global time scale applied to the model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_animTransitionFlagInstant=开启时，代表开始和结束过渡都在瞬间完成。在AnimBracketStart消息中开启时，意味着跳到开启动画的结束位置并立即开始播放内容动画。 /// When on, means transition the animation in or out instantly.  For instance, when on in the AnimBracketStart message, it means jump immediately to the end of the Opening animation and start playing the Content animation immediately.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_createPersistentPersistUntilDestroyed=当该标旗被启用时， “周期计数”会被忽略， 该效果将持续存在直到某一个周期性验证器失效或者该效果被摧毁。 /// When this flag is enabled, the Period Count will be ignored, and the effect will persist until either the periodic validator fails, or the effect is destroyed.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_flyerDisplayAll=玩家能看到所有飞行单位的飞行映射标记。 /// The player sees flier helpers on all flying units.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_flyerDisplayNone=玩家看不到任何飞行映射标记。 /// The player does not see any flier helpers.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_flyerDisplaySelected=玩家只能看到被他选中的单位的飞行映射标记。 /// The player only sees flier helpers on the units he has selected.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_labelExpressionOpExcludeHasAll=假如玩家未拥有逗号分隔列表中的所有标签则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_labelExpressionOpExcludeHasAny=假如玩家未拥有任何逗号分隔列表中的标签则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_labelExpressionOpRequireAll=假如玩家拥有所有逗号分隔列表中的标签则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_labelExpressionOpRequireAny=假如玩家拥有任何逗号分隔列表中的标签则返回真。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_minimapShapeCircle=画一个圆。 /// Draws as a circle.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_minimapShapeQuad=画一个方块。 /// Draws as a square.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagCloakedDetectedIsFullyVisible=使一个模型对可以侦测到它的玩家完全可见，就好像一开始就没有被附加隐形特效。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagCloakedUndetectedIsHidden=使一个模型在未被侦测到时对敌人完全不可见。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagIgnorable=这样做可以让素材只要还未加载完成， 游戏中就不会创建其模型。该选项仅适用那种会被多次创建但又不重要的效果。 /// Makes it so a model will not be created in game if the asset has not finished loading yet.  Only useful for non-critical effects that are created more than once.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagPreventClothCollisionVolumeAutoAdd=阻止被通过ActorData.xml中的附着而连接到另一个模型的模型自动将其自身的布料碰撞体积提交到另一个模型的布料“碰撞集合”中。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagPreventTextureAutoUpdate=阻止纹理随着模型全局或场景纹理全局属性的变化而更新。假如内容作者不清楚这方面的规则，这类行为就可能导致错误，在某些情况下，关闭这一行为是较简单的解决方法。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagPreventTextureFileTokenRecognition=阻止纹理文件名中的纹理槽位和属性自动被辨认。数据必须使用TextureDeclare。这可能导致需要设置更多的数据，但数据没有隐藏规则，因此不会导致异常。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagPreventedWhenPhysicsPerformanceConstrained=纯粹的布娃娃模型需要标注这个标旗，这样当游戏在低画质下运行时就不会播放这一模型。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagRequiresPhysicsToOperate=将模型标注为物理效果不激活就不会主动运作。这一标旗阻止模型在没有物理效果的时候被创建。移除标旗可令模型在有没有激活物理效果的时候都创建，但可能知道视觉错误。在物理效果关闭时，某些拥有物理体的模型的可能仍然能正常生效。这些模型无需使用这一标旗。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelFlagTipabilityLevelOffWhenStationary=使演算体在静立不动时变回没有倾斜的状态。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_modelLinkSpecialTrophy=找到所属玩家已解锁的最好奖杯。模型连接会从将被数据中获得。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_participantObserver=本地玩家是一名观战者。观战者可以是普通观众也可以是裁判。 /// The local player is an observer watching the game.  An observer can be either a referee or a a spectator.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_participantParticipant=本地玩家是游戏的参与者。 /// The local player is a participant in the game.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_participantReferee=本地玩家是一名裁判，而且拥有比普通观众更多的能力，包括可以暂停/继续游戏，甚至和游戏的参与者们聊天。 /// The local player is refereeing a match and has abilities beyond a regular spectator, including the ability to pause/resume the game and chat with participants.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_participantSpectator=本地玩家是一名观众，观众可以互相聊天，但无法与游戏的参与者们聊天。 /// The local player is a spectator watching the game.  Spectators can chat among themselves, but not with players.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathBlockVision=被标记为“阻碍视野”的单元格将使地面单位无法获得该单元格中的以及被其遮挡的视野。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathBoostCliff=被标记为“凸起悬崖”的单元格将调整悬崖的层级，以匹配形成足印的对象所使用的值。 /// Cells flagged as Boost Cliff will adjust the cliff level to match the value used by the object placing the footprint.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathCreep=包含被标记为“菌毯”单元格的足印，可以在“生成菌毯”行为中被用来控制菌毯可生成的大小 /// A footprint that has cells flagged as Creep can be used in a Generate Creep behavior to control the size of the creep that will be generated
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathDropOff=任意标旗。主要用于交付资源的建筑，以防止该类建筑被放置的离资源区过近。 /// Arbitrary flag.  Typically used on buildings that allow resource drop off to prevent them from being placed too close to resources.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathFogged=该标旗无法被应用，它只能用于核对检查。游戏会自动将该标旗应用到被战场迷雾覆盖的单元格。 /// This flag cannot be applied, it can only be checked against.  The game automatically applies this flag to cells covered by fog of war.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathGroundNoSpawn=游戏不允许在包含此类标旗的单元格上放置地面单位。 /// The game disallows placement of ground units on cells with this flag.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathMasked=该标旗无法被应用，它只能用于核对检查。游戏会自动将该标旗应用到黑色遮蔽的单元格。 /// This flag cannot be applied, it can only be checked against.  The game automatically applies this flag to cells covered by black mask.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathNearResources=任意标旗。通常用于资源节点以防止出现资源放置的离资源接收建筑过近的情况。 /// Arbitrary flag.  Typically used on resource nodes to prevent them from being placed too close to resource drop off buildings.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathNoBuild=任意标旗。主要用于建筑足印，以防止其它建筑被放置在其位置上。同样，当加载该地图时，任何完全无法通行的单元格（视地形情况而定）将被标记为“不可建造”。 /// Arbitrary flag.  Typically used on building footprints to prevent another building from being placed on top of it.  Also, when the map loads, any cell that is not completely pathable (due to terrain) is flagged as No Build.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathNoCreep=菌毯不会在被标记为“无菌毯”的单元格中生长。 /// Creep will not grow on cells flagged as No Creep.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pathNoCreepPermanent=菌毯会保留阻挡，即便预先放置的单位被移除。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pausedParticleSystemBehaviorAutomatic=让素材自身控制粒子系统的暂停状态。这通常会固定每个粒子系统的辐射速率。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pausedParticleSystemBehaviorContinuous=粒子系统在模型的动画暂停时将依然正常运作。目前不支持。在没有动画的粒子系统上运作正常。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pausedParticleSystemBehaviorFade=停止粒子辐射，这通常会导致剩余的粒子在之后短时间内消亡，得到一个粒子淡出的效果。适合淡出火焰和火星，以免他们不合理地冻结在半空中。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pausedParticleSystemBehaviorFreezeAll=冻结粒子系统的辐射率，并冻结所有粒子。通常能使快照在视觉上更真实，因为模型的其他部分也会一并冻结。对于高动态的粒子系统就不一定会有很好的视觉效果，诸如火星。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_pausedParticleSystemBehaviorFreezeEmissionRate=当所有动画暂停时，强制模型（无视素材内部的设置）冻结粒子发生速率。因为辐射速率通常是动画控制的，这理论上是能保持一致性的，尽管有时候不如其他选项一样有用。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_selectionTransferFlagDeselectSource=假如源单位被选中，转换完毕后，它将失去选中状态。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_selectionTransferFlagIncludeControlGroups=转换目标单位将被添加到源单位所属的所有编组中。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_selectionTransferFlagSingleOnly=选择只有在单位被单独选中时被转换。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_serpentBasic=蛇的抖动行为类似被拽住一端的绳子。 /// The serpent behaves like a string dragged from one end.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_serpentSwimming=蛇的抖动行为类似一条在水里游的蛇；在前进的过程中以正弦波性抖动。 /// The serpent behaves like a snake swimming in water; it undulates side to side in a sinusoidal pattern as it moves forward.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundDupePrevent=阻止意味着在达到或超过最大数时，将不能够创建新实例。 /// Prevent means that it will stop new instances from being created when at or above the maximum number.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundDupeReplace=替换意味着在一个新的实例被创建时，最次要的一个实例将会被摧毁。 /// Replace means that the least important instance will be destroyed when a new instance is created.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundExclusivityFlagSupressionInterrupts=为真时，被抑制的组会打断它们当前正在播放的音效。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagAutoUnload=自动卸载 - 表示在这个集内的音效素材在完成当前任务后将被卸载。 /// Auto Unload - indicates that the sound assets in this set will be unloaded when the current mission is finished.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagDownload=下载 - 表示在这个集内的第一个音效在本地无法找到时将被下载。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagHideSubtitle=隐藏字幕 - 如果字幕选项开启或音效已禁用时，将阻止为这个音效显示字幕。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagIgnorable=可忽略的 - 表示如果一个类别被静音，或有过多的音效已启用，或音效在本地无法找到时，播放音效的请求就会被忽略。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagManualOverride=手动覆盖（仅限生产） - 音效条目将会手动覆盖并不会被编辑器自动修正或充值 /// Manual Override (Production Only) - sound entry is manually overridden and will not be automatically fixed or reset by the editor
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagNeedsFXA=需要FXA（仅限生产）- 需要处理面部动画。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagNeedsTTS=需要TTS（仅限生产）- 需要处理文本转语音。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagNeedsUpdate=需要更新（仅限生产）- 表示与音效关联的文本已经更改，音效可能需要更新。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagObsolete=已过时（仅限生产）- 不再使用并且不应再被导出或处理。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagPurgable=可净化的 - 允许资源管理器在需要为更加重要的素材腾出空间时，打断正在播放的音效。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagRerecord=重新录制（仅限生产）- 因文本更改需要重新录制音效。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagStream=流媒体 - 表示在播放波形时，FMOD不会尝试将其全部储存在内存内。所有压缩后大小超过几MB素材的音效文件应当采取流媒体形式。如果音效配置为流媒体，那每次只能播放一个实例。现有的实例将被替换。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagTemporary=临时（仅限生产）- 表示此音效并非最终版本。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagUnpausable=不可暂停 - 表示在这个类别或单独音效被请求暂停时，音效将不被暂停。通常只被用于加载画面的音乐。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundFlagWait=等待 - 表示我们希望保证这个音效在加载画面完成之前就已经完成加载。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundMode2D=播放声音时忽略所有位置信息。较适用于类似来自用户界面的声音。 /// Play sound ignoring all position information. Useful for sounds that should appear to be coming from the UI.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundMode3DHead=播放声音时将位置信息视为听者头部位置的偏移量。支持非基于收听环境位置的定向性声源。 /// Play sound treating the position as an offset from the head of the listener. Allows directional sound that is not based on the position of the camera.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundMode3DWorld=播放声音时将位置信息视为环境中的点。收听环境的位置和方向信息决定了声音是否会被播放以及播放的方式。 /// Play sound treating the position as a point in the world. The location and direction of the world camera determine whether and how the sound will be played.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundSelectSequential=按序的表示我们将播放音效内的每个素材，然后再进行重复。 /// Sequential means that we will play each of the assets in the sound before repeating.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundSelectShuffle=无序的表示我们会随机地选择素材来进行播放。在所有资源都被播放后，我们将选择一个新的播放列表。 /// Shuffle means that we will randomly select assets until all of the assets have been played and then we will choose a new playlist.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_soundtrackFlagInstant=为真时，音轨会立刻播放。不等待下一个同步点。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_targetModeValidationNone=目标选择模式会一直持续，直到选中一个目标或被取消。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_targetModeValidationPresent=目标选择模式会一直持续，直到选中一个目标或被取消，或没有能提供指令的单位。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_targetModeValidationStrict=目标选择模式会一直持续，直到选中一个目标或被取消，或没有能接受指令的单位。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_texturePropsOpContainsAll=假如有一套纹理名称包含所提交的所有纹理关键字就返回真。 /// True if a set of texture props contains all of the submitted texture props.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_texturePropsOpContainsAny=假如有一套纹理名称包含所提交的任意纹理关键字就返回真。 /// True if a set of texture props contains all of the submitted texture props.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_texturePropsOpEquals=假如有一套纹理名称与所提交的纹理名称完全一致（所有关键字不多不少）就返回真。 /// True if a set of texture props has exactly the same props (no more, and no less) as the submitted texture props.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureSelectByUpdateLinkOpAppend=将一条字符串附加到当前被赋给一个贴图栏位的TextureLink的后方。这会更改贴图链接，使得游戏载入另一张贴图。 /// Append a string to the TextureLink currently assigned to a texture slot.  This changes the texture link, which causes a different texture to be loaded.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureSelectByUpdateLinkOpReplace=替换当前被赋给一个贴图栏位的TextureLink中的子字符串。这会更改贴图链接，使得游戏载入另一张贴图。例子：将'Decal_0001'替换为'Background_0001'。 /// Replaces a substring in the TextureLink currently assigned to a texture slot with another substring, changing the texture link and causing a different texture to be loaded.  Example: changing 'Decal_0001' to 'Background_0001'.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoPlayFlagLooping=以重复循环的方式播放纹理视频，播放完一次后从头开始。 /// Play the texture video in a continuous loop, repeating after each play through.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoPlayFlagSynced=将纹理视频设置为会自动同步当前播放的音效速度（或游戏总体速度），在进度落后时进行跳帧。 /// Configures the texture video to skip frames if it cannot keep up with the rate at which sounds (or the game in general) are playing.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoSound2D=在没有任何空间特效的前提下播放音效。 /// Play sound without any spatialization FX.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoSound3DAtAttach=在纹理所在模型上的指定的附着点位置（通过相关的附着查询来指定）播放音效。 /// Sound plays at the position of a specified attach point (via an associated attach query) on the containing model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoSound3DAtOrigin=在纹理所在模型的基点播放音效。 /// Sound plays at the origin of the containing model.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_textureVideoSoundNone=关闭纹理视频的音效。 /// Sound is muted on the texture video.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_timeSourceGameTime=游戏时间驱动属性动画。当游戏暂停时，动画也会暂停。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_timeSourceRealTime=现实世界时间驱动属性动画。当游戏暂停时，动画不会暂停。
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_uiStatusFlagTypeIncapacitated=将CActorUnit所属的单位标记为瘫痪状态。 /// Marks a CActorUnit as belonging to a unit that has been incapacitated.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitCollideAir1=空中碰撞标旗。如果一个单位没有被设置地面碰撞标旗，则它将会使用空中碰撞标旗，至少会被设置1个。如果有两个单位都使用空中碰撞标旗，而且这两个单位都有至少1个相同的碰撞标旗，则它们可以共同占据同一个空间，但彼此会相互分开。 /// Air collision flag.  A unit uses air collision if there are no ground collision flags set, and at least 1 air collision flag set.  Two units that use air collision and have at least 1 matching collision flag can occupy the same space, but will separate from each other.

EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitCollideLand1=地面碰撞标旗。如果一个单位未被设置碰撞标旗，则会使用地面碰撞标旗，至少会被设置1个地面碰撞标旗。如果两个单位都有至少1个相同的地面碰撞标旗，则它们将无法共同占据同一个空间。单位占据的空间将由单位的内部半径所决定。 /// Ground collision flag.  A unit uses ground collision if there are no collision flags set, or at least 1 ground collision flag set.  Two units that have at least 1 matching ground collision flag cannot occupy the same space.  The space a unit occupies is determined by its inner radius.

A unit uses ground collision if there are no collision flags set, or at least 1 ground collision flag set.  Two units that have at least 1 matching ground collision flag cannot occupy the same space.  The space a unit occupies is determined by its inner radius.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitCollideLand7=地面碰撞标旗。如果一个单位未被设置碰撞标旗，则会使用地面碰撞标旗，至少会被设置1个地面碰撞标旗。如果两个单位都有至少1个相同的地面碰撞标旗，则它们将无法共同占据同一个空间。单位占据的空间将由单位的内部半径所决定。 /// Ground collision flag.  A unit uses ground collision if there are no collision flags set, or at least 1 ground collision flag set.  Two units that have at least 1 matching ground collision flag cannot occupy the same space.  The space a unit occupies is determined by its inner radius.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitCollideLand8=地面碰撞标旗。如果一个单位未被设置碰撞标旗，则会使用地面碰撞标旗，至少会被设置1个地面碰撞标旗。如果两个单位都有至少1个相同的地面碰撞标旗，则它们将无法共同占据同一个空间。单位占据的空间将由单位的内部半径所决定。 /// Ground collision flag.  A unit uses ground collision if there are no collision flags set, or at least 1 ground collision flag set.  Two units that have at least 1 matching ground collision flag cannot occupy the same space.  The space a unit occupies is determined by its inner radius.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitCollideLand9=地面碰撞标旗。如果一个单位未被设置碰撞标旗，则会使用地面碰撞标旗，至少会被设置1个地面碰撞标旗。如果两个单位都有至少1个相同的地面碰撞标旗，则它们将无法共同占据同一个空间。单位占据的空间将由单位的内部半径所决定。 /// Ground collision flag.  A unit uses ground collision if there are no collision flags set, or at least 1 ground collision flag set.  Two units that have at least 1 matching ground collision flag cannot occupy the same space.  The space a unit occupies is determined by its inner radius.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundAttack=在玩家命令单位攻击另一个单位时播放。 /// Plays when the player commands a unit to attack another unit.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundBirth=在单位完成创建时播放。对单位来说，这是指它出现在地图上时。对建筑来说，是指它完成建造时。 /// Plays when a unit is done being created.  For units, this is when the unit first appears on the map.  For buildings, it is when the building has completed construction.

EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundClickError=在故事模式下，当玩家点击无法高亮的单位时播放。 /// In story mode, plays when the player clicks on a unit that is not highlightable.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundConstruction=在单位被选中时仍处在建造状态时播放。 /// Plays when a unit is selected while under construction.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundHelp=当玩家的处于屏幕外的单位受到伤害时周期性播放。 /// Periodically plays when a player's units are taking damage while off screen.

EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundReady=在单位完成创建时播放，但只对这个单位的所属玩家播放。对单位来说，这是指它出现在地图上时。对建筑来说，是指它完成建造时。 /// Plays when a unit is done being created, but only for the player that owns the unit.  For units, this is when the unit first appears on the map.  For buildings, it is when the building has completed construction.
EDSTR_ENUMHINT_e_unitSoundTurning=在单位转身时播放。 /// Plays when the unit is turning in place.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_CalldownEffect=使用该技能时所产生的效果 /// The effect that occurs when using this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_EffectArray=为每个弹药单位所执行的效果。 /// Effects that execute for each ammo unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_ExternalAngle=外部弹药单位在母单位周围时的角度。0度即表示与母单位排成一行。 /// Angle at which external ammo units are positioned around the main unit.  0 degrees lines up with the front of the main unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_Flags=该技能的标旗 /// Flags for the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_InfoArray=与技能的特定命令相关的参数。 /// Parameters relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_Launch=定义弹药单位如何被发射。 /// Defines how the ammo units are launched.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_Leash=弹药单位可飞离母单位的最大距离。 /// Maximum range the ammo unit can travel from the main unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_MaxCount=该弹仓所能容纳的最大单位数量。如果设置为0，则没有最大值。 /// The maximum number of units that can be stored in this magazine. If set to 0 then there is no maximum.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilArmMagazine_ReturnLifeFraction=当弹药单位达到该生命值系数时，它将返回母单位。 /// When an ammo unit gets to this fraction of life, it will return to the main unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_AcquireFilters=定义拥有该技能的单位可以自己获取的目标类型。 /// Defines what kinds of targets a unit with this ability will acquire on its own.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_AcquirePriority=当一个以上的同单位技能尝试自动获取目标时，返回最高的“获取优先级”的技能会最先有机会潜在目标。不会获取目标的技能应将之设为0。该值被设为0的技能不会获取目标。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_CmdButtonArray=与技能的特定命令相关的数据。 /// Data relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_MaxAttackSpeedMultiplier=使用该技能后攻击速度提高的最大倍数。 /// The maximum multiplier for attack speed increasing with this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_MinAttackSpeedMultiplier=使用该技能攻击速度所提高的最小倍数。 /// The minimum multiplier for attack speed increasing with this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_SmartFilters=当你右键点击一个单位时，只有这些类型的单位能被攻击。 /// When you right click a unit, only these unit types will be attacked.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_SmartPriority=负责定义当决定哪一个技能应当处理一个智能命令时（通常在右键点击情况下），该技能相较于其它具有智能优先级命令的技能时，其重要性有多高。 /// Determines how important this ability is versus other abilities with a smart priority when deciding which ability should handle a smart command (usually bound to right click).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAttack_SupportedFilters=当瞄准时，没有通过这些过滤器的单位将在没有显示指定错误信息的情况下被简单忽略掉。 /// Units that do not pass these filters will simply be ignored without displaying specific error information when targeting.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_AbilCmd=如果你使用该技能进入瞄准模式，那么由该技能和额外指令所扩增的指定技能和命令将被发布。 /// Specifies the ability and command that will be augmented by this ability and the additional order that will be issued if you go into target mode with this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_AutoCastFilters=当自动施法开启时，决定将会被用于挑选临近目标的筛选器。 /// Determines the filters that are used to pick a nearby target if auto casting is enabled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_AutoCastValidatorArray=当自动施放开启时，指定运行于附近的单位的验证器，来定义它们是否应被该技能瞄准。 /// Specifies validators to run on nearby targets when autocasting is enabled to determine whether they should be targeted by this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_Cost=当发布扩增命令时，指定资源、冷却时间和费用。 /// Specifies the resources, cooldown, and charges to apply when an augment order is issued.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_Effect=当扩增命令开始时，选择一个效果。例如狂热者的冲锋，该技能赋予了狂热者一个提高移动速度的行为。 /// Selects an effect to apply when an augment order begins. For Zealot Charge, for example, this applies a behavior to increase the movement speed of the Zealot.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilAugment_SmartPriority=负责定义当决定哪一个技能应当处理一个智能命令时（通常在右键点击情况下），该技能相较于其它具有智能优先级命令的技能时，其重要性有多高。 /// Determines how important this ability is versus other abilities with a smart priority when deciding which ability should handle a smart command (usually bound to right click).

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_HaltCmdButton=为“停止”命令指定默认按钮信息，此类信息可以用于设置所需条件以及各种受限状态。 /// Specifies default button information for the Halt command which can be used to set requirements and the restriction state.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_InfoArray=与技能的特定命令相关的参数。 /// Parameters relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_Range=技能的射程 /// Range of the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_RefundFraction=技能的建造取消返还参数 /// Build cancellation refund parameters for the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_SmartPriority=负责定义当决定哪一个技能应当处理一个智能命令时（通常在右键点击情况下），该技能相较于其它具有智能优先级命令的技能时，其重要性有多高。 /// Determines how important this ability is versus other abilities with a smart priority when deciding which ability should handle a smart command (usually bound to right click).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuild_Type=技能的建造过程类型 /// Type of construction process for the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilBuildable_CmdButtonArray=与技能的特定命令相关的数据。 /// Data relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffectInstant_CmdButtonArray=与技能的特定命令相关的数据。 /// Data relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffectTarget_CmdButtonArray=与技能的特定命令相关的数据。 /// Data relating to specific commands of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffectTarget_FinishCommand=单位完成使用该技能后将被要求执行的命令。 /// Command the unit is ordered to use after finishing using this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffectTarget_PlaceUnit=当为该技能进行目标瞄准时， 该单位的放置区足印将会显示。 /// The placement footprint of this unit will show up when targeting this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_AcquirePriority=当一个以上的同单位技能尝试自动获取目标时，返回最高的“获取优先级”的技能会最先有机会潜在目标。不会获取目标的技能应将之设为0。该值被设为0的技能不会获取目标。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Activity=决定当该技能的一个指令处于激活状态时在单位信息面板显示的文本。 /// Determines the text displayed in the unit info panel while an order for this ability is active.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_AlertArray=将会在该技能不同阶段时播放的警示信息的链接 /// Links to the alerts that will play at the different stages of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Arc=定义施法者周围的弧形范围，只有当技能即将对其施放的目标在该弧形范围内时，该技能才能施放。例如，360是指环绕一周的弧形范围，90是指施法者前方的锥形范围。如果在施放技能时，目标区不在该弧形范围内，则施法者将会调整位置，直到技能的目标进入弧形范围内为止。 /// Controls the arc around the caster that the target of the ability must be in.  Example 360 is all around, 90 is a cone in front.  If the target is outside this arc when the ability is cast, the caster will turn until the target is inside the arc.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_ArcSlop=如果该目标正在移动，在施法取消之前，它们将会远离初始弧形范围多远的距离。 /// If the target is moving, how far past the initial arc are they allowed to move before casting is cancelled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_AutoCastFilters=自动施放选择目标过滤器 /// Auto Cast Target Filters
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_AutoCastRange=自动施放可以触发的范围。 /// The range at which auto casting can be triggered.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_AutoCastValidatorArray=该技能只会在所有指定的验证器返回为真时才会自动施放。 /// The ability will only auto cast if the validators specified here all return true.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CancelableArray=该效果可被取消的阶段 /// Stages at which the effect can be canceled
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CastIntroTime=施法阶段的持续时间 /// The duration of the Cast phase
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CastOutroTime=进行施法的单位必须在“引导”阶段的最短时间 /// The minimum amount of time the casting unit must be in the Channel phase
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CastOutroTimeEffect=假如指定了值，这一效果的时长会被用于施法结束时间
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Cost=该技能的费用参数 /// Cost parameters for the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CursorEffect=为该技能生成一个“范围性攻击”的指针提示，并将“搜索区域”效果固定在该范围中，然后创建一个继承于“泼溅图指针”的泼溅图演算体。 /// To make an Area of Effect cursor display for this ability, hook up a Search Area effect to this field, and create a Splat actor that inherits from Cursor Splat.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_CursorRangeMode=这一字段控制施展这一技能的时候的光标行为。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Effect=选择即将应用的效果。在此处指定多个效果将允许你在该技能的每一等级选择一种效果。 /// Selects the effect that will be applied. Specifying multiple effects here will let you choose an effect per level of this ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_ErrorAlert=如果该技能不能施放则会发生的警示信息。 /// The Alert that will happen if the ability cannot be cast.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_FinishTime=“结束”阶段的持续时间，该阶段是在该效果被应用后所发生的阶段。 /// The duration of the Finish stage, which occurs after the effect has been applied.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Flags=技能标旗。 /// Flags for the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Placeholder=该技能的幽灵放置图片 /// Ghost placement image for the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_PrepEffect=选择将在准备阶段被应用的效果。在此处指定多个效果将允许你在该技能的每一等级选择一种效果。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_PrepTime=“准备”阶段的持续时间，该阶段是指在“接近”和“施放”两个阶段之间的阶段。 /// Duration of the Prepare stage, which occurs in between Approach and Cast.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_ProgressButtonArray=该技能在不同阶段所使用的一组按钮 /// An array of buttons that display at different stages of the ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_Range=技能的施放射程 /// Casting range of the ability
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_RangeSlop=在施法被取消之前，目标单位可以远离一开始被瞄准的位置点多远的距离。 /// How much further a target unit may move away from the initial targeted position before casting is cancelled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_RefundFraction=技能被取消时，将会返回的消耗系数。 /// The fraction of the costs that will be returned if the ability is cancelled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_ShowProgressArray=技能的阶段，即为施法者显示的一个进度条。 /// The stages of the ability that a progress bar should appear for the caster.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilEffect_SmartPriority=负责定义当决定哪一个技能应当处理一个智能命令时（通常在右键点击情况下），该技能相较于其它具有智能优先级命令的技能时，其重要性有多高。 /// Determines how important this ability is versus other abilities with a smart priority when deciding which ability should handle a smart command (usually bound to right click).

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilHarvest_ResourceAmountMultiplier=技能采集资源量的倍数。该倍数将会使资源节点的资源行为所定义的“采集量”加倍。 /// Multiplier for the amount of resources gathered by the ability.  This multiplies the Harvest Amount defined in the resource behavior of the resource node.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilHarvest_ResourceAmountRequest=采集资源时所请求的资源量。该项的数值大小以及在资源行为中所定义的采集量数值将决定实际采取的资源量数值。 /// The amount requested from a resource when harvesting. The larger of this value and the Harvest Amount defined in the resource behavior will determine how much is actually extracted.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilHarvest_ResourceQueueIndex=决定采集者处于哪个队列中。在抵达资源位置后，一个采集者必须等待同一队列中的其他采集者完成采集。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilHarvest_ResourceTimeBonus=使用该技能采集资源时所要花费的额外时间量。该时间量将被添加到资源节点的资源行为所定义的“采集时间”中。 /// Additional amount of time it takes to harvest with this ability.  This is added to the Harvest Time defined in the resource behavior of the resource node.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilHarvest_ResourceTimeMultiplier=技能采集资源所花费时间量的倍数。该倍数将会使资源节点中的资源行为所定义的“采集时间”加倍。 /// Multiplier for the amount of time it takes to harvest with this ability.  This multiplies the Harvest Time defined in the resource behavior of the resource node.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilTransport_LoadPeriod=装载单位过程中的延迟时间 /// Delay time between loading units

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAbilTransport_MaxCargoSize=能被装载体装载的最大单位尺寸 /// Maximum cargo size a unit can be to be loaded into the transport

These actors will only be created when attacking from a bunker on one of the physics materials specified, where the physics material is based on the terrain texture at the location of the bunker.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_DamageMap=为动作配置伤害素材。伤害素材是在一条“ActionDamage”消息被发出时， 对被该动作相关效果所造成的溅射伤害所击中的目标而使用的。 /// Configure damage assets for the action.  Damage assets play on targets that are hit by splash damage done by effects associated with this action, when an Action Damage message is sent.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_DamageModel=为显示当目标单位承受溅射或引导类伤害时所创建的演算体模型。 /// Actor model that is created to display the cause of damage when the target unit takes splash or channeled damage.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_DamagePhysics=对物理推力的类型进行配置 ，这里的物理推力是指由应用于目标单位的溅射或引导类伤害所产生的推力。 /// Configures the types of physics impulses that result from splash or channeled damage applied to the target unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_DamageReattachQuery=为了重新建立由于单位进行孵化或交替演算体的原因而丢失的溅射伤害附着点所要执行的附着方式。 /// Attach methods that are run to reestablish a splash damage attach point that is lost due to the unit morphing or swapping actor.
