EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchAssets=为动作配置发射素材。发射素材是在该动作被创建时，对调用该动作相关联效果的施法者而使用的。 /// Configure launch assets for the action.  Launch assets play on the caster that invokes the effects associated with this action, when the action is created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchAttachQuery=在法系单位上使用的，用于定义动作发射素材附着点的附接方式。 /// Attach methods that are run on the caster unit to determine the attach point for the action's launch assets.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchGuideAlias=这里设置的演算体别名将会被添加给为显示发射而创建的演算体。别名允许你方便引用那些被创建了却不知道它们是什么的演算体。 /// The actor alias configured here will be added to the actors that are created for the launch display. The alias allows you to easily reference whichever actor gets created without knowing what it was.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchModel=为发射动画效果所创建的演算体模型。 /// Actor model that is created for the launch art.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchRequest=发射请求允许你指定一个将被用作为发射物目标的外部演算体。 /// The launch request allows you to specify an external actor that will be used as the target for the missile.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchSite=当发射素材无法被使用时，被用来对攻击的发射进行定位的部位。 /// Site that will be used to position the launch of the attack when the launch assets can not be used.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchSiteFallback=当发射物部位和发射素材无法被作为一个部位进行使用时，被用来对发射物的发射进行定位的备用部位。 /// Site that will be used as a fallback to position the launch of the missile when the launch site and launch assets can not be used as a site.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchSiteOps=对为攻击的发射而创建的任意演算体进行定位的部位运算。 /// Site Ops that will be used to position any actors created for the launch of the attack.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchSound=为发射音效效果所创建的演算体音效。 /// Actor sound that is created for the launch sound.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchTerrainSquibMap=对当该攻击发射时创建的模型和音效进行配置。这些演算体只会在指定的其中一种物理材质上发射时才会被创建，这里的物理材质基于发射点位置所在处的地形纹理。 /// Configures the models and sounds that will be created when this attack launches. These actors will only be created when launching on one of the physics materials specified, where the physics material is based on the terrain texture at the launch point.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchTerrainSquibModel=对将用于显示发射物发射模型的演算体进行配置。 /// Configures the actor that will be used to display the model for missile launch physics.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_LaunchTerrainSquibSound=对将用于播放发射物发射物理音效的演算体进行配置。 /// Configures the actor that will be used to play the sound for missile launch physics.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_Lifetime=在自我摧毁前的动作条时间。 /// Amount of time the action sticks around before destroying itself.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_Missile=与动作相关联的发射物演算体。 /// The missile actor associated with this action.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_ShieldFlashType=“面部护盾轰击”局限于轰击所产生的位置点。“完全护盾轰击”显示包围单位的整个护盾。“头部护盾轰击”与“面部护盾轰击”类似， 只是前者的角度更加朝向天空一些。 /// Facer shield impacts are localized on the point where the impact occurs.  Full shield impacts display a shield that surrounds the unit.  Header shield impacts are similar to Facer impacts, except they are angled more towards the sky.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_ShieldRippleScaleFactor=对该攻击的任意护盾轰击的尺寸大小进行比例设置，以使特定攻击更容易被看出。 /// Scales the size of any shield impacts specifically for this attack in order to make specific attacks more noticeable.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorAction_WeaponFireTrackingTimeWindow=定义进行攻击的单位在后续攻击间隔中被暴露的时间窗。 /// Determines the window of time between subsequent attacks that an attacking unit will be revealed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorArc_Angle=角度负责定义弧形区从源点位置能延伸多远。弧形区通过设置动画时间的方式来延伸，例如每30度转换成动画中的1秒。 /// Angle determines how far the arc extends from the origin. The arc is extended by setting the time of an animation such that each 30 degrees translates into 1 second of animation.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorArc_AngleAnimProps=定义在模型上播放哪一个动画以便延伸弧形区。 /// Determines which animation on the model is played in order to extend the arc.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorArc_Radius=半径负责指定弧形区模型的比例。 /// Radius specifies the scale of the arc model.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBase_On=配置该演算体响应何种事件，以及该演算体发送何种消息来响应这些事件。 /// Configures what events this actor responds to, and what messages the actor sends in response to those events.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBase_Remove=该项用来从演算体中移除继承自父类演算体的事件响应。 /// This is used to remove event responses from this actor that occur in an actor this actor inherits from.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBeamStandard_Beam=该演算体会使用的光束条目的链接。 /// Link to the beam entry this actor should use.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBeam_HostImpact=轰击主体负责定义光束末端所连接的演算体。 /// The impact host determines the actor that the end of the beam is connected to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBeam_HostImpactSiteOps=轰击主体部位运算允许你自定义光束末端如何被附着到轰击主体。 /// The impact host site ops allow you to customize how the end of the beam is attached to the impact host.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBeam_HostLaunch=发射主体负责定义光束起始端所连接的演算体。 /// The launch host determines the actor that the start of the beam is connected to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBeam_HostLaunchSiteOps=发射主体部位运算允许你自定义光束起始端如何附着到发射主体。 /// The launch host site ops allow you to customize how the start of the beam is attached to the launch host.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBearings_AddToProximitySystem=控制该演算体是否能通过指针与其交互，以及其是否能被其它演算体通过区域搜索发现。 /// Controls whether this actor can be interacted with using the cursor and whether it can be found by other actors performing an area search.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBearings_Host=演算体可以完全按照主体属性的配置方式从它们的主体那里继承位置点、旋转以及其它属性比如可见性。一般来讲，你可以将主体看作成是一系列对象层级结构中的父级对象。 /// Actors can inherit their position, rotation, and other properties like visibility from their host based on how the hosted properties are configured. Typically you can think of hosts like an object's parent in a hierarchy of objects.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBearings_HostForProps=如果该字段被设置，那么该主体将被用来继承主体的属性，而普通主体则仍然被用来继承位置点和旋转。 /// If this field is set, this host will be used to inherit hosted properties while the normal host is still used to inherit position and rotation.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBearings_HostSiteOps=主体部位运算是用于对继承于主体的位置点和旋转（方位）进行自定义的。每一个部位运算都按照它们所罗列的顺序被应用于临近的方位。例如，部位运算可以可以通过使用附着部位运算将一个演算体附着到另一个演算体的头部。 /// The host site ops are used to customize the position and rotation (bearings) that are inherited from the host. Each site operation is applied to the incoming bearings in the order that they are listed. For example, site ops can be used to attach an actor to the head of another actor by using the attach site op.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorBearings_ScopeBearingsTracking=控制该演算体的位置点和旋转是继承于主体还是继承于域。如果演算体没有主体，其则会自动遵从域，除非域跟踪被强制关闭。虽然域位置点是依照演算体的环境而定，但通常是基于一个单位的同步位置点、指针的位置点或者演算体初始创建的位置点。 /// Controls whether the position and rotation for this actor are inherited from the scope or from the host. If the actor has no host, it will automatically follow the scope unless scope tracking is forced off. The scope position depends on the context of the actor but is typically based on a unit's synchronous position, the position of the cursor, or where the actor was initially created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCameraModel_Camera=镜头模型是指跟随某个指定镜头的模型。镜头字段决定了模型将会跟随的镜头。 /// Camera models are models that follow a specified camera. The camera field determines which camera it will follow.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCamera_Camera=链接到镜头对象将被用于定义非演算体控制的镜头参数（例如视场或衰减） 。 /// Link to a camera object that will be used to determine the camera parameters that aren't controlled by actor like field of view or falloff.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCamera_HostEye=眼部主体负责定义将用于对镜头眼进行定位的演算体。镜头的目标由普通的“主体”字段决定。 /// The eye host determines the actor that will used to position the eye of the camera. The target of the camera is determined by the normal Host field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCamera_HostEyeSiteOps=眼部主体部位运算允许你对镜头眼的位置点和旋转进行自定义。 /// The eye host site ops allow you to customize the position and rotation of the eye of the camera.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCreep_FoliageSpawnTarget=植被生成目标是一个无论植被何时由于菌毯生长而被摧毁都将创建的演算体。 /// The foliage spawn target is an actor that will be created whenever foliage is destroyed as a result of the growth of creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCreep_SubjectResponses=主体响应允许你配置将对菌毯生长产生反应的不同类型的演算体。例如，树木装饰物在默认状态下是被设置为菌毯在其上生长时会分解消散。 /// Subject responses allow you to configure how different types of actors will respond to creep growth. For example, by default tree doodads are configured to disintegrate when creep grows on them.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorCutscene_FilePath=演算体使用的过场动画路径。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_BoostedCliffLevel=装饰物的足印可以将单元格标为“凸起悬崖”。任何有“凸起悬崖”标旗的单元格都会根据这里指定的悬崖层级进行视觉上的悬崖层级调整。通常用于调整桥梁装饰物的悬崖层级。 /// The footprint for a doodad can flag cells as Boost Cliff. Any cells with the Boost Cliff flag will adjust the cliff level used for vision to the cliff level specified here. Typically used to adjust the cliff level of bridge doodads.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_BoostedHeight=装饰物的足印可以将单元格标为“提升高度”。任何有“提升高度”标旗的单元格都将根据这里指定的高度调整同步高度图。通常在大型树木装饰物上使用，比如飞行单位会从树木上方飞过而不是从其中穿行而过。 /// The footprint for a doodad can flag cells as Boost Height. Any cells with the Boost Height flag will adjust the synchronous height map to the specified height. Typically used on large tree doodads such that flying units will fly over the trees rather than through them.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_DoodadFlags=允许你对一个装饰物配置标旗，例如装饰物在不创建演算体的情况下是否只应用一个足印，或者装饰物在其不可见时是否会暂停动画。 /// Allows you to configure flags on a doodad such as whether it will only apply a footprint without creating an actor or whether it will pause animations while the doodad is not visible.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_EditorAnim=该装饰在地形编辑器中被放置时所播放的动画 /// Animation that this doodad plays when it is placed in the Terrain Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_EditorFacingAlignment=该装饰物在编辑器中被放置时的朝向必须是这里指定角度的一个倍数。比如，如果对齐是15度，那么有效的朝向就会是15或30度，而不会是20度。 /// The facing of this doodad when placed in the editor must be a multiple of the angle specified here. For example if the alignment is 15 degrees then valid facings would be 15 or 30 but not 20 degrees.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_EditorFlags=这些是用来配置该装饰物在地形编辑器中被放置时如何表现 /// These configure how this doodad behaves when placed in the Terrain Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_EditorIcon=在地形编辑器“按钮”和“树状”视图中所显示的图标 /// Icon displayed in Button and Tree views in the Terrain Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_EditorModel=该装饰物在地形编辑器中被放置时所显示的模型。这对于例如天气效果这种在地形编辑器中很难固定其位置和具体应用的装饰物非常有用，前提是如果它们没有使用交替模型的话。 /// Model that is displayed when this doodad is placed in the Terrain Editor.  Useful for doodads such as weather effects that would be hard to locate and manipulate in the Terrain Editor if they did not use an alternative model.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_Facing=该装饰物在地形编辑器中被放置时的默认朝向方位 /// Default direction the doodad faces when being placed in the Terrain Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_Footprint=该装饰物使用的足印 /// Footprint the doodad uses
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapColor=指定装饰物在微缩地图中生成的形状颜色。该颜色对于自定义微缩地图图片会被忽略，仅在编辑器中生成微缩地图时应用。 /// Specifies the color for the doodad's generated minimap shape. The color is ignored for custom minimap images and only applies to minimap generation in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapIcon=定义将在游戏中使用的微缩地图图标，而不是根据其半径而描绘装饰物。 /// Determines the minimap icon that will be used in-game instead of drawing the doodad based on its radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapImage=指定一个备选图片来绘入微缩地图，而非使用支持Alpha混合的通用形状。仅应用于编辑器中的微缩地图生成。 /// Specify an optional image to draw into the minimap instead of a generic shape with alpha blending support. Only applies to minimap generation in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapRenderPriority=定义该装饰物的微缩地图图标的渲染优先级，按照“演算体全局配置 - 渲染优先级列表”中的对应顺序。 /// Determines the render priority of this doodad's minimap icon based on the corresponding order in the Actor Global Config - Render Priority List.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapShape=选择在没有使用自定义图片时装饰物是否会在微缩地图上描绘为方格或圆圈。仅应用于编辑器中的微缩地图生成。 /// Choose whether the doodad will be drawn as a square or circle on the minimap if no custom image is used. Only applies to minimap generation in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_MinimapSize=指定在世界坐标中图片或形状的尺寸大小，0即表示不显示微缩地图。仅对编辑器中微缩地图生成使用。 /// Specifies the size of the image or shape in world coordinates where zero implies no minimap display. Only applies to minimap generation in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_NoFlyZoneHardRadius=如果该半径大于零，则装饰物会自动在其位置点创建一个不可飞行区域，在指定的半径范围内完全阻挡飞行单位的运动。 /// If this radius is greater than zero, the doodad will automatically create a no fly zone at its position that completely blocks air unit movement up to the specified radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_NoFlyZoneSoftRadius=如果该半径大于零，则装饰物会自动在其位置点创建一个不可飞行区域，在指定的半径范围内推开飞行单位。 /// If this radius is greater than zero, the doodad will automatically create a no fly zone at its position that pushes air units away up to the specified radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_OccludeHeight=当该装饰物的足印含有被标记为“阻碍视野”的单元格时，低于这里指定高度的单位将无法看到该装饰物之后。提高该值，可以允许你制作一个可以阻碍飞行单位视野的视野阻碍装饰物线。 /// When the footprint for this doodad has cells marked as Block Vision, units below the height specified here will not be able to see past this doodad. By increasing this value, it allows you to make line of sight blocking doodads that can block vision for flying units.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_Radius=定义该装饰物在编辑器中的碰撞半径。 /// Determines the collision radius of this doodad in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_RandomScaleRange=当在地形编辑器中放置该装饰物时，它会从该范围中挑选一个随机比例。 /// When this doodad is placed in the Terrain Editor, it will pick a random scale from this range.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_TexSets=地形编辑器的纹理设置分类 /// Texture set categorization for the Terrain Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_VisibleOpacity=当该装饰物可见时，它将按照这里指定的不透明度进行显示。当其在战场迷雾中时，装饰物将按照完全不透明度显示。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorDoodad_VisibleOpacityBlendDuration=如果该装饰物的可见性不透明度低于1.0，那么当装饰物不再完全可见时，它将按这里所指定的时间一直处于模糊状态。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorFoliageFXSpawner_Radius=指定围绕植被（将用演算体替换的） 装饰物进行搜索的半径范围。 /// Specifies the radius to search around the doodad for foliage that will be replaced with actors.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorFoliageFXSpawner_SpawnTarget=在生成器半径范围中找到的植被将会被摧毁，并用一个使用这里所指定演算体的演算体复件进行替换。这个系统允许在植被上播放死亡动画。 /// Foliage found in the spawner radius will be destroyed and replaced with an actor copy using the actor specified here. This system allows death animations to be played on foliage.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceBox_Height=指定方框的总高度。力方框的源到顶面和底面的距离将是该值的一半。 /// Specifies the total height of the box. The distance from the origin of the force box to the top and bottom sides will be half of this value.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceBox_Length=指定方框的总长度。力方框的源到前部侧面和后部侧面的距离将是该值的一半。 /// Specifies the total length of the box. The distance from the origin of the force box to the front and back sides will be half of this value.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceBox_Origin=允许你选择该演算体的方位是否作为力场的中心或底部。可以用来对仅在力演算体一侧邻近的演算体应用一个力。 /// Allows you to choose whether the bearings of this actor represents the center or the bottom of the force field. This can be used to apply a force to adjacent actors on only one side of the force actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceBox_Width=指定方框的总宽度。力方框的源到左侧面和右侧面的距离将是该值的一半。 /// Specifies the total width of the box. The distance from the origin of the force box to the left and right sides will be half of this value.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceConeRoundedEnd_Angle=指定圆锥体的顶角，即在那些定义圆锥体聚集点的线之间的角度。 /// Specifies the apex angle of the cone, which is the angle between the lines that define the cone's convergence point.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceConeRoundedEnd_Length=指定锥形体从基部到顶点量得的总长度。锥形体的半径将基于长度和角度进行计算。 /// Specifies the total length of the cone measured from base to apex point. The radius of the cone will be calculated based on the length and angle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceCylinder_Length=定义圆柱体底面到顶面的空间距离。 /// Determines the spatial distance from one end of the cylinder to the other.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceCylinder_Radius=定义圆柱体中心点到侧面距离的一半。 /// Determines one half of the distance from the center of the cylinder to the sides.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceLineSegment_HostEnd=负责定位使用这里所指定的终端主体方位的线段末端。 /// Positions the end of the line segment using the bearings of the end host specified here.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceLineSegment_HostEndSiteOps=允许你通过应用指令中所列的每一个部位运算来自定义继承于终端主体的位置点和旋转。 /// Allows you to customize position and rotation that is inherited from the end host by applying each site operation in the order it is listed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceSphere_Direction=向上导引的球形力将被旋转以便匹配它们附着的模型的Z轴，这样可以用于大型溅射伤害攻击。向前导引的力将匹配它们附着的模型的朝前面向。 /// Spherical forces that are directed upwards will be rotated to match the z axis of the model they are attached to, which can be used for large splash damage attacks. Forces directed forwards will match the forward facing of the model they are attached to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceSphere_IsHemisphere=为应用为半球体的力启用该标旗。对于一个向上引导的球体，球体的上半部分将被用作为半球体。 /// Enable this flag for the force to be applied as a hemisphere, which is half of a sphere, rather than a full sphere. For an upward directed sphere, the top half of the sphere would be used as the hemisphere.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForceSphere_Radius=定义距离球体中心点到边缘距离的一半。 /// Determines one half of the distance from the center of the sphere to the edge.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForce_Duration=力演算体会持续存在，并且对邻近的具有物理实体的模型应用力，持续指定的时间。若将该时长设置为-1则会使演算体无限期地应用力，直到该演算体被手动摧毁。 /// The force actor will stay alive and apply forces to nearby models with physics bodies throughout the specified duration. Setting this to -1 will cause it to apply the force indefinitely until the actor is manually destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForce_Field=定义力是进行放射状应用还是方向性应用。一个放射状的力会从力场的中心向外应用，而一个方向性的力会按贯穿整个力场区域的同一个方向进行应用。 /// Determines whether the force will be applied radially or directionally. A radial force will be applied outward from the center of the force field whereas a directional force will be applied in the same direction across the entire area of the force field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForce_ForceFlags=力标旗允许你控制力是否有衰减（随着距离的增加而减少）， 或者同一个力可以从不同的来源中被多次相乘而叠加。 /// Force flags allow you to control whether the force has falloff which diminishes in strength over distance and whether the same force can stack by being applied multiple times from different sources.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForce_Magnitude=力的大小负责定义在力场中有多少加速度将被应用于物理实体。 /// The magnitude of a force determines how much acceleration will be applied to physics bodies within the force field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorForce_Receiver=如果指定，将定义何种类型的演算体才是力的有效目标。 /// If specified, determines what type of actor can be a valid target for the force.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_ActorUnitFallback=这里指定的演算体将会为以下单位创建，即没有单位演算体在其出生时被用自动创建事件设置的单位。自动创建事件是指事件发送一个不含其它参数的“创建”消息。 /// The actor specified here will be created for any units that do not have a unit actor configured with an auto-create event for when the unit is born. Auto-create events are when the event sends a "Create" message with no other parameters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_AttachHarnessActor=这是在将一个模型附着到另一个演算体时使用的演算体，前提是没有给附着物指定其它的演算体。 /// This is the actor that is used when attaching a model to another actor if there is no other actor specified for that attachment.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_AttachHarnessSOpAttach=当以某种附着方式给演算体附着时，该字段负责定义附着物的位置操作，将控制演算体如何被附着。 /// When attaching actors with an attach method, this determines the attachment site op that will manage how the actors are attached.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_AttachHarnessSOpLocalOffset=当给演算体附着有位置偏移时，该字段负责定义将控制演算体如何被附着的偏移部位运算。 /// When attaching actors with a position offset, this determines the offset site op that will manage how the actors are attached.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_AttachHarnessSOpRotationExplicit=当给演算体附着有特定旋转时，该字段负责定义将控制演算体如何被附着的旋转部位运算。 /// When attaching actors with a specific rotation, this determines the rotation site op that will manage how the actors are attached.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_BodySquibs=为每一个单位定义默认的躯体弹药爆裂效果，即显示诸如火烧或流血等死亡效果的会被附着到死亡模型上的演算体。通过在单位“死亡自定义”字段中定义相同名字的躯体弹药爆裂，可以覆盖单位的默认躯体弹药爆裂效果。 /// Defines the default body squibs for every unit, which are actors that display death effects such as fire or blood that will be attached to the death model. Units can override the default body squibs for a custom death by defining a body squib with the same name in the unit's Death Customs field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CloakModel=这里指定的模型将被用于对任何隐形单位应用隐形效果。模型必须要有一个可被用于该目的的特殊隐形材质。 /// The model specified here will be used to apply the cloaking effect to any cloaked units. The model must have a special cloak material that can be used for that purpose.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CloakModelLow=这里指定的模型将会在画质渲染设定设为低时被用来对任何隐形的单位应用隐形效果。模型必须要有一个可用于该目的的特殊隐形材质。 /// The model specified here will be used to apply the cloaking effect to any cloaked units when the shader graphics settings is set to low. The model must have a special cloak material that can be used for that purpose.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CloakTransitionArray=配置初始以及循环动画，这里仅限任何隐形单位当其材质进入隐形状态时所播放的初始以及循环动画。每一个可能的过渡动画都必须要求本地玩家和隐形单位所有者拥有同盟关系。 /// Configures the initial and looping animations that will be played on the cloaked material for any cloaked units. Each possible transition is based on the alliance between the local player and the owner of the cloaked unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CommandUIActor=定义将被创建用来显示移动路径或其它队列技能的演算体模型。路径演算体的模型会被技能指令数据中指定的模型文件所覆盖。 /// Determines the actor model that will be created to display movement waypoints or other queued abilities. The waypoint actor's model will be overridden with the model file specified in the ability's order data.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CreepEngulfmentModel=这里指定的模型将被用于对任何位置在菌毯上方的非异虫建筑应用菌毯吞没效果。模型必须要有一个可用于该目的的特殊菌毯材质。 /// The model specified here will be used to apply the creep engulfment effect to any non-zerg buildings positioned on top of creep. The model must have a special creep material that can be used for that purpose.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CreepHeightClasses=为菌毯吞没定义指定组参数，这些参数负责定义菌毯吞没将被限制的高度。单个模型演算体负责指定哪些参数使用它们的“菌毯高度种类”字段。 /// Defines a named set of parameters for creep engulfment that determine the height that the engulfment will be limited to. Each model actor specifes which parameters to use with their Creep Height Class field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_CreepRates=为菌毯吞没定义指定组参数，这些参数负责定义菌毯吞没可生长或收缩的速度。单个模型演算体负责指定哪些参数使用它们的“菌毯生长率”和“菌毯收缩率”字段。 /// Defines a named set of parameters for creep engulfment that determine the speed that creep engulfment can grow or shrink. Each model actor specifies which parameters to use with their Creep Rate Grow and Creep Rate Shrink fields.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_DeathCustomPriorityList=如果有多个“自定义死亡”条件被满足，则该列表会定义哪一个“自定义死亡”具有优先权。“自定义死亡”必须在该列表中才能生效。 /// If multiple Custom Death conditions are satisfied, this list determines which Custom Death takes priority.  A Custom Death must be in this list in order to function.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_DeathCustoms=为可用于每一个单位的自定义单位死亡定义指定组参数。这些参数负责定义将用于自定义死亡的模型和音效。单位演算体可以通过发送一条含有自定义死亡名称的“死亡自定义”消息来使用一个这里指定的自定义死亡，以响应“单位死亡自定义”事件。 /// Defines a named set of parameters for customized unit deaths that are available to every unit. The parameters determine the model and sound that will be used for the custom death. Unit actors can use a custom death specified here by sending a Death Customize message with the name of the custom death in response to the Unit Death Customize event.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_LookAtTypes=所有CActorLookAt共享的注视类型。数据或触发器可以在目标CActorLookAt上设置这些类型以控制其行为。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_MainActor=每个演算体域的“主要演算体”将会是该域中的“单位演算体”（如果存在），或者基于该字段指定的演算体键位找到的演算体。“主要演算体”直接从代码中获取特定消息，而不是对整个域发送消息，并且同样可以使用::Main系统键位来获得。 /// The Main Actor for each actor scope will be the Unit Actor in that scope if it exists, or the actor that is found based on the actor key specified in this field. The Main Actor receives certain messages from code directly rather than sending the messages to the entire scope, and can also be accessed using the ::Main system key.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_MaxSpeedForSound=如果游戏速度超过指定的音效将播放的最大游戏速度，则所有通过演算体进行播放的音效都会被跳过。跳过音效可以在进行高速游戏回放时提升游戏的运行性，同时还能避免因强行播放大量音效所出现的不和谐的音频效果。 /// All sounds played through actor will be skipped if the game speed exceeds the specified maximum game speed for sounds to be played. Skipping sounds improves replay performance at high speed and also avoids undesirable audio results from playing many sounds on top of each other.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_MinimapRenderPriorityList=定义一组排序过的名称，这些名称可用来控制演算体将在微缩地图中被渲染的顺序。比如，一个含有特定名称优先级的演算体只能在顺序列表中排在其上方的名称之后进行渲染，并会在那些在顺序列表中排在其下方的名称之前进行渲染。这个字段可以用来使“英雄”单位能比一些重要性较低的演算体（比如装饰物） 优先进行渲染。 /// Defines an ordered set of names that can be used to control the order that actors will be rendered on the minimap. Actors with a given named priority will render after names above it in the list and before names that are below it. This can be used to have Hero units render on top of less important actors like Doodads.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_MissileBoundsOptSpeedThreshold=飞行速度大于该字段中指定值的发射物将会自动扩展它们的模型界限，以便包含任意发射粒子。模型通常不会扩展它们的界限来包含粒子从而提升游戏运行性能，但是如果不扩展模型界限，快速飞行的发射物有可能会出现由发射粒子所带来的视觉显示问题。 /// Missiles that are travelling at a velocity greater than the value specified in this field will automatically extend the bounds of their model to include any emitted particles. Models typically do not extend their bounds to include particles in order to improve game performance, but fast travelling missiles can experience visual issues with emitted particles if the bounds are not extended.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_PopulationLimitModel=如果游戏画面低于15帧时，“动作演算体”创建的“弹药爆裂”演算体会按照这里指定的量进行限制。弹药爆裂效果可以被忽略，并且不会对视觉体验造成太大负面影响，从而维持过得去的游戏画面。 /// Squib actors created by Action Actors will be limited to the amount specified here if the game is running below 15 fps. Squibs can be ignored without negatively affecting the visual experience in order to maintain adequate performance.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_RevealTint=从战场迷雾中进行攻击的单位，会在攻击期间暂时可见，而单位会根据该字段指定的值进行染色。 /// Units that are attacking from within the fog of war will be tinted based on the value specified in this field when they are temporarily made visible during the attack.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorGlobalConfig_SceneActor=游戏每一帧渲染多个场景，通常情况下游戏世界一个场景，人物头像又是另一个场景。每一个场景都有一个为其创建的“场景演算体”，来处理比如着色、光照或者更换活动镜头等全屏效果。每一个场景的“场景演算体”都会根据该字段中指定的演算体进行创建。 /// The game renders multiple scenes each frame, typically including one scene for the game world and one for portraits. Each scene has a Scene Actor created for it that handles fullscreen effects like tint and lighting or changing the active camera. The Scene Actor for each scene will be created based on the actor specified in this field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorLightModel_Light=指定该模型将会跟随的“光源演算体”。这是用于在编辑器中渲染光源的纠错模型。 /// Specifies the Light Actor that this model will follow. This is used to render debug models for lights in the editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorList_IsAutoDestroy=如果该演算体被配置为自动清除，那么它将在存在至少一帧的时间后自杀。否则该演算体将一直处于存活状态直至被手动摧毁。 /// If this actor is configured to auto destroy, it will kill itself automatically after staying around for at least a frame. Otherwise this actor will stay alive until it is manually destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorLookAt_HostTarget=注视激活时所指向的目标CActorBearings。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorLookAt_HostTargetSiteOps=修改或控制注视激活时所指向位置的位置操作。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorLookAt_Type=CActorLookAt所控制的炮台组的指向数据，以及他们在注视或停止注视一个给定目标时的混合方式。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorLookAt_Types=注视类型的本地数组，让CActorLookAt可以动态切换行为。此处指定的数据只能被容纳它的演算体所选择。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorMissile_HostReturn=主要用于触须类攻击，对发射物将会返回的位置进行设置。 /// Primarily for tentacle attacks, configures where will the missile will return to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorMissile_HostReturnSiteOps=主要用于触须类攻击，发射物在攻击后将会返回位置的位置操作设定。 /// Primarily for tentacle attacks, site operation settings for where the missile will return to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorMissile_IsTentacle=定义该发射物是否是触须类攻击。触须类攻击的发射物将会在攻击目标后返回。 /// Determines whether this missile should behave like a tentacle or not.  Tentacles will fire out at the target, and then return.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorMissile_PreHost=给该字段设置的“动作演算体”引用将会被发送一条“MissilePreHost”消息，以使动作为发射物创建视觉效果。 /// The Action Actor reference configured for this field will be sent a MissilePreHost message in order to have the action create visual effects for the missile.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModelMaterial_MaterialType=决定材质会替换目标材质，还是会作为一个附加层添加到它们上面，就像一层釉光。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModelMaterial_ModelMaterialFlags=影响所有CActorModelMaterial的标旗。这些标旗会改变一个材质实例的性状，诸如是否会在战场迷雾下播放动画。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_AnimBlendTime=这会影响该模型上的所有动画的动画混合时间。 /// This affects the animation blend times for all animations on this model.  When set to -1, this will use the Global Animation Blend Time setting.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_AutoScaleFactor=该模型演算体将会根据一个量值自动比例化，该值是由“自动比例系数”与父类模型的半径和“模型数据”中定义的该模型的半径之间的比率值相乘而得到的。比如，当附着到一个模型其半径比模型自身半径还大时，模型比例会更大。潜地动作在地图上形成的喷溅图就是使用这个从而能根据不同的异虫单位大小而自动调整喷溅图的比例大小。 /// This model actor will be automatically scaled by an amount determined by multiplying the Auto Scale Factor with the ratio between the parent model's radius and this model's radius defined in Model Data. For example, the model would be scaled larger when attached to a model with a radius greater than the model's own radius. Burrowed splats use this to automatically scale to each Zerg unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_AutoScaleFromSelectionFactor=该模型演算体将会根据一个量值进自动比例化，该值是由“自动按框选因数比例化”与父类模型的选择半径和“模型数据”中定义的该模型的选择半径之间的比率值相乘所得到的。这个与“自动比例系数”字段几乎相同，只是其基于“模型数据”中的“选择半径”字段。 /// This model actor will be automatically scaled by an amount determined by multiplying the Auto Scale From Selection Factor with the ratio between the parent model's selection radius and this model's selection radius defined in Model Data. This works exactly like the Auto Scale Factor field except it is based on the Selection Radius field in Model Data.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_CreepHeightClass=基于演算体全局配置的“菌毯高度种类”字段来配置该模型的菌毯吞没高度。默认游戏数据有“微型”、“小型”以及“中型”三种通常可匹配模型高度的设置。 /// Configures the height of creep engulfment for this model based on the Actor Global Config's Creep Height Classes field. The default game data has Tiny, Small, and Medium configurations that normally match the height of the model.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_CreepRateGrow=基于“演算体全局配置的菌毯率”字段来配置该模型的菌毯吞没生长率。该字段必须设置，以便建筑能被菌毯吞没。 /// Configures the growth rate of creep engulfment for this model based on the Actor Global Config's Creep Rates field. This field must be set in order for a building to be engulfed by creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_CreepRateShrink=基于“演算体全局配置的菌毯率”字段来配置该模型的菌毯吞没的收缩率。 /// Configures the shrink rate of creep engulfment for this model based on the Actor Global Config's Creep Rates field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_EventDataFootprint=在“模型数据”中，你可以对显示单位运动所留下的实际足迹的事件进行配置。这里指定的模型将会被创建来显示左足迹或右足迹。 /// In the Model Data you can configure Events that will display actual footprints left by a unit's movement. The model specified here will be created to display the left or right footprints.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_EventDataFootprintActor=在“模型数据”中，你可以对显示单位运动所留下的实际足迹的事件进行配置。这里指定的演算体将会被创建来显示左足迹或右足迹。 /// In the Model Data you can configure Events that will display actual footprints left by a unit's movement. The actor specified here will be created to display the left or right footprints.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_EventDataSound=在“模型数据”中，你可以对在一个动画中的特定点播放音效的事件进行配置。这里指定的音效将会在动画的特定点进行播放。 /// In the Model Data you can configure Events that will play sounds at a specific point in an animation. The sound specified here will be played at that point in the animation.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_EventDataSoundActor=在“模型数据”中，你可以对在一个动画中的特定点播放音效的事件进行配置。这里指定的音效演算体将会被创建并在动画的特定点进行播放。 /// In the Model Data you can configure Events that will play sounds at a specific point in an animation. The sound actor specified here will be created and played at that point in the animation.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_HostedAttaches=该字段允许你动态地控制模型中被配置为附着点的骨骼。附着点会基于这里配置的主体演算体的位置点进行程序上的定位。这可以用于拉伸模型，从而能跟随一个比如“脊针爬虫”触须攻击这种发射物移动器。 /// This field allows you to dynamically control bones in the model that are configured as attach points. The attach point will be procedurally positioned based on the position of the host actor configured here. This can be used to stretch the model to follow a missile mover like for the Spine Crawler's Tentacle attack.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_LocalOffsetFor2ndVisibilityTest=战场迷雾可见性测试在“临近位置点”处被执行，通常是演算体的中心点（0， 0， 0）。如果该字段被设置，将会执行一次第二次可见性测试，只会使演算体更加可见。偏移量在局部坐标中被指定，正Y匹配演算体的朝向，正X对应演算体的右侧。这可以用于仅在一个方向中扩展演算体的可见性。 /// Fog of War visibility tests are performed at the Proximity Position, which is typically the actor's center (0, 0, 0). If this field is set, a second visibility test will be performed that can only make the actor more visible. The offset is specified in local coordinates where positive y matches the facing of the actor and positive x is to the right of the actor. This can be used to extend an actor's visibility in only one direction.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_LookAtPriorityList=决定该CActorModel中CActorLookAt驱动炮台组的优先级列表。以这种方式，一个CActorLookAt可以驱动一个炮台组，但也可以临时地被另一个CActorLookAt给覆盖掉。例如，一个通常会指向攻击目标的坦克炮台可能会临时地被一个在施法时会影响炮台视觉效果的技能给覆盖掉。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_Model=该演算体所用模型条目的链接。 /// Link to the model entry this actor uses
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_ModelAspectSets=配置CActorModel的模型表象。模型表象可使模型对不同玩家展现不同的外观，具体取决于表象集合中设置的规则。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_ModelFlags=应用于所有演算体的标旗，例如其是否会被点击测试（鼠标点击开启），或者其是否会忽略可行走物（走过装饰物而非站在它们上面），以及是执行否可见性测试。 /// Flags that apply to all model actors.  These flags change certain aspects of model behavior such as whether it can be hit tested (clicked on), whether it ignores walkables (pass through doodads rather than stand on top of them), and whether visibility tests are performed at all.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_ModelMaterialGlazeDisplayLimit=决定模型上可以同时存在的釉光数量，可选。在拥有大量可能被同时附加到一个模型上的材质时可以维持游戏运行效率。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_PhysicsImpactDefault=物理轰击数据决定了一个模型如何响应一条“物理轰击自定义”消息。在默认物理轰击数据中指定的值将会被使用，除非自定义值已被修改成与它们默认值不相同的值。 /// Physics impact data determines how a model responds to a Physics Impact Customize message. The values specified in the default phyiscs impact data will be used unless the customized values have been modified from their default values.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_PhysicsImpacts=物理轰击数据决定了一个模型如何响应一条“物理轰击自定义”消息。当轰击发生时，在物理轰击数据中指定的模型或音效将会被创建。例如，这可以用于在物理实体与一个金属管发生碰撞时，播放一种金属类音效。 /// Physics impact data determines how a model responds to a Physics Impact Customize message. The model or sound specified in the physics impact data will be created when the impact occurs. For example, this can be used to play a metallic sound when a physics body collides with a metal pipe.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_ProximityPosition=临近位置点决定了为演算体执行第一次可见性测试的位置。大多数演算体使用“中心演算体”选项在（0， 0， 0）坐标执行该测试。不过，不对称的模型通常需要使用“中心模型界限”选项才能使可见性测试偏移演算体中心点一定距离。 /// The proximity position determines where the first visiblity test will be performed for the actor. Most actors use the Center Actor option to perform the test at (0, 0, 0). However, models that are not symmetrical typically need to use the Center Model Bounds option in order to move the visibility test offset from the center of the actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorModel_Scale=应用至该演算体的比例 /// Scale applied to this actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorPortrait_AnimTargets=当正在播放一个头像的一个特定动画时，指定在此头像框内哪个演算体会来接受所发出的动画信息。 /// Specifies which actors in a portrait frame will receive animation messages that are sent when playing a specific animation on that portrait.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorPortrait_FaceFXTarget=当一个头像与一个FaceFX文件设置成一起时，指定在一个头像框内的哪个模型演算体来播放面部动画。 /// Specifies which model actor in a portrait frame to play facial animations on when a portrait has been set up with a FaceFX file.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorPower_PowerSource=演算体“能量源”行为的链接。 /// Link to the Power Source behavior for this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorPower_VisualArray=与不同能量级的“能量源”行为相关联的演算体泼溅图的数组。 /// Array of actor splats associated with the different power levels of the Power Source behavior.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorProgress_StageArray=不同进度阶段的参数。创建“进度”的技能演算体，负责控制该演算体在每一阶段所花费的时间。 /// Parameters for the different progress stages.  The ability that creates the Progress actor controls how long the actor spends in each stage.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_CenterActor=四边形演算体将中心演算体放置在发射演算体和轰击演算体之间。创建多少个中心演算体取决于总高度减去轰击和发射两者高度的剩余高度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_CenterHeight=决定有多少中心演算体的中心高度是由：总高度减去发射和轰击高度后的剩余高度再除以中心高度所得而来。 /// The center height determines how many center actors are created by first subtracting the launch and impact heights from the total height and then dividing the remaining height by the center height.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_Decoration=用于产生一个装饰物演算体，沿着高度轴向着四边形的另一边移动。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_Height=高度字段决定了四边形演算体的总水平长度。该高度会忽略四边形字段内定义的值但仍会保留其朝向和中心点。这不是指Z高度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_ImpactActor=轰击演算体在四边形的末端创建，通常是在鼠标指针被用来作为瞄准指针时的位置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_ImpactHeight=轰击高度决定了轰击演算体的垂直比例（本地Y轴）。当要决定创建多少中心演算体时，将会从总高度中减去轰击高度。 /// The impact height specifies the vertical scale (local Y axis) of the impact actor. The impact height is subtracted from the total height when determining how many center actors will be created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_LaunchActor=发射演算体在四边形的始端创建，通常是在鼠标被用来做瞄准指针时单位所处的位置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_LaunchHeight=发射高度决定了发射演算体的垂直比例（本地Y轴）。当要决定创建多少中心演算体时，将会从总高度中减去发射高度。 /// The launch height specifies the vertical scale (local Y axis) of the launch actor. The launch height is subtracted from the total height when determining how many center actors will be created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_Quad=决定四边形演算体的中心点、面积和朝向。四边形的四个角会由最小X，最小Y，最大X和最大Y点来决定。高度域和宽度域会忽略此处定义的值，并同时维持相同的中心点和方位。此处的朝向是指最小和最大值是否被反向，这可以用来颠倒轰击点和发射点。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQuad_Width=宽度字段影响着四边形演算体的水平尺寸（本地X轴）。宽度会忽略在四边形字段内定义的值，但保留中心点和方位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQueryResponse_OnResponse=当一个查询响应被触发时所被发出的消息。只有在触发响应的演算体符合“主体”筛选条件时才会发生。 /// Message that gets dispatched when a query response is triggered.  This will only happen if the actor triggering the response passes the Subject filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorQueryResponse_Subject=控制会触发响应的演算体类别。 /// Controls the types of actors that will trigger a response.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Abil=该范围演算体可从中获得一个范围值的技能链接。 /// Link to an ability that the range actor will get a radius value from.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Arc=该技能范围显示时所覆盖的弧形范围。 /// The arc that this range display encompasses.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Behavior=该范围演算体可从中获得一个范围值的行为链接。 /// Link to a behavior that the range actor will get a radius value from.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_CliffLevelFlags=范围指示器是否将在悬崖层级低于、等于或高于范围演算体所在位置的悬崖层级时显示。 /// Whether or not the range indicators will be displayed on lower, equal, or higher cliff levels than the cliff level at the position of the Range Actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Icon=将用于创建范围圈的纹理 /// The texture that will be used to create the range circle
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_IconArcLength=控制射程图标纹理间的间隔 /// Controls the spacing between the range icon textures
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_IconScale=图片的缩放
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Range=设置范围演算体的范围 /// Sets the radius of the range actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_RangeFlags=该范围演算体的标旗 /// Flags for this range actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Sight=该范围演算体可从中获得一个视野范围值的单位链接。 /// Link to a unit that the range actor will get a sight radius value from.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRange_Weapon=该范围演算体可从中获得一个范围值的武器链接。 /// Link to a weapon that the range actor will get a radius value from.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionArc_Angle=只基于指定角度覆盖圆形一部分的弧形区域。 /// Arc regions only cover a portion of a circle based on the specified angle in degrees.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionArc_Radius=弧形区域的范围是指从源到区域边缘的长度。 /// The radius of an Arc Region is the length from the origin to the edge of the region.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionCircle_Radius=圆形区域的范围是指从源到区域边缘的长度。 /// The radius of a Circle Region is the length from the origin to the edge of the region.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionCombine_ChildArray=将所有子区域合并成一个区域。 /// Combines all child regions into a single region.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionPolygon_PointArray=定义多边形区域形状的点的数组 /// Array for the points that define the shape of the polygon regions
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionQuad_Height=高度字段决定了四边形演算体的总水平长度。该高度会忽略四边形字段内定义的值但仍会保留其朝向和中心点。这不是指Z高度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionQuad_Quad=定义矩形区域形状的点 /// Points that define the shape of rectangular regions
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegionQuad_Width=宽度字段影响着四边形演算体的水平尺寸（本地X轴）。宽度会忽略在四边形字段内定义的值，但保留中心点和方位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_NotifyArcKey=指定哪个弧形演算体在区域演算体接收到一个查询设定施法者信息时，会收到弧形设置角度信息。 /// Specifies the Arc Actor that will receive the Arc Set Angle message as a result of this Region Actor receiving a Query Set Caster message.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_NotifyClosestScaleKey=此处指定的目标演算体会从根据最近的有效目标来自动调整其原来的长度比例。新的比例将根据最近的演算体和在查询持续性信息中被指定为离参考键最接近的演算体之间的距离。 /// The targeting Actor specified here will automatically scale its length from its origin to the closest valid target. The new scale is based on the distance between the closest Actor and the Actor that was specified as the Closest To Ref Key in the Query Persistent message.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_NotifyRadiusKey=指定一个目标演算体在接收到一个查询设定施法者信息时，来自动调整其半径比例以匹配效果的半径。 /// Specifies a targeting Actor that will have its radius automatically scaled to match the Effect radius found as a result of receiving a Query Set Caster message.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_QueryAbilCmd=如果查询设定施法者信息没有指定一个技能时，所使用的备用技能指令。 /// Fallback Ability Command that will be used if the Query Set Caster message does not specify an Ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_QueryEffect=如果查询设定施法者信息没有指定一个技能并且查询技能指令也没被设定时，所使用的备用效果。 /// Fallback Effect that will be used if the Query Set Caster message does not specify an Ability and the Query Ability Command is also not set.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_QueryFilters=如果查询设定施法者信息没有指定一个技能并且查询技能指令也没被设定时，所使用的备用目标筛选器。 /// Fallback Target Filters that will be used if the Query Set Caster message does not specify an Ability and the Query Ability Command is also not set.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_QueryRange=如果施法者与目标的距离大于查询范围时，则根据范围将区域放置在靠近目标位置并且朝向施法者的地方。 /// If the distance between the caster and target is greater than the query range, the region will be positioned near the target location towards the caster based on the range.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorRegion_RegionFlags=如果使用效果范围旗帜已被开启，则查询范围将根据在处理一个查询设定施法者信息时所获得的效果来决定其范围。 /// If the Use Effect Range flag is enabled, the query range will be based on the range of the Effect found as a result of handling a Query Set Caster message.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_Alpha=选圈的alpha决定了渲染圈的不透明度。在此处指定的xyz矢量将初始alpha表示为X，持续alpha表示为Y，衰变alpha表示为Z。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_Attenuation=选圈的衰减指定了选圈开始淡出的时候高度改变的程度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_FallOff=衰减通过在选圈淡出的地方增加了额外的区域而扩大了选圈的范围。 /// FallOff extends the radius of the selection circle with an additional area where the circle fades out.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_HalfHeight=指定选圈渲染处的框的高度的一半。如果高度太小，选圈将会被裁剪。 /// Specifies the half of the height of the box where the selection circle can be rendered. If the height is too small it will clip the circle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_HostRadiusPercent=选圈将会基于此处指定的百分比自动按比例调整主演算体的选择范围。 /// The selection circle will automatically scale with the selection radius of the host actor based on the percentage specified here.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_InnerBoundaryFallOffRatio=控制选圈内部部分的淡化行为。 /// Controls the fading behavior of the inner portion of the selection circle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_InnerBoundaryRatio=控制选圈内部部分的淡化行为。 /// Controls the fading behavior of the inner portion of the selection circle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_InnerOffsetRatio=控制选圈内部部分的淡化行为。 /// Controls the fading behavior of the inner portion of the selection circle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_InnerWidth=内部宽度控制着选圈淡化的内部部分的尺寸。 /// Inner width controls the size of the faded inner portion of the selection circle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_OuterWidth=外部宽度控制着选圈固定的外部边框。 /// Outer width controls the size of the selection circle's solid outer border.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_RotationSpeed=选圈旋转的速度 /// Speed at which the selection circle rotates
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_SegmentCount=选圈的线段数 /// Number of selection circle segments
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_SegmentPercentSolid=选圈的固体线段百分比 /// Percentage of the selection circle segments that are solid
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_SelectionFilter=这一字段仅影响拥有IsSyncSelection标旗的演算体。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSelection_SelectionFlags=控制着选圈是否渲染为和地形不一致但却消耗更少的四边形泼溅图以及是否渲染为月牙形或是线段。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSetQueried_AttachQuery=会运行来定义该演算体应该在哪些附着点上生成“生成目标”的附着方式列表 /// List of attach methods that will run to determine which attach points this actor should spawn the Spawn Target on
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSetQueried_Host=决定该演算体会附着于哪个演算体 /// Determines what actor this actor will host off of
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSetQueried_SpawnTarget=将会在附着查询返回的任意一个附着点上所生成的演算体 /// Actor that will be spawned on whatever attach points are returned by the attach query
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShadow_Alpha=阴影的alpha决定了渲染圈的不透明度。在此处指定的xyz矢量将初始alpha表示为X，持续alpha表示为Y，衰变alpha表示为Z。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShadow_Attenuation=阴影的衰减指定了阴影开始淡出的时候高度改变的程度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShadow_FallOff=衰减通过在阴影淡出的地方增加了额外的区域而扩大了阴影的范围。 /// FallOff extends the radius of the shadow with an additional area where the shadow fades out.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShadow_HalfHeight=指定阴影渲染处的框的高度的一半。如果高度太小，阴影将会被裁剪。 /// Specifies the half of the height of the box where the shadow can be rendered. If the height is too small it will clip the shadow.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShadow_HostRadiusPercent=阴影将会基于此处指定的百分比自动按比例调整主演算体的选择范围。 /// The shadow will automatically scale with the selection radius of the host actor based on the percentage specified here.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_MaxCountLarge=在大型单位身上可显示的轰击最大数。单位大小是由该演算体上的范围阈所决定。 /// Maximum number of impacts that appear on large units.  Unit size is determined by the radius thresholds on this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_MaxCountMedium=在中型单位身上上可显示的轰击最大数。单位大小是由该演算体上的范围阈所决定。 /// Maximum number of impacts that appear on medium units.  Unit size is determined by the radius thresholds on this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_MaxCountSmall=轰击点在小型单位上可显示的最大数。单位的尺寸是由该演算体上的范围阈所定义的。 /// Maximum number of impacts that appear on small units.  Unit size is determined by the radius thresholds on this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_RadiusLarge=单位的模型包围球大于或等于该值的单位将被认定为大型单位。 /// Units whose model bounding sphere is greater than or equal to this value are considered large.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_RadiusMedium=单位的模型包围球大于或等于该值但小于“范围（大型）”值的单位将被认定为中型单位。其模型包围球小于该值的单位将被认定为小型单位。 /// Units whose model bounding sphere is greater than or equal to this value, and less than the Radius (Large) value are considered medium.  Units whose model bounding sphere is less than this value are considered small.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_VisualDirectionalFacer=此处指定的护盾演算体将会在一个护盾轰击拥有有效的方向并且“动作演算体”指定其“护盾闪动类型”为“面部类型”。 /// The shield actor specified here will be created when a shield impact has a valid direction and the Action Actor specifies its Shield Flash Type as the Facer Type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_VisualDirectionalHeader=此处指定的护盾演算体将会在一个护盾轰击拥有有效的方向并且“动作演算体”指定其“护盾闪动类型”为“头部类型”。 /// The shield actor specified here will be created when a shield impact has a valid direction and the Action Actor specifies its Shield Flash Type as the Header Type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShieldImpact_VisualDirectionless=此处指定的护盾演算体将会在缺乏有效方向的护盾轰击发生时创建。比如说，一个单位可以从自身的护盾里遭到攻击，由于在护盾里缺乏有效方向。 /// The shield actor specified here will be created whenever a shield impact occurs that does not have a valid direction. For example, a unit can be attacked from inside of its own shield, in which case it doesn't have a valid direction.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShield_RadiusMax=受到伤害时创建的护盾波纹的最大比例。如果伤害值大于或等于“最大伤害比例”，该比例将被使用。 /// The maximum scale of the shield ripple that will be created when taking damage. This scale will be used if the damage amount is greater than or equal to the Scale Damage Maximum.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShield_RadiusMin=受到伤害时创建的护盾波纹的最小比例。如果伤害值小于或等于“最小伤害比例”，该比例将被使用。 /// The minimum scale of the shield ripple that will be created when taking damage. This scale will be used if the damage amount is less than or equal to the Scale Damage Minimum.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShield_Ripple=决定受到伤害时为护盾波纹效果创建并缩放的演算体。 /// Determines the actor that will be created and scaled for the shield ripple effect when taking damage.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShield_ScaleDamageMax=对应最大范围值的最大伤害值。护盾波纹的比例是通过对比最小和最大伤害值并将该比例用用只最小和最大范围中进行计算的。 /// The maximum amount of damage that corresponds to the maximum radius value. The scale of the shield ripple is calculated by comparing the damaged received with the minimum and maximum damage values and applying that ratio to the minimum and maximum radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorShield_ScaleDamageMin=对应最小范围值的最小伤害值。护盾波纹的比例是通过对比最小和最大伤害值并将该比例用用只最小和最大范围中进行计算的。 /// The minimum amount of damage that corresponds to the minimum radius value. The scale of the shield ripple is calculated by comparing the damaged received with the minimum and maximum damage values and applying that ratio to the minimum and maximum radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteBillboard_BillboardType=基于“广告板类型”，“广告板位置”可以是无障碍而常处于镜头下，或是在“使用朝镜头的距离”类型完成设置后可以向镜头移动特定距离。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteBillboard_HoldRotation=带有“停止旋转”标旗的位置将会决定最初的旋转并使用该旋转作为其剩下持续时间的旋转，而不会不断重新计算。 /// Sites with the Hold Rotation flag set will determine an initial rotation and use that rotation for the rest of its lifetime rather than constantly recalculating it.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteBillboard_TowardsCameraDistance=如果“广告板类型”设置为“使用朝镜头的距离”，该距离就是广告板即将向镜头移动的距离。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteBillboard_UpdateDriveBearings=如果广告板设置为“更新驱动器方位”，广告板的位置和旋转将会在演算体主题或演算体域的方位修改后进行更新。如果该标旗关闭了，广告板将只在其显示于画面中的时候进行更新。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteMover_Acceleration=移动部位的加速度 /// Acceleration of the moving site
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteMover_Deceleration=移动部位的减速度 /// Deceleration of the moving site
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteMover_Speed=移动部位的起始速度 /// Initial speed of the moving site
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteMover_SpeedMax=移动部位的最大速度 /// Maximum speed of the moving site
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpAttach_AttachQuery=定义该位置操作将会挑选哪一个附着点的附着点或附着方式集 /// Attach point or set of attach methods that will determine which attach point this site operation will pick
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpAttach_ForceSoftAttach=强制一个软附着方法，以便稍后进行旋转和位置点的调整。 /// Force a soft attach method, these can be adjusted for rotation and positioning after.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpDeltaSum_DeltaSumFlags=用于指定这一位置操作的操作的标旗。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpDeltaSum_Deltas=用于计算附着点数据时的演算体列表。该位置操作会在之后将每一个复制点的差值加起来，作为自身的演算体位置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpPersistentOffset_HostInitial=与HostInitialSiteOps共同使用，提供转换为本地空间的最初的位相。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpPersistentOffset_HostInitialSiteOps=与HostInitial共同使用，提供转换为本地空间的最初的位相。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpPitchLimiter_HostPitchLimiter=提供PitchHalfAngle的引用帧。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpPitchLimiter_HostPitchLimiterSiteOps=可选的位置操作链，用于调整引用帧。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpPitchLimiter_PitchHalfAngle=指定以引用帧为基准，所允许的最大纵摇角度（沿着右轴旋转）。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpYawLimiter_ExtraYawAngle=假如传入的角度小于YawHalfAngle，角度不会有任何变化。假如介于YawHalfAngle和YawHalfAngle+ExtraYawAngle之间，它会被限制在YawHalfAngle内。假如超出YawHalfAngle+ExtraYawAngle。角度会被设为朝向引用帧的前方角度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpYawLimiter_HostYawLimiter=提供YawHalfAngle的引用帧。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpYawLimiter_HostYawLimiterSiteOps=可选的位置操作链，用于调整引用帧。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOpYawLimiter_YawHalfAngle=指定以引用帧为基准，所允许的最大横摇角度（沿着上轴旋转）。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOp_HoldPosition=带有“原地防守”标旗的位置操作将会决定最初位置并使用该位置作为其剩下持续时间的位置，而不会不断重新计算。 /// Site Ops with the Hold Position flag set will determine an initial position and use that position for the rest of its lifetime rather than constantly recalculating it.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteOp_HoldRotation=带有“停止旋转”标旗的位置操作将会决定最初位置并使用该位置作为其剩下持续时间的旋转，而不会不断重新计算。 /// Site Ops with the Hold Rotation flag set will determine an initial rotation and use that rotation for the rest of its lifetime rather than constantly recalculating it.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_Elevation=演算体的上升运动 /// Elevation movement for the actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_ElevationPeriod=该部位会调整其上升运动的持续时间 /// Duration over which the site will adjust its elevation
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_Pitch=演算体的上下摇摆运动参数 /// Up and down tilting motion parameters for the actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_PitchPeriod=该部位会调整其纵摇的持续时间 /// Duration over which the site will adjust its pitch
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_Roll=演算体的左右滚动运动 /// Side-to-side rolling motion for the actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSiteRocker_RollPeriod=该部位会调整其滚摇的持续时间 /// Duration over which the site will adjust its roll
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSite_SiteFlags=应用于所有位置演算体的标旗。这些标旗可以改变位置演算体的一些行为，诸如是否在其没有附着到任何演算体上时销毁自身。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSound_LoopCount=-代表永远循环，0代表播放一次。在序列播放模式下，每个单独的音效算作一次播放。全部播放模式目前不支持，只会播放一次。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSound_PlayMode=控制音效层级的播放方式。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSplat_FadeIn=泼溅图被创建后淡入显示所需要的时间 /// Duration over which the splat will fade in when created
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSplat_FadeOut=泼溅图被摧毁后淡出消失所需要的时间 /// Duration over which the splat will fade out when destroyed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorSquib_Map=每种轰击类型所使用的素材和属性地图 /// Map of assets and properties to use per impact type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorStateMonitor_StateArray=“状态”是一个与一系列条件相关联的名称。状态可以在该演算体中被“状态被更改”或者“状态验证”条件所引用。 /// States are a name that is associated with a series of terms.  States can be referenced in a State Changed or a State Validate term in this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTerrainDeformer_BlendTime=地形被该演算体变形时的混合时间。 /// The blend time when terrain is being deformed by this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTerrainDeformer_Footprint=一个足印链接。定义会被变形的区域。 /// Link to a footprint.  Determines the area that will be deformed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTerrainDeformer_TerrainDeformerFlags=演算体的标旗。 /// Flags for this actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTerrain_PhysicsImpactDefault=物理轰击数据决定了地形如何响应一条“物理轰击自定义”消息。在默认物理轰击数据中指定的值将会被使用，除非自定义值已被修改成与它们默认值不相同的值。 /// Physics impact data determines how the terrain responds to a Physics Impact Customize message. The values specified in the default phyiscs impact data will be used unless the customized values have been modified from their default values.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTerrain_PhysicsImpacts=物理轰击数据决定了地形如何响应一条“物理轰击自定义”消息。当轰击发生时，物理轰击数据中指定的模型或音效将会被创建。例如，这可以用于在一个物理实体与泥土地形发生碰撞时，创建尘埃云模型。 /// Physics impact data determines how the terrain responds to a Physics Impact Customize message. The model or sound specified in the physics impact data will be created when the impact occurs. For example, this can be used to create dust clouds when a physics body collides with dirt terrain.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorText_FixedSize=文本的字体大小 /// Font size for the text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorText_HeightOffset=该文本的高度偏移（相对于地面） /// Height offset (relative to the ground) for the text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorText_MaxSize=文本的最大水平和垂直大小 /// Maximum horizontal and vertical size for the text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorText_Text=该演算体将会显示的文本 /// The text this actor will display
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorText_TextScale=文本大小的比例因数 /// Scale factor for the size of the text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTurret_PitchQuery=该演算体将用来控制模型纵摇的能获得附着点的附着查询。该附着点必须链接到模型文件中的特殊炮塔骨骼。 /// Attach query that will get the attach point this actor will use to control pitch on the model.  The attach point must be linked to a special turret bone in the model file.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorTurret_YawQuery=该演算体将用来控制模型横摇的能获得附着点的附着查询。该附着点必须链接到模型文件中的特殊炮塔骨骼。 /// Attach query that will get the attach point this actor will use to control yaw on the model.  The attach point must be linked to a special turret bone in the model file.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnitRing_RingRadius=环模型被指定的半径。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_AbilSoundArray=与该单位的每个技能相关联的音效。 /// Sounds for this unit that are associated with individual abilities.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_BarHeight=该单位生命条高度。 /// The height of the unit's health bar.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_BarOffset=生命条会显示在附着点上方多高的位置。 /// How high above the attach point the health bar will appear.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_Baselines=基线动画是指那些经常是在单位动画叠层最“底部”的动画。 /// Baseline animations are animations that are always at the 'base' of the unit's animation stack.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_DeathArray=该单位会用于不同死亡类型的模型和声效素材。 /// Model and sound assets that the unit will use for different death types.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_DeathCustoms=自定义死亡是用来使单位在特定环境下播放一段非典型的死亡模型或死亡动画。要为一个自定义死亡创建环境， 使用一个“单位死亡自定义”事件来设置你希望该死亡动画发生时所需要的条件，并发送一个 /// Custom deaths are used to have a unit play a atypical death models/animations in specific circumstances.  To set up the circumstances for a custom death, use a Unit Death Customize event, set up the terms under which you want the death to occur, and send a 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_EditorAnim=该单位在地形编辑器中被查看时所播放的动画。 /// Animation the unit plays when viewed in the Terrain Editor.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_GroupSoundArray=当单位在一支队伍中被选中时所播放的音效。 /// The sound the unit will play when it is selected in a group.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_HeroIcon=如果该单位被标旗为英雄，则在游戏界面的英雄图标区域所显示的图标。 /// The icon displayed in the hero icon area of the game UI if this unit is flagged as being a hero.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_ImpactSound=指定任意CActorAction在轰击时播放的音效，前提是ImpactSuppressUnitSound未被勾选。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_ImpactSoundActor=指定用于容纳通用轰击音效（假如有的话）的套具演算体。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_ImpactSoundExtras=基于CActorUnit当前被替换为的模型来指定额外的通用轰击音效和音效演算体。

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_StatusColors=该单位不同状态条类型的颜色属性。 /// The color properties of the various status bar types for this unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_UnitIcon=该单位在编组栏中所显示的图标，如果该单位被分配了一个编组。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_WalkAnimMoveSpeed=每秒使用行走动画的游戏角色单位数量，这样单位模型就不会出现“脚滑”的视觉效果。行走动画移动速度3表示的是：单位在默认情况下，每秒以3块贴图的速度播放行走动画。（设计这个素材的美术设计师在MAX中设定的数值是这个的100倍，因为在那个环境下，一块贴图是100英寸。） /// The number of game units per second that the walk animation is animated to, so that the unit's model doesn't get 'slippy feet' visual artifacts.  A WalkAnimMoveSpeed of 3 means the unit is animated to walk at a rate of 3 tiles per second in the default case.  (The artist creating the asset actually types a value that is 100 times this into the asset in MAX, because in that context, a tile is 100 inches.)
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActorUnit_WalkAnimTimeScalingAsFlyer=防止一个地面单位调整其行走动画的频率，使其看起来像一个飞行单位。一般情况下，地面单位会在其加速和减速时自动调整其行走动画的频率，来确保它们的脚不会看起来是在地面上滑行。飞行单位因为没有脚，所以不需要和地面来进行调整。但是，特定的地面单位也不需要进行调整，比如一个悬浮艇就像空中单位一样飞过地面。简而言之，这个标旗是为了应付像悬浮艇此类场景的出现。 /// Enables a ground unit to avoid time scaling its walk animations, as if it was a flyer.  Normally, ground units automatically modify their walk animation time scale as they accelerate and decelerate, to ensure their feet do not appear to slide on the ground.  Flyers do not need this time scaling, because they do not have feet that need to be matched to the ground.  However, a ground unit like a hovercraft does not need this time scaling either, because it also does not have feet and appears to hover over the ground like a flyer.  In short, this flag exists to handle the hovercraft scenario.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_AcceptedHostedPropTransfers=定义何种类型的主体属性可以向新演算体转移。 /// Determines which types of hosted props will be transferred to a new actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_AcceptedTransfers=定义演算体的哪些额外属性将向新演算体转移。 /// Determines which additional properties of an actor will be transferred to a new actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Aliases=别名是备用名称（经常通用），可用来指向演算体。例如，大多数单位演算体使用_Unit 别名，从而允许其它演算体发送到_Unit的消息可以发送至属于该别名域中的单位演算体。 /// An alias is an alternative (often generic) name that can be used to refer to an actor.  For example, most unit actors use the _Unit alias, allowing other actors that send messages targeting _Unit to get those messages to the unit actor in that scope.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_CopySource=允许你指定一个同域内的独立演算体来向新演算体转移。 /// Allows you to specify a separate actor in the same scope that will be used to transfer properties to a new actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Filter=筛选器定义该演算体是否对敌人、中立、自身、盟友玩家可见。 /// Filter determines whether this actor is visible for Enemy, Neutral, Self, or Ally players.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Flags=应用于所有演算体的标旗，允许你改变演算体是否添加至外部查找器以及它是否将添加至一个保存的游戏。 /// Flags apply to all actors.  They allow you to change several actor behaviors, such as whether an actor is added to the External Finder and whether it will be added to a saved game.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_FogVisibility=控制演算体在战场迷雾下会如何显现。隐藏代表不可见。快照代表隐藏CActorUnit，但淡化所有其他内容（尽管这也代表CActorDoodads会依照要求而保留自身）。淡化代表演算体会按照战场迷雾而获得染色。可见代表模型在战场迷雾中完全可见。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_InheritType=定义该演算体如何从其作为主体的演算体获得属性。 /// Determines how this actor gets properties from its host.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Inherits=演算体从其主演算体继承的属性 /// Properties this actor inherits from its host actor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Macros=宏是外部定义并与该演算体的事件组合的演算体事件。 /// Macros are actor events that are defined externally and combined with this actor's events.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Sharing=共享允许你为演算体请求使用已有的演算体，而无需每次都创建一个新的演算体。每一个效果树将只会在它们在执行同样效果时被创建才会共享演算体。 /// Sharing allows you to use an existing actor for an actor request rather than always creating a new actor. Per Effect Tree will only share actors when they are created while executing the same effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Supporter=当该演算体的支持者死亡时，该演算体将会收到一条通常是用来摧毁演算体的SupporterDestruction消息。 /// When the Supporter of this actor dies, this actor will receive a SupporterDestruction message that is commonly used to destroy the actor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CActor_Terms=演算体条件（和触发条件类似）必须成功验证才能使该演算体创建。 /// Actor terms (similar to trigger conditions) that must validate successfully in order for this actor to be created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Display=谁会看见警示信息，相对于触发该警示信息的玩家 /// Who (relative to the player that triggered the alert) sees the alert
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Fade=该警示信息的淡出时间（以秒为单位） /// Fade out time (in seconds) for the alert
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Flags=警示信息标旗 /// Flags for the alert
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Icon=与警示信息一同显示的图标 /// Icon that appears with the alert
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Life=警示信息在淡化前以秒为单位持续的时间 /// Duration of the alert in seconds before it begins to fade
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_OverlapDuration=统计交叠限制的警示信息所存在的时间量。 /// The amount of time that an alert persists for calculating overlap restrictions.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_OverlapGlobalCount=警示信息音效连续播放的最大次数。 /// The maximum number of alert sounds that will play back to back.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_OverlapLocalCount=警示信息在“局部交叠范围”中可被触发的最大次数。 /// The maximum number of alerts that can be triggered within the Overlap Local Radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_OverlapLocalRadius=警示信息系统会搜索交叠的警示信息的范围 /// The radius that the alert system will search for overlapping alerts.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_PingModel=该警示信息在微缩地图提示中的模型 /// The model of the alert's minimap ping
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_PingTime=微缩地图提示的持续时间 /// Duration of the minimap ping
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_PrimaryActions=当左键点击警示信息或者按下空格键时所发生的动作。 /// Actions that occur when the alert is left clicked, or the spacebar is pressed.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Text=警示信息所显示的文本 /// Text that appears for the alert
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CAlert_Voice=在警示信息的触发单位上所播放的声音音效（如果适用） /// Voice sound played on the triggering unit of the alert (if applicable)
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorAttribute_MaxPoints=该属性可拥有的点数最大值。 /// Maximum number of points this attribute can have.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorAttribute_MinPoints=该属性可拥有的点数最小值。 /// Minimum number of points this attribute can have.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorAttribute_Modification=修改包含的是对任何拥有该行为的单位应用的一组临时改动。 /// Modifications are a set of temporary changes applied to any unit that has this behavior.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_BuffFlags=仅限于增益行为的标旗。 /// Flags specific to buff behaviors.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_DamageResponse=控制具有该种行为的单位在受到伤害时会如何反应的参数。 /// Parameters that control how this behavior responds to damage taken by the owning unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_DisableValidatorArray=如果这些验证器中有一个返回为假，则该行为将被禁用。 /// If one of these validators returns false, the behavior will be disabled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_DisplayDuration=此行为的倒计时出现时玩家的对齐方式 /// Alignment of Players to which this behavior's countdown appears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_Duration=该行为的持续时间 /// Duration of the behavior
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_DurationRandomMax=该行为每次被应用时，将会从“持续时间随机最大值”和“持续时间随机最小值”之间选择一个随机值，并将其添加到“持续时间”。 /// Each time this behavior is applied, a random value between the Duration Random Max and Duration Random Min will be chosen and added to the Duration.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_DurationRandomMin=该行为每次被应用时，将会从“持续时间随机最大值”和“持续时间随机最小值”之间选择一个随机值，并将其添加到“持续时间”。 /// Each time this behavior is applied, a random value between the Duration Random Max and Duration Random Min will be chosen and added to the Duration.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_ExpireEffect=如果该行为一直持续了整个时间段则会发生的效果。 /// Effect that occurs if the behavior lasts through its entire duration.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_FinalEffect=当该行为被移除时所发生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when the behavior is removed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_InitialEffect=当该行为被应用时所发生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when the behavior is applied.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_MaxStackCount=行为可在一个单位上叠加的最大次数 /// Maximum number of times the behavior can stack on a unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_MaxStackCountPerCaster=该行为可在每一个施法者的单位上叠加的最大次数 /// Maximum number of times the behavior can stack on a unit per caster
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_Modification=修改包含的是对任何拥有该行为的单位应用的一组临时改动。 /// Modifications are a set of temporary changes applied to any unit that has this behavior.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_Period=在应用该行为后的重复间隔。该行为会在每一次间隔期间执行其“周期性效果”。 /// Recurring interval that starts after the behavior is applied.  The behavior will execute its Periodic Effect each interval.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_PeriodCount=“周期性效果”可被执行的最大次数。-1 表示无限制。 /// Maximum number of times the Periodic Effect can be executed.  -1 means no limit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_PeriodicDisplayEffect=用于计算状态条中活力值的“预期变更”。（DoT或者HoT）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_PeriodicEffect=每个周期所发生的效果。 /// Effect that occurs each period.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_Player=定义哪一名玩家会控制应用了该行为的单位。 /// Determines which player will own the unit that the behavior is applied to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_RefreshEffect=当该行为被重新应用时所发生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when the behavior is reapplied
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_RemoveValidatorArray=如果这些验证器中有一个返回为假，则该行为将被移除。 /// If one of these validators returns false, the behavior will be removed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_TimeScaleSource=定义应用到该行为上时间值的刻度。如果设为全局，则将会使用当前的全局时间刻度；如果设为“目标”或“施法者”，则该行为将会使用该查询所返回单位的时间刻度。 /// Determines the scale applied to time values on this behavior.  If set to global, will use the current global time scale.  If set to Target or Caster, the behavior will use the timescale of the unit returned by that query.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_VitalRegenVitalsRemain=恢复值将按照活力值失去的总量乘以该倍率被引用到单位身上
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorBuff_VitalRegenVitalsRemainPercent=恢复值将按照活力值失去的百分比乘以该倍率被引用到单位身上
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorClickResponse_Chance=如果玩家点击了次数的“计数”数，则“计数效果”将会被执行的几率。 /// The chance that the Count Effect will be executed once the player has clicked the Count number of times.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorClickResponse_Count=触发该点击响应所需要的点击次数 /// The number of clicks needed to trigger the click response
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorClickResponse_CountDelay=玩家每次点击都会重置的计时器。如果玩家在该计时器计时结束前没有再点击，则该玩家的点击次数将重置。 /// Timer that resets every time the player clicks.  If the player does not click again before the timer expires, the player's click count is reset.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorClickResponse_CountEffect=如果玩家点击了足够的次数并且“几率”通过，则会发生的效果。 /// Effect that occurs if the player clicks enough times and the Chance passes.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorClickResponse_Relationship=玩家的点击要被注册时， 进行点击的玩家必须与该单位所具有的关系。 /// The relationship the clicking player must have with this unit for the player's clicks to be registered.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorConjoined_Radius=结合的单位要相互靠近多少距离才能共享生命值。 /// How close conjoined units have to be to each other to share health.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Birth=当具有该种行为的单位诞生时，控制菌毯会达到多大尺寸的足印。 /// The footprint that controls the size the creep will be when the unit with this behavior is birthed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Build=当具有该种行为的单位正在建造中时，控制菌毯生长尺寸的足印。 /// The footprint that controls the size the creep will be while the unit with this behavior is under construction.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Delay=菌毯开始生长前的延迟。 /// The delay before the creep starts growing.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_DisableValidatorArray=如果这些验证器中有一个返回为假，则该行为将被禁用。 /// If one of these validators returns false, the behavior will be disabled.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Grown=控制菌毯生长尺寸的足印。 /// The footprint that controls the size the creep will grow to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Period=菌毯生长的时间量。 /// Amount of time in between creep growths.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_RemoveValidatorArray=如果这些验证器中有一个返回为假，则该行为将被移除。 /// If one of these validators returns false, the behavior will be removed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorCreepSource_Start=控制游戏一开始菌毯大小的足印，如果具有该种行为的单位被预先放置。 /// The footprint that controls the size the creep will be when the game starts if the unit with this behavior is pre placed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_DurationMoveOut=在该单位可再次跳跃前所需要的时间 /// Amount of time before the unit can jump again
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_DurationPostLand=当该单位着陆后在再次移动之前所需要的时间 /// Amount of time before the unit can move after landing
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_DurationPreLaunch=该单位开始跳跃所需要的时间量 /// Amount of time it takes the unit to begin the jump
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_InitiateRangeDown=单位可跳下悬崖时距离悬崖边缘的距离 /// Distance from the edge of the cliff at which the unit will jump down
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_InitiateRangeUp=单位可跳上悬崖时距离悬崖边缘的距离 /// Distance from the edge of the cliff at which the unit will jump up
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_LandAdjustmentDown=当单位跳下悬崖落地后，单位距离悬崖边缘的距离 /// Distance from the cliff face the unit lands when it jumps down the cliff

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_MoverUp=控制单位跳上悬崖时的飞行轨迹的移动器。 /// Mover that controls the trajectory of the unit when jumping up.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_Placeholder=在跳跃过程被替换的占位符单位。 /// The placeholder unit that is substituted during the jump.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_TriggerHeightDeltaMax=可触发一次跳跃的最大高度变化。 /// The max change in height that can trigger a jump.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorJump_TriggerHeightDeltaMin=可触发一次跳跃的最小高度变化。 /// The minimum change in height that can trigger a jump.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorResource_HarvestAmount=该种资源每一趟可采集的量 /// Amount of the resource that is harvested per trip

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_Center=距离该行为的所属单位的中心的偏移。该位置点将会是“偏移”字段中定义生成偏移的中心位置。 /// Offset from the center of the owning unit of this behavior.  This position will be the center position of the spawn offsets defined in the Offset field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_DisplayDuration=此行为的倒计时出现时玩家的对齐方式 /// Alignment of Players to which this behavior's countdown appears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_Effect=当某单位孵化时所产生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when a unit spawns

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_InfoArray=关系该行为可生成的单位的参数数组 /// Array of parameters relating to units this behavior can spawn
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_Limit=如果该行为生成的单位达到了该上限，则它将不会再生成更多的单位，除非一些现有的单位被摧毁。 /// If this behavior spawns enough units to reach this limit, it will not spawn any more units until some of the existing units are destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_Offset=当某单位生成时， 它会随机从该列表中选择一个偏移量。随后， 该偏移量将被添加到“中心”字段中所定义的偏移值中。新的单位将在距离进行生成的单位的中心偏移值所指定的距离处进行生成。 /// When a unit spawns, it will randomly select an offset from this list.  This offset is then added to the offset described in the Center field.  The new unit spawns at the resultant offset from the center of the spawning unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CBehaviorSpawn_Range=进行生成的单位可在多远的距离生成新的单位。 /// Distance away from the spawning unit that a new unit can spawn.
