EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCompressor_Attack=该压缩器在音量调整中淡入所需要的时间（毫秒）。 /// Amount of time (in milliseconds) the compressor will take to fade in a volume adjustment.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCompressor_GainMakeUp=应用压缩效果后，整个信号所提升的量。 /// Amount the entire signal is boosted after the compression effect has been applied.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCompressor_Release=该压缩器在音量调整中淡出所需要的时间（毫秒）。 /// Amount of time (in milliseconds) the compressor will take to fade out a volume adjustment.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCompressor_Threshold=无论该信号何时通过了该阈等级，压缩都会被应用。 /// Compression will be applied whenever the signal surpasses this threshold level.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_AttackMs=压缩器需要多久才彻底激活（毫秒）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_DelayMs=当压缩器应激活时，它需要持续激活多长的时间才正式地应用压缩效果（毫秒）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_MakeUpGainDB=在压缩实施后的音量调整量（杜比）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_Ratio=每当音效高于ThresholdDB时，杜比等级都会下降此处指定的百分比。0.75代表按杜比下降75%（未放大）。1代表不允许其高于ThresholdDB（0-1的百分比实数）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_ReleaseMs=在压缩器处于完全激活状态时，需要多就才能将其反激活（毫秒）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPCustomCompressor_ThresholdDB=当RMS高于这一阈值，压缩器会尝试开始激活（执行“开始”），当RMS低于这一阈值时，压缩器会尝试开始反激活（执行“释放”）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPDistortion_Level=扭曲值 /// Amount of distortion
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPEcho_DecayRatio=对应原声率的回声振幅 /// Amplitude of the echoes to original sound ratio
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPEcho_Delay=原声和回声间的延迟时间 /// Delay time between the original sound and the echoes
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPEcho_DryMix=前效应音频的音量等级 /// Volume level for the pre-effect audio
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPEcho_MaxChannels=回声的最大数 /// Maximum number of echoes
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPEcho_WetMix=后效应音频的音量等级 /// Volume level for the post-effect audio
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPFlange_Depth=弗兰格效果离调的量 /// Amount the flange will detune
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPFlange_DryMix=后效应音频的音量等级 /// Volume level for the pre-effect audio
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPFlange_Rate=弗兰格效果的波动率 /// Oscillation rate for the flange
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPFlange_WetMix=后效应音频的音量等级 /// Volume level for the post-effect audio
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPHighPass_Cutoff=在指定值下方的频率会降低它们的幅度 /// Frequencies below the specified value will have their amplitude reduced
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPLowPassSimple_Cutoff=在指定值上方被移除的频率 /// Frequencies above the specified value are removed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPLowPass_Cutoff=在指定值上方的频率会降低它们的幅度 /// Frequencies above the specified value will have their amplitude reduced
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPOscillator_Rate=波动频率 /// Oscillation frequency
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPOscillator_Type=振动类型 /// Type of oscillation
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPParamEQ_Bandwidth=频率范围的大小（八音度值） /// Size of the range of frequencies (in octaves)
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPParamEQ_Center=中心频率 /// Central frequency
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CDSPParamEQ_Gain=频率范围的幅度量是增高还是降低 /// Amount the amplitude of the range of frequencies is increased or decreased
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyBehavior_Behavior=由该效果带来的行为 /// Behavior that is applied by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyBehavior_Count=该行为被该效果所应用的次数 /// Number of times the behavior is applied by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyBehavior_Duration=某些类型的行为所支持的持续时间通常在行为数据中被指定了。如果在该效果中设置“使用持续时间”标旗，则该值将会覆盖行为数据所指定的持续时间。 /// Certain types of behaviors support durations which are normally specified in the behavior data. If the Use Duration flag is set on this effect, then this value will override the duration specified by the behavior data.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyBehavior_KillHallucination=当开启时， 该效果将击杀幻像。 /// When on, the effect kills hallucinations.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyBehavior_WhichUnit=该效果将该行为应用至的目标 /// Target to which the effect applies the behavior
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyForce_Amount=被该效果应用的力值。负值会将单位拖入效果中心点。 /// Amount of force that is applied by the effect. Negative values draw units into the epicenter of the effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyForce_MassFraction=定义修改被请求的力值时，被影响的单位有多少质量应该纳入考虑。1表示单位的质量会产生正常惯性。0表示在计算应用的力时，质量被忽略。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyForce_TimeScaleSource=定义乘以力的时间基准。 /// Determines the time reference to multiply the force by. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyForce_WhichLocation=效果发生的位置 /// Location where the effect occurs
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyForce_WhichUnit=指定效果树中的哪个单位来对其应用力。 /// Specifies which unit in the effect tree to apply the force to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectApplyKinetic_ImpactUnit=被应用该动能的单位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCancelOrder_AbilCmd=如果设置，该效果将只会取消有匹配技能命令的指令。 /// If set, this effect will only cancel orders that have a matching ability command.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCancelOrder_Count=负责定义要取消多少个指令。 /// Determines how many orders to cancel.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCancelOrder_WhichUnit=指定效果树中的哪个单位来对其取消指令。 /// Specifies which unit in the effect tree to cancel orders for.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_DrainResourceCostFactor=应用于目标单位的“修理资源”值的倍数，是用于定义修理所需要的资源费用 /// Multiplier applied to the target unit's Repair Resource values to determine resource cost for healing
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_DrainVital=治疗目标从施法者身上抽取的活力类型 /// The type of vital drained from the caster to heal the target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_DrainVitalCostFactor=施法者消耗自身活力值治疗目标活力值的消耗率 /// Cost ratio of caster vital consumed to target vital healed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_Flags=该效果的标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_ImpactUnit=是该效果的目标的单位 /// The unit that is the target of this effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_LaunchUnit=指定哪个单位花费活力值（如果适用）来治疗轰击单位（即目标）。 /// Specifies which unit spends vitals (if applicable) to heal the impact unit (aka the target).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_PeriodicEffect=每一跳执行的效果 /// Effect that executes each tick
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_PeriodicValidator=每一跳运行的验证器 /// Validator that is run each tick
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_RechargeVital=目标被治疗的活力类型 /// Type of vital that is healed on the target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_RechargeVitalRate=每一跳可治疗目标的活力值 /// Amount of vital that can be healed to the target each tick
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateHealer_TimeFactor=该值为目标单位“修理时间”的倍数。 如果该结果值非零，则该值将是完全治愈一个单位所需要的时间；如果该结果值为零，则将被治疗的目标会按“每秒恢复活力率”进行恢复。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_AINotifyEffect=这可以用来警示AI当心一个区域效果，可帮助AI避开敌对区域并且优先选择友方区域。 /// This can be used to alert the AI of an area of effect to help it avoid hostile areas and prefer friendly areas.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_DetectFilters=如果该效果的“暴露范围”是非零的，那么该字段负责配置哪些单位会被探测到。 /// If the Reveal Radius for this effect is non-zero then this field configures what units are detected.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_EffectRandMode=当RandomEffect标旗激活时，该值将指定随机方式。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_ExpireDelay=周期性持续时间结束后所发生的延迟 /// Delay that occurs after the periodic durations
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_ExpireEffect=持续性效果结束后所运行的效果 /// Effect that runs if the persistent effect expires
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_ExpireOffset=“结束效果”的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the Expire Effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_FinalEffect=持续性效果被摧毁时所运行的效果，不管其结束与否 /// Effect that runs when the persistent effect is destroyed, regardless of whether it expired or not
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_FinalOffset=“最终效果”的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the Final Effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_Flags=该效果的标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_HeightMap=如果该效果的“暴露范围”是非零的，那么该字段则负责配置暴露发生的高度图。如果暴露发生在空中高度图，则视线被忽略。 /// If the Reveal Radius for this effect is non-zero then this field configures what height map the reveal occurs on. If the reveal happens on the air height map then line of sight is ignored.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_InitialDelay=该效果被创建时所发生的延迟。 /// Delay that occurs when the effect is created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_InitialEffect=起始延迟之后所运行的效果 /// Effect that runs after the Initial Delay
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_InitialOffset=“起始效果”的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the Initial Effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_OffsetFacingFallback=如果开始和结束其中一个或两者都无效时，在计算关联开始和结束偏移矢量的生成效果时，指定要使用的备用单位。 /// Specifies a fallback unit to use when calculating the offset of spawned effects relative to the start and end offset vectors if one or both of them is invalid.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_OffsetRandMode=当RandomEffect标旗激活时，该值将指定随机方式。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_OffsetVectorEndLocation=与“偏移矢量开始位置”结合使用，来对子类效果在被执行时将会“运行”的方向。“结束位置”是效果将从“开始位置”前往的最远处的位置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_OffsetVectorStartLocation=与“偏移矢量结束位置”结合使用，来对子类效果在被执行时将会“运行”的方向进行设置。“开始位置”通常不是施法者就是目标位置，主要视使用该效果的技能是否合理为准。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodCount=时段数 /// Number of periods
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodRandMode=当RandomEffect标旗激活时，该值将指定随机方式。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodicEffectArray=当一个时段结束时所运行的效果 /// Effects that will run when a period ends
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodicOffsetArray=周期性效果的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the periodic effects
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodicPeriodArray=指定执行每个周期性效果之间的时间长度。若效果的周期计数超过该数组中条目的数量，则效果将会重新循环并按序重复条目，直到达到周期计数。 /// Specifies the length of time between executing each periodic effect. Effects with a period count that exceeds the number of entries in this array will loop back and repeat the entries in order until the period count has been reached.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_PeriodicValidator=会进行周期性检查的验证器。如果该验证器未通过检查，则持续性效果将被取消 /// Validator that will be checked periodically.  If this validator fails, the persistent effect will be destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RadarFilters=如果该效果的“暴露范围”是非零的，那么该字段负责配置哪些单位在战场迷雾下会显示为雷达光斑。 /// If the Reveal Radius for this effect is non-zero then this field configures what units appear as radar blips under the fog of war.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealArc=用于扇形开图器，指定被揭示的扇形的圆心角。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealFacing=用于扇形和矩形开图器
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealFlags=直线视野检测仅支持圆形开图器。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealRadius=用于扇形开图器类型，决定扇形的半径。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealRectangleHeight=用于矩形开图器，定义矩形的高。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_RevealRectangleWidth=用于矩形开图器，定义矩形的宽。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_TimeScaleSource=指定在效果更新时，用于跟踪时间进程的单位。 /// Specifies the unit to use to track the progress of time while the effect updates.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreatePersistent_WhichLocation=效果发生的位置 /// Location where the effect occurs
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_CreateFlags=效果标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_Origin=创建单位所在的起源位置。 /// Origin position at which to create a unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_RallyUnit=识别单位，其集结指令被复制并发出给被创建的单位。 /// Identifies a unit whose rally instructions are copied and issued to the created unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SelectUnit=如果该字段以一个单位为标准并且该单位被选取，那么新建的单位也会被选中。创建的单位可能也会被添加到控制组中，如果“选择队伍编组”创建标旗被设置了的话。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnCount=生成的单位数量 /// Number of units spawned
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnEffect=在每个被生成的单位上所运行的效果 /// Effect that runs on each of the spawned units
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnOffset=指定一组与效果位置（由“哪一个位置”字段指定） 相关联的X、Y偏移。效果将使用单位可距离其生成的最近偏移，来对新单位被创建时对其进行定位。 /// Specifies a set of X,Y offsets relative to the effect location (specified by the Which Location field). The effect will use the closest offset that the unit can be spawned from to position the new unit when it is created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnOwner=被生成单位的所有者 /// Owner of the spawned unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnRange=单位可被创建的距离该效果的最远距离。 /// Maximum distance away from the effect that a unit can be created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_SpawnUnit=进行生成的单位 /// Unit that spawns
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_TypeFallbackUnit=如果“生成单位”不是安置的，那么该字段可以指定在效果树状图中另一个其类型将被用于创建新单位的单位。 /// If the Spawn Unit is not setup, this field may specify another unit in the effect tree whose type will be used to create the new unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectCreateUnit_WhichLocation=效果发生的位置 /// Location where the effect occurs
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Amount=由该效果造成的伤害值 /// Amount of damage dealt by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_AreaArray=用于生成溅射伤害效果的效果区域值 /// Area of effect values used to make splash damage effects
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_AreaRelativeOffset=AreaArray会按照这一坐标值调整相对位置。朝向为0代表朝南，既(0,-1)，因此在朝向为0时，相对偏移(0,-1)代表搜索会向南移动一个单位，而朝东时则代表向东一个单位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ArmorReduction=1点护甲从该效果移除的伤害值 /// Amount of damage that 1 point of armor removes from the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_AttributeBonus=每一点单位属性的伤害修正符 /// Damage modifiers per unit attribute
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_AttributeFactor=每一点单位属性的百分比伤害修正符 /// Percentage damage modifiers per unit attribute
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_AttributeForced=如果一个属性被强制，则比例化、因数或未按比例化的量可能促成最佳或最差伤害。 /// If an attribute is forced then the scaled, factor, or unscaled amounts may contribute towards the best/worst damage.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Death=单位被该效果杀死时所播放的死亡动画类型 /// Death animation type that plays for a unit killed by this effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ExcludeArray=不包括搜索区域内的单位 /// Excludes units from the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Flags=该效果的标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ImpactLocation=配置该效果的中心点将位于何处 /// Configures where the epicenter of the effect will be
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ImpactUnitValidator=轰击单位只会在这些验证器通过时被伤害，否则轰击单位只会作为攻击的位置点。轰击单位仍然可能会求救（如果被请求），即便这些验证器未通过。 /// The impact unit will only be damaged if these validators pass; otherwise it is just used as the location of the attack. It may still call for help (if requested) even if the validator fails.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_IncludeArray=包括搜索区域内的单位 /// Includes units in the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_KillHallucination=当开启时， 该效果将击杀幻像。 /// When on, the effect kills hallucinations.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Kind=伤害类型 /// Type of damage
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_KindSplash=溅射伤害是指对不是攻击主焦点（即轰击位置） 的邻近单位造成的伤害。该字段定义可造成溅射伤害的伤害种类。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_LaunchLocation=发射位置可被用来指定一个轰击角度，从而当进行弧形区比较时指定效果使用的方位。 /// The launch location can be used to specify an angle of impact and therefore the direction the effect uses when doing arc comparisons.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_LeechFraction=识别对目标造成的伤害有多少被转换成攻击者的单个活力类型。 /// Identifies how much of the damage dealt to the target is converted into each vital type for the attacker.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_MaxCount=该效果可以作用的目标单位最大数 /// Maximum number of units the effect can target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_MinCount=该效果必须选其作为目标的最小单位数 /// Minimum number of units the effect must target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_MinCountError=如果该效果无法获得所需目标数的最小数则会出现的错误。 /// Error that plays if the effect cannot get the minimum required number of targets
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Random=指定一个随机范围内的值添加至固定伤害量。 /// Specifies a random range of values to be added to the fixed damage amount.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_RecycleCount=如果指定，当可用目标数量少于该数值时，将会重新对区域内的单位造成伤害。 /// If specified, it will re-damage units in an area when there are fewer targets than this number available.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_RevealerParams=基于该效果的AreaArray指定创建开图器时特定参数。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_SearchFilters=定义何种目标可以被搜索 /// Determines what targets are valid for the search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_SearchFlags=搜索区域的标旗 /// Flags for the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ShieldBonus=护盾伤害修正符 /// Shield damage modifier
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_ShieldFactor=百分比护盾伤害修正符 /// Percentage shield damage modifier
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_TargetSorts=定义该效果如何优选选择潜在的目标。 /// Determines how the effect prioritizes potential targets.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Total=定义该效果如何抵消不同属性所提供的伤害加成 /// Determines how the effect reconciles damage bonuses to different attributes
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_Visibility=该效果会暴露攻击中的单位还是进留下快照
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalBonus=指定一个平值伤害来按照活力类型造成伤害。如果当前活力值少于该量值，那么将使用当前活力值。 /// Specifies a flat amount of damage to deal per vital type. If the current vitals are less than this amount, then they are used instead.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalBonusRandom=0到该值之间的一个随机数会额外附加到VitalBonus上。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalFractionCurrent=指定一个量值，该值将被单位的当前活力值相乘，可作为伤害。如果当前活力值少于该量值，那么将使用当前活力值。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalFractionCurrentRandom=0到该值之间的一个随机数会额外附加到VitalFractionCurrent上。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalFractionMax=指定一个量值，该值将被单位的最大活力值相乘，可作为伤害。如果当前活力值少于该量值，那么将使用当前活力值。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDamage_VitalFractionMaxRandom=0到该值之间的一个随机数会额外附加到VitalFractionMax上。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyHealer_Count=有多少匹配所请求参数的治疗者对象被摧毁。 /// How many healer objects that match the requested parameters are destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyHealer_Effect=如果指定，该效果将只会摧毁由被请求效果所创建的治疗者对象。 /// If specified, this effect will only destroy healer objects created by the requested effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyHealer_Radius=治疗效果的搜索区域半径。治疗效果半径在执行范围检查时同样会被纳入考量。 /// The radius of the area to search for healer effects. The healer effect radius is also taken into consideration when performing the range check.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyHealer_WhichLocation=指定寻找治疗者效果进行摧毁的地点。 /// Specifies where to look for healer effects to destroy.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyPersistent_Count=有多少匹配所请求参数的持续性对象被摧毁。 /// How many persistent objects that match the requested parameters are destroyed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyPersistent_Effect=如果指定，该效果将只会摧毁由被请求效果所创建的持续性对象。 /// If specified, this effect will only destroy persistent objects created by the requested effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyPersistent_Radius=持续性效果的搜索区域半径。 /// The radius of the area to search for persistent effects. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectDestroyPersistent_WhichLocation=指定寻找可持续性对象进行摧毁的地点。 /// Specifies where to look for persistent objects to destroy.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_AreaArray=效果的区域参数 /// Area parameters for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_AreaRelativeOffset=AreaArray会按照这一坐标值调整相对位置。朝向为0代表朝南，既(0,-1)，因此在朝向为0时，相对偏移(0,-1)代表搜索会向南移动一个单位，而朝东时则代表向东一个单位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_ExcludeArray=不包括搜索区域内的单位 /// Excludes units from the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_ImpactLocation=配置该效果的中心点将位于何处 /// Configures where the epicenter of the effect will be
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_IncludeArray=包括搜索区域内的单位 /// Includes units in the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_LaunchLocation=指定搜索源。这会形成一个方向，朝向与所有弧形区测试相关联的“轰击位置”。 /// Specifies the origin of a search. This forms a direction towards the Impact Location that all Arc tests will be relative to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_MaxCount=该效果可选其作为目标的最大单位数 /// Maximum number of units the effect can target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_MinCount=该效果必须选其作为目标的最小单位数 /// Minimum number of units the effect must target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_MinCountError=如果该效果无法获得所需目标数的最小数则会出现的错误。 /// Error that plays if the effect cannot get the minimum required number of targets
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_RecycleCount=如果被请求的单位数量未被找到，则多数单位将会被“循环利用”并且不断地枚举产生直到所需条件被满足。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_RevealerParams=基于该效果的AreaArray指定创建开图器时特定参数。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_SearchFilters=定义何种目标可以被搜索 /// Determines what targets are valid for the search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_SearchFlags=搜索区域的标旗 /// Flags for the area search
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumArea_TargetSorts=定义该效果如何优选选择潜在的目标。 /// Determines how the effect prioritizes potential targets.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumMagazine_EffectExternal=指定一个效果，对所有外部弹药进行应用，特指由通过被请求的搜索筛选的装填弹仓技能控制的外部弹药（例如航母发射的拦截机或者护卫巢虫领主的巢虫）。 /// Specifies an effect to apply to all external ammo (like Interceptors launched by a Carrier or Broodlings escorting a Brood Lord) managed by an arm magazine ability that pass the requested Search Filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumMagazine_EffectInternal=指定一个效果，对所有内部弹药进行应用，特指由通过被请求的搜索筛选的装填弹仓技能控制的弹药（例如航母内部中的拦截机）。 /// Specifies an effect to apply to all internal ammo (like Interceptors inside a Carrier) managed by an arm magazine ability that pass the requested Search Filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumMagazine_MaxCount=指定对被请求的内部以及外部效果应用的弹药单位的最大数。如果该值为0，那么效果将对所有通过“搜索筛选”的弹药单位进行应用。 /// Specifies the maximum number of ammo units to apply the requested internal and external effects to. If this value is 0 then the effect will apply to all ammo units that pass the Search Filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumMagazine_SearchFilters=指定一套所需条件和排除条件来对弹仓中的每一个单位应用。只有通过筛选条件的单位才会被应用效果。 /// Specifies a set of requirements and exclusions to apply against each unit in a magazine. Only units that pass the filters will have effects applied to them.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumMagazine_WhichUnit=指定一套所需条件和排除条件来对弹仓中的每一个单位应用。只有通过筛选条件的单位才会被应用效果。 /// Specifies a set of requirements and exclusions to apply against each unit in a magazine. Only units that pass the filters will have effects applied to them.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumTransport_CheckOuter=对任何包含“哪一个单位”的单位执行搜索的请求。如果你有一个效果附着到地堡中的陆战队员，但你想找到同一个地堡中的其它单位，而你又无法轻易地找到这个地堡时（即陆战队员的容器或外部单位），在这种情况下这种请求就十分有用。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumTransport_Effect=指定一个效果，对所有单位进行执行，特指那些符合被请求的搜索筛选条件的装载体中的单位。 /// Specifies an effect to execute on all units in the transport that match the requested Search Filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumTransport_MaxCount=指定对其应用效果的单位最大数。如果该值为0，那么效果将对装载体中所有通过“搜索筛选”的单位进行应用。 /// Specifies the maximum number of units to apply the effect to. If this value is 0 then the effect will apply to all units in the transport that pass the Search Filters.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumTransport_SearchFilters=指定一套所需条件和排除条件来对装载体中的每一个单位应用。只有通过筛选条件的单位才会被应用效果。 /// Specifies a set of requirements and exclusions to apply against each unit in a transport. Only units that pass the filters will have effects applied to them.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectEnumTransport_WhichUnit=指定要搜索的装载体或乘客。如果你指定一个乘客，务必使“检查外部”字段同样也启用了该效果，以便其能在包含初始乘客的装载体中找到其它单位。 /// Specifies the transport or passenger to search. If you specify a passenger, make sure that the Check Outer field is also enabled on this effect so it can find other units in the transport that contains the initial passenger.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_Abil=命令该目标单位使用的技能 /// Ability the target unit is ordered to use
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_AbilCmdIndex=目标单位被命令使用的技能命令索引 /// Ability command index the target unit is ordered to use
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_CmdFlags=该效果的标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_Player=指定应发出被请求指令的玩家，即用于检查玩家是否被允许发出所谓指令（由于共享控制、资源等等） 的指令。如果未指定玩家，则忽略结盟状态。 /// Specifies the player that should issue the requested order which is useful for checking whether that player is allowed to issue that order (due to shared control, resources, etc). If a player is not specified then the alliance states are ignored.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_Target=用于配置该技能将以什么为目标 /// Used to configure what the target of the ability will be
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectIssueOrder_WhichUnit=用于配置接受该指令的单位 /// Used to configure which unit receives the order
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_AmmoLife=发射物生命点数 /// Missile hit points
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_AmmoUnit=将被发射的投射物单位链接 /// Link to the projectile unit that will be launched
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_DeathType=发射物的死亡类型 /// The death type for the missile
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_FinishEffect=指定一个效果，该效果无论发射物是否轰击到被请求的目标都将执行。这对于清理当发射的发射物无论是否命中目标都已不存在时所创建的任何效果非常有用。 /// Specifies an effect that will be executed regardless of whether the missile impacts on its requested target or not. Useful to clean up anything that might have been created when the missile launched that should no longer exist regardless of whether it hit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_Flags=效果标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ImpactEffect=当发射物击中其目标时所产生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when the missile hits its target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ImpactLocation=发射物的目标 /// The target of the missile
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ImpactOffset=发射物轰击位置的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the missile impact location
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ImpactRange=发射物要靠近目标多近时才会触发轰击效果 /// The distance from the missile's target that will trigger impact
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_LaunchEffect=当发射物被发射时所产生的效果 /// Effect that occurs when the missile is launched
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_LaunchLocation=发射物源 /// The source of the missile
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_LaunchOffset=发射物发射位置的偏移坐标 /// Offset coordinates for the missile launch location
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_Movers=用于指定每一射程的自定义发射物移动器 /// Used to assign custom missile movers per range
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_PlaceholderUnit=指定将在发射物的目标位置创建的占位符图片的类型。当发射物结束飞行时（无论其轰击命中目标与否），它都将被摧毁。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_PlacementRange=仅在如果该效果设置了“替换”标旗时使用。指定一个半径，在将被放置的“弹药单位”的着弹点的轰击位置周围进行搜索。通常情况下你也会将“死亡”类型设置为“无”从而禁用“弹药单位”在发射物飞行结束时死亡。 /// Only used if the Placement flag is set on this effect. Specifies a radius to search around the Impact Location for a valid spot for the Ammo Unit to be placed. Typically you would also want to set the Death type to None to disable the Ammo Unit from dying when the missile is done traveling.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_RetargetFilters=仅在如果该效果设置了“重选目标”标旗时使用。当发射物目标成为无效时，对邻近单位指定一套所需条件和排除条件以找到一个新的目标。“重选目标范围”字段负责指定距离发射物的当前位置多远的距离进行搜索。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_RetargetRange=仅在如果该效果设置了“重选目标”标旗时使用。在发射物的当前位置周围指定一个半径进行搜索。仅有通过“重选目标筛选器”的单位会被考虑重新选择目标。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ReturnDelay=触须类发射物的返回延迟。 /// Return delay for tentacle type missiles.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_ReturnMovers=用于指定每一射程的自定义发射物移动器。用于触须类发射物。 /// Used to assign custom missile movers per range.  Used on tentacle type missiles.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_TransferBehavior=指定将被转移到发射物并在轰击时对单位应用的行为类型。该行为会在发射物被发射时从“发射单位”里移除。 /// Specifies the type of behavior to be transferred onto the missile and applied onto a unit on impact. This behavior is removed from the Launch Unit when the missile is fired.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_TransferCount=指定被“转移行为”请求的可被该发射物转移的叠加计数。 /// Specifies the stack count of the requested by the Transfer Behavior that can be transferred by this missile.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectLaunchMissile_Visibility=如果“可见性”被设为“快照”并且“轰击单位”对效果源是敌对的，那么“单位攻击者”演算体消息将被发送给“轰击单位”，该消息被用来使攻击者暴露一小段时间，在这段时间内攻击者可以被技能选中进行，但是玩家必须要有视野才能进行还击。如果“可见性”被设为“可见”，那么开图器将被附着给攻击者，从而在一小段时间内给“轰击单位”及其盟友赋予其完整的视野。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyPlayer_Cost=指定资源、冷却以及或者充能对被请求的玩家应用。这个可以在你没有技能可以指定并且无法花费这些值的情况下使用。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyPlayer_Resources=指定一定量的资源，赋予被请求的玩家。 /// Specifies an amount of resources to grant to the requested player.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyPlayer_ResourcesCollected=指定一定量的资源，视为已由被请求的玩家所收集。 /// Specifies an amount of resources to consider collected by the requested player.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyPlayer_WhichPlayer=指定哪个玩家将会被效果修改。 /// Specifies which player should be modified by this effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_CopyOrderCount=指定“发射单位”的多少个指令被复制给“轰击单位”。“轰击单位”的指令被清除（不过在完成之前，类似“变形”等不可能打断的指令可能会保留）。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_CopyRallyCount=指定有多少个集结点位置从“发射单位”复制到“轰击单位”。 /// Specifies how many rally point locations are copied from the Launch Unit to the Impact Unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_Cost=指定一定量的资源、冷却、充能以及或者活力值应用于被请求的“轰击单位”。这个可以在你没有技能可以指定并且无法花费这些值的情况下使用。 /// Specifies an amount of resources, cooldowns, charges, and/or vitals that will be applied to the requested Impact Unit. This can be used in situations where you may not have an ability available to specify and spend these amounts.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_Height=高度修改 /// Height modification
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_HeightTime=混合高度修改所需要的时间量 /// Amount of time it takes to blend the height modification
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ImpactUnit=作为该类效果的目标的单位 /// The unit that is the target of this effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_KillCreditUnit=如果该字段指向一个对“轰击单位”有敌意的有效单位，其将提高一点“轰击单位”的击杀数，并对行为发出一个击杀得分通知。 /// If this field points to a valid unit hostile to the Impact Unit, it will increase the kill count on the Impact Unit by one and dispatch a kill credit notification to behaviors.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_KillHallucination=启用时，该效果击杀幻像。 /// When enabled, the effect kills hallucinations.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_LaunchUnit=指定单位复制老兵行为、击杀数以及活力值（如果被请求），模拟（如果被请求），复制指令于（如果被请求），复制集结点（如果被请求），以及要为其修改资源的玩家（如果被请求）。 /// Specifies the unit to copy veterancy, kills, and vitals (if requested), mimic (if requested), copy orders from (if requested), copy rally points from (if requested), and the player to modify resources for (if requested).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ModifyFlags=效果的标旗 /// Flags for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ModifyOwnerPlayer=指定要将“轰击单位”的所有者转移至的玩家。如果设置为“未知”则忽略。 /// Specifies a player to transfer the ownership of the Impact Unit to. If set to Unknown this is ignored.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ResourceRestoreBonus=指定一个平值奖励来添加到资源，无视资源容量。该值会被统计到“资源恢复系数”结果中。 /// Specifies a flat bonus amount to add to a resource regardless of its capacity. This will be added to the Resource Restore Fraction result.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ResourceRestoreFraction=指定一个系数，该值将被资源的容量相乘。这会被算入“资源恢复奖励”中。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_Resources=如果“发射单位”拥有资源行为，指定一定量的资源来从“发射单位”处采集。 /// Specifies an amount of resources to harvest from the Launch Unit if it has a resource behavior.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ResourcesHarvestedBonus=指定一个奖励资源量，该值会被添加到另一个值中，即对“资源行为”和“资源采集系数”结果指定的资源求根得到的值。 /// Specifies an amount of bonus resources added to any amount extracted from the resource specified by the Resources behavior and the Resources Harvested Fraction result.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_ResourcesHarvestedFraction=指定一个量值，该值将被分离出的量值相乘，作为已采集的奖励资源量。该量值会被算入“资源采集奖励”。 /// Specifies an amount that is multiplied by the amount extracted to grant as a bonus amount of resources harvested. This amount is added to the Resources Harvested Bonus.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_SalvageFactor=仅在如果该效果设置了“回收”标旗时应用。指定单位消耗倍数来定义能提供的返还资金有多少。 /// Only applies if the Salvage flag is set on this effect. Specifies the unit cost multiplier to determine how much of a refund is provided.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_SelectTransferUnit=假如该单位已被选中，则将选择状态转换到目标单位。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_SpawnCount=如果“轰击单位”有一个“生成”行为，则被生成的单位数量将会由该数量进行调整。 /// If the Impact Unit has a Spawn behavior, the number of spawned units will be adjusted by this amount.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_VeterancyBehavior=指定赋予或复制（假如“复制”标旗被勾选）经验值的目标老兵行为。若不指定，则使用第一个老兵行为。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_VitalArray=活力修正符 /// Vital modifiers
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectModifyUnit_XP=经验点数修正符 /// Experience points modifier
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRedirectMissile_ImpactFilters=当在轰击位置附近搜索单位时，指定一套所需条件和排除条件来对被请求的发射物进行重新导向。 /// Specifies a set of requirements and exclusions when searching units near the Impact Location to redirect the requested missile to.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRedirectMissile_ImpactLocation=指定单位的搜索区域以对发射物进行重新导向。在该位置的单位必须通过“轰击过滤器”才能被认定为有效目标。 /// Specifies the area to search for units to redirect the missile to. Units at that location must pass the Impact Filters to be considered a valid target.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRedirectMissile_WhichUnit=指定哪个发射物将会被重新导向至轰击位置。 /// Specifies which missile will be redirected towards the Impact Location.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectReleaseMagazine_WhichUnit=指定哪个弹药单位将会从一个装填弹仓技能的控制中被释放出。这主要是用于巢虫领主的巢虫护卫，一旦它们朝某个目标发射出时，它们将不再被巢虫领主所控制。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_BehaviorAlignment=该效果将移除这个对齐中的指定数量的行为 /// This effect will remove the specified number of behaviors that are of this alignment.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_BehaviorCategories=被效果移除的行为的类型 /// Types of behavior that are removed by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_BehaviorClass=被该效果移除的行为分类 /// Classes of behavior that are removed by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_BehaviorLink=被该效果移除的指定行为 /// Specific behavior that is removed by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_Count=被效果移除的行为的数量。0代表移除所有符合条件的行为。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_KillHallucination=启用时，该效果将杀死幻像。 /// When enabled, the effect kills hallucinations.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectRemoveBehavior_WhichUnit=用于配置可作为该效果目标的单位 /// Used to configure which unit is the target of this effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectReturnMagazine_WhichUnit=指定哪个弹药单位将会被送回其弹仓中。这可在你想强制拦截机返回航母内部时使用。 /// Specifies which ammo unit will be sent back inside its magazine. This would be used if you wanted to force Interceptors to return inside the Carrier.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSet_EffectArray=当执行该集效果时所执行的效果列表 /// List of effects that are executed when the set effect is executed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSet_MaxCount=指定要执行的子类效果最大数。和“最小计数”使用。 /// Specifies a maximum number of child effects to be executed. Used with the Min Count.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSet_MinCount=指定要执行的子类效果最小数。和“最大计数”使用。 /// Specifies a minimum number of child effects to be executed. Used with the Max Count.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSet_Random=指定子类效果在被执行前以随机顺序打乱。 /// Specifies that the child effects are shuffled in a random order before being executed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSet_TargetLocationType=指定在和技能使用时该效果拥有的目标瞄准所需条件的类型。如果设为“未知”（默认），那么其将以子类效果的所需条件类型为准。 /// Specifies the type of targeting requirement this effect has when used with an ability. If set to Unknown (the default), then it will try to determine that requirement from the child effects.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSwitch_CaseArray=切换逻辑 /// Switch logic
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSwitch_CaseDefault=如果其它所有case都无法被满足时所运行的默认效果 /// Default effect that is run if all other cases cannot be met
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectSwitch_TargetLocationType=指定在和技能使用时该效果拥有的目标瞄准所需条件的类型。如果设为“未知”（默认），那么其将以子类效果的所需条件类型为准。 /// Specifies the type of targeting requirement this effect has when used with an ability. If set to Unknown (the default), then it will try to determine that requirement from the child effects.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_ClearQueuedOrders=当启用后，该效果将从单位的指令队列中清空该单位先前所接收到的所有指令 /// When enabled, the effect clears all previous orders from the unit's order queue
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_MinDistance=指定传送可允许的最小距离。帮助避免对无法使你靠近你目标一个合理的距离的传送浪费能量或冷却。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_PlacementArc=仅在如果“放置区范围”少于363时使用。在进行传送的单位周围指定一个弧形区，将尝试搜索寻找一个有效的位置。 /// Only used if the Placement Range is less than 363. Specifies an arc around the teleporting unit that it will attempt to search to find a valid location.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_PlacementAround=仅在如果“放置区范围”少于363时使用。指定一个位置来为进行传送的单位进行放置测试。 /// Only used if the Placement Range is less than 363. Specifies a location to do placement tests for the teleporting unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_PlacementRange=如果目标点无效，则具有传送能力的单位可以传送到距离目标多远的距离 /// The range from the target point that a teleporting unit can be placed if the target point is invalid
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_Range=传送距离 /// Teleport range
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_SourceLocation=指定传送源。这通常会在你想要执行一个相对传送时（例如召回） 使用。进行传送的单位与位置相关联的偏移会被视为与目的点尽可能的接近。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_TargetLocation=用于配置传送的目标位置 /// Used to configure the target location for the teleport
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTeleport_WhichUnit=用于配置会传送的单位 /// Used to configure which unit will teleport
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_Behavior=由该效果转移的行为 /// Behavior that is transferred by the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_Copy=当启用后，该行为将被复制而非移除。 /// When enabled, the behavior will be copied rather than moved
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_Count=要转换的行为数（对于可叠加的行为） /// Number of behaviors to transfer (for stackable behaviors)
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_ImpactUnit=用于配置接收该行为的单位 /// Used to configure which unit will receive the behavior
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_LaunchUnit=用于配置将是该行为源的单位 /// Used to configure which unit will be the source of the behavior
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectTransferBehavior_Preserve=定义行为是被转移或克隆（例如原始单位的左边）。 /// Determines whether the behavior is transferred or cloned (i.e. left on the original unit).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseCalldown_CalldownCount=指定该效果使用多少个呼叫打击。如果被请求的数量多于可用数量，则效果只会能找到多少用多少。 /// Specifies how many calldowns are used by this effect. Note that if more are requested than are available it will simply use as many as it can find.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseCalldown_CalldownEffect=指定管理呼叫打击的技能（比如“装填弹仓”或“装载”技能） 的呼叫打击效果必须匹配该值，否则将不使用。一旦从“装填弹仓”或“装载”技能中分离出并被移动到“哪一个位置”时，该效果同样也会在呼叫打击单位的位置处执行。 /// Specifies that the calldown effect of an ability that manages calldowns (like an Arm Magazine or Transport ability) must match this value, otherwise it is not used. This effect is also executed at the location of the calldown unit once it is extracted from the Arm Magazine or Transport ability and moved to Which Location.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseCalldown_WhichLocation=指定使用呼叫打击时其会移动至的位置。 /// Specifies the location that the calldown will be moved to when used.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseMagazine_AmmoEffect=指定一个效果，对被该效果使用的弹药单位执行。 /// Specifies an effect to execute on the ammo used by this effect.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseMagazine_MagazineAbil=指定一个明确的“装填弹仓”技能来使用其中的弹药，如果不指定，它将在已启动的“装填弹仓”技能中循环切换，并从第一个能发射的技能中使用一个弹药。 /// Specifies an explicit Arm Magazine ability to use ammo from. If not specified, it will cycle through the activated Arm Magazine abilities and use one ammo from the first one capable of launching.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffectUseMagazine_WhichUnit=指定从哪个单位中使用弹药。这应该是一个具有”装填弹仓“技能的单位，比如航母或巢虫领主。 /// Specifies which unit to use ammo from. This should be a unit with an Arm Magazine ability like a Carrier or Brood Lord.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_AINotifyFlags=当执行该效果时发送给AI的通知 /// Notifications sent to the AI when the effect is executed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_Alert=指定当效果被执行时产生的警示信息。警示信息在游戏内界面的左侧显示。 /// Specifies the alert to generate when the effect is executed. Alerts are displayed on the left side of the in-game UI.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_Chance=指定该效果将被执行的几率（0和1之间）。0表示永远不会被执行；1（默认）即表示始终会执行。 /// Specifies the odds (between 0 and 1) that this effect will actually get executed. A chance of 0 means it will never execute; a chance of 1 (the default) means it will always execute.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_Marker=指定该效果的验证器使用的标记。标记通常用于分散一个玩家的多个单位对区域中所有敌人单位使用的效果。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_TechAliasArray=识别备选名称（即别名），允许所有拥有相同别名的效果在所需条件检查中被视为同等物。 /// Identifies alternate names (known as aliases) that allow all effects with the same alias to be treated as equivalent in requirement checks.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CEffect_ValidatorArray=效果验证器 /// Validators for the effect
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CFoW_Color=战场迷雾颜色 /// Color of the fog of war
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CFootprint_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CFootprint_Layers=足印有3层:路径（影响单位的路径），放置区应用（定义应用至单元格的是何种放置标旗），以及放置区检查（定义 当具有该种足印的单位被放置时，单元格的放置区标旗所需条件） /// Footprints have 3 layers: Pathing (affects unit pathing), Placement Apply (determines what placement flags are applied to cells), and Placement Check (determines placement flag requirements for cells when a unit with this footprint is being placed)
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CFootprint_Shape=脚印形状。 /// The shape of a footprint.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_BehaviorBorderColors=行为图标在每种对齐方式下的图标边缘颜色 /// Colors for the borders of behavior icons per alignment
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_BehaviorIconColors=行为图标在每种对齐方式下的染色颜色 /// Tint colors for behavior icons per alignment
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_CancelPlacementModeButtonFace=当一单位处于放置模式时，在命令面板右下方显示的按钮 /// Button that appears in the bottom right of the command card when a unit is in placement mode
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_CancelTargetModeButtonFace=当一单位处于目标模式时，在命令面板右下方显示的按钮 /// Button that appears in the bottom right of the command card when a unit is in target mode
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_CostDisplayColor=费用悬浮文字的颜色 /// Color of cost floating text

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_CostDisplayHeight=费用悬浮文本的尺寸。 /// Size of the cost floating text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_CostDisplaySpeed=费用的悬浮文本的滚动速度 /// Scroll speed for the cost floating text
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_InfoColorBuffed=获得暂时性增益时状态的鼠标提示文本颜色
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_InfoColorDebuffed=获得暂时性减益时状态的鼠标提示文本颜色

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CGameUI_MinimapData=微缩地图配置参数 /// Minimap configuration parameters

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_Flags=为该模型设置不同属性 /// Sets different properties for the model
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_FuzzyGeometryPadding=会被添加到所有模糊集合体碰撞形状上的附加范围。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_LowQualityModel=该模型在低画质设定下所使用的较低品质的版本。 /// Lower quality version of the model that is used when graphical settings are set to low.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_Model=模型的模型文件 /// Model file for the model
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_Occlusion=如果该域设置为“隐藏”，那么如果该模型身后存在某个被设为“显示”的模型，则该模型将变为半透明状。 /// If this field is set to Hide, then this model will become translucent if there is a model behind it with this field set to Show.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_RadiusLoose=如果该值非0， 它将覆盖在正常情况下从模型文件查询到的数据。此范围将围绕该模型创建一个虚拟的球体。只有当虚拟的球体处于镜头的视场中时， 该模型才会更新其自身状态。该值通常需要比该模型的实际范围更大一点， 以便该模型不会在战场迷雾中凸显出来。 /// If this value is not 0, it will override data that is normally queried from the model file.  This radius creates a virtual sphere around the model.  The model will only update its state when this sphere is within the camera's FOV.  This value typically needs to be larger than the actual radius of the model so the model will not pop in the fog of war.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_RequiredAnims=剧情模式中模型的必需动画 /// Required animations for the model in story mode
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_ScaleMax=随机设置该模型的最大比例。如果最大比例不同于其最小比例， 则该模型每次在被创建时其最大比例都会被进行随机定义。 /// Maximum scale set randomly for the model's size. If this differs from Minimum Scale, the scale will be determined randomly each time the model is created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_ScaleMin=模型尺寸的最小比例。如果该比例与最大比例不同，则该比例会在模型每次被创建时随机指定。 /// Minimum scale for the model's size. If this differs from Maximum Scale, the scale will be determined randomly each time the model is created.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_SelectionOffset=该模型被选中时，选圈将会显示的位置点。该点位置可以在X、Y和Z轴上进行调整。 /// Point where the selection circle will display when the model is selected. This can be changed on the X, Y, and Z axis. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_SelectionRadius=选圈范围 /// Radius of the selection circle
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_ShadowRadius=单位水滴状阴影在低画质下的显示大小 /// The radius of the units blob shadow on low quality
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_TechPurchaseCamera=该模型在科技交易面板中显示时所使用的镜头 /// Camera used when displaying the model in the tech purchase panel

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_Tipability=该模型在穿越不平整地形时所允许的上下摇摆度。 /// Amount of tilt allowed for the model when traversing uneven terrain.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_VariationCount=模型可能具有的变种总数。变种是当模型被创建时随机选择的。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CModel_WalkAnimMoveSpeed=行走动画每秒走过的游戏单位数，这样单位模型就不会出现视觉上的“滑步”。WalkAnimMoveSpeed为3表示的是：单位在默认情况下，行走动画每秒将走过3格。（制作素材的美术设计师在MAX中设定的数值是这个的100倍，因为在那个环境下，一格为100英寸。）
