EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSoundMixSnapshot_Release=解除混响所需的时间（毫秒）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_AssetArray=指定这个音效所包括的素材集。 /// Specifies the set of assets that are included in the sound.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Category=将该音效分配到一个能和每个单独音效的音量，暂停和静音状态都有组合的FMOD频道组。 /// Assigns the sound to an FMOD channel group that can have a volume, paused, and muted status that is combined with individual sounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_CategoryDuckingLocal=当该音效作为本地音效播放时，分类降音所使用的混响快照。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_CategoryDuckingNonLocal=当该音效作为非本地音效播放时，分类降音所使用的混响快照。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_CategoryLocal=假如玩家为本地（被观察的）玩家时，该音效所使用的分类。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Chance=指定一个音效在你请求播放时会生成一个声音的百分比几率。默认为100%。 /// Specifies a percentage chance that a sound will actually create a voice when you request to play it. Defaults to 100%.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ConeAngle=配置FMOD频道的音效锥形区参数。只应用于3D音效；与音效在世界的位置有关。 /// Configures the FMOD channel cone parameters. Only applicable to 3D sounds; relative to the sound position in the world.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ConeOrientation=配置FMOD频道的音效锥形区参数。只应用于3D音效；与音效在世界的位置有关。 /// Configures the FMOD channel cone parameters. Only applicable to 3D sounds; relative to the sound position in the world.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ConeVolume=配置FMOD频道的音效锥形区参数。只应用于3D音效；与音效在世界的位置有关。 /// Configures the FMOD channel cone parameters. Only applicable to 3D sounds; relative to the sound position in the world.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DopplerLevel=设置FMOD频道的多普勒参数。只应用于3D音效。与地图中地形数据所指定的多普勒参数有关。 /// Configures the FMOD channel doppler parameter. Only applicable to 3D sounds. Related to the doppler factor specified in the terrain data for a map.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeDestroyCount=指定在最次要音效摧毁或我们停止创建新的音效前，一个音效允许创建实例的最大数量（取决于复制品的最大方式）。 /// Specifies the maximum instances of a sound that may be created before the least important voice is destroyed or when we stop creating new sounds (depends on the dupe maximum method).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeFadeBlend=在一个声音变为重复或不再被视为重复时，指定一个淡化曲线。 /// Specifies a fade curve to use when a voice becomes or is no longer considered a duplicate.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeFadeIn=在一个声音变为复制品时，指定一个淡化曲线。 /// Specifies a fade curve to use when a voice becomes a duplicate.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeFadeOut=在一个声音不再被视为复制品时，指定一个淡化曲线。 /// Specifies a fade curve to use when a voice is no longer considered a duplicate.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeHistoryCount=指定在一个音效完成播放时，我们应追踪多少实例。主要在选择一个新的音效时来使用。值Random代表我们使用该历史来决定最后播放的音效，以避免重复播放。值Shuffle代表找到最不常播放的子集，并作一个带权重的随机来在他们当中作出选择。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeMaximumMethod=指定在最大数量的重复音效被播放时，音效引擎的处理方式。 /// Specifies how the sound engine handles the situation when the maximum number of duplicate sounds have been played.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeMuteCount=指定在最次要声音被静音前，一个音效能创建多少个实例。 /// Specifies how many instances of a sound that may be created before the least important voice is muted.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupePrioritization=指定重复的音效被摧毁的顺序。默认=混合优先级、距离和可辨识度。最老=最老的最先被销毁。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeRepeatCount=指定一个特定的素材能允许拥有多少个重复的实例，哪怕它们不互相交叠。超过这一数量限制的最次要的实例就将被静音。 /// Specifies how many repeated instances of a specific asset are permitted, even if they aren't overlapping. The least important instances beyond this count will be silenced.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeThresholdFadeTime=指定当一个类别的一个音效阈已到达或不再存在时的淡化行为。 /// Specifies the fading behavior when a threshold of sounds for a category has been reached or is no longer present.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeThresholdPoints=指定当一个类别的一个音效阈已到达或不再存在时的淡化行为。 /// Specifies the fading behavior when a threshold of sounds for a category has been reached or is no longer present.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_DupeWait=指定在一个音效播放后，另一个音效要过多久才能在前者可听见范围内播放。主要适用于野怪的音效。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Specifies how long after a sound is played before another is allowed to play in its audible range. Primarily used for creep sounds. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Exclusivity=决定该音效是否会因为其他音效当前正被播放而被阻止播放或延后播放。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Flags=为音效配置多种选项。 /// Configures various options for the sound.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_FogFadeBlend=指定在3D声效变得模糊或不模糊时所使用的淡化曲线。 /// Specifies the fade curve to use when a 3D sound becomes fogged or unfogged.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_FogFadeIn=指定3D声效在淡入模糊效果时使用的淡化曲线。 /// Specifies the fade curve to use when a 3D sound becomes unfogged.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_FogFadeOut=指定3D声效在淡出模糊效果时使用的淡化曲线。 /// Specifies the fade curve to use when a 3D sound becomes fogged.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_LocalVolumeAdjustment=当该音效属于本地玩家时，应用一个音量调整。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_LocaleFlags=只被编辑器用来表示本地化的生产跟踪状态。 /// Only used by the editor to indicate production tracking status on localization.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_LoopCount=指定一个音效集重复的次数。这会造成它们在根据其选择的模式（无序的或按序的）在所有可用的素材间循环。在这里指定-1表示你希望它无限地循环。需要注意的是每个素材的循环点，如可行的话，都需要进行配置。 /// Specifies the number of times that a sound set will repeat. This will cause it to loop over all available assets based on their selection mode (shuffle or sequential). Specify -1 here to indicate you want it to loop infinitely. Note that loop points need to be configured per-asset, if applicable.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_LowPassGain=配置FMOD频道的低通道获取参数（当低通道过滤被应用时设置干式信号的获取）。 /// Configures the FMOD channel low pass gain parameter (sets the gain of the dry signal when lowpass filtering is applied).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_MixerPriority=拥有比其它音效更高优先级的音效不会被其它音效窃取或无效化。0=最重要。256=最不重要。-1代表使用该音效所属音效分类的混响优先级。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_MixerPriorityNonLocal=非本地音效所使用的混响优先级。-1代表使用与本地音效一样的优先级。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Mode=表示这个音效应该被配置为2D、3D（头部相关）或3D（世界相关）。设置为2D的音效将不会进行烟雾测试。一般情况下，2D音效应在环境音轨或UI音效这样的全地图范围的音频时使用。如果一个音效配置为3D世界相关音效但没有一个有效的位置，那它将被转换成一个3D头部相关音效。 /// Indicates if the sound should be configured as 2D, 3D (Head Relative), or 3D (World Relative). Sounds that are configured as 2D do not have a fog test performed. Generally 2D sounds should be reserved to map-wide audio like the ambience soundtrack or UI sounds. If a sound is configured as a 3D world-relative sound but does not have a valid position, it will be converted to a 3D head-relative sound.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_MuteFadeBlend=指定一个音效在被静音或取消静音时的淡化行为。 /// Specifies the fade behavior when a sound is muted or unmuted.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_MuteFadeIn=指定一个音效在被静音时的淡化行为。 /// Specifies the fade behavior when a sound is muted.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_MuteFadeOut=指定一个音效在取消静音时的淡化行为。 /// Specifies the fade behavior when a sound is unmuted.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_NonLocalVolumeAdjustment=当该音效属于非本地玩家时，应用一个音量调整。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OcclusionDirect=为一个频道配置遮蔽系数。只应用于3D音效。我们没有FMOD几何体对象，这是唯一重现这种行为的方法。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Configures the occlusion factors for a channel. Only applicable to 3D sounds. We don't have FMOD geometry objects, so this is the only way to reproduce that kind of behavior. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OcclusionReverb=为一个频道配置遮蔽系数。只应用于3D音效。我们没有FMOD几何体对象，这是唯一重现这种行为的方法。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Configures the occlusion factors for a channel. Only applicable to 3D sounds. We don't have FMOD geometry objects, so this is the only way to reproduce that kind of behavior. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetFadeBlend=指定一个音效的淡入和淡出曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the fade in and fade out curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetFadeIn=指定一个音效的淡入曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the fade in curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetFadeOut=指定一个音效的淡出曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the fade out curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetShiftBlend=指定一个音效的音调转入和转出曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the pitch shift in and out curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetShiftIn=指定一个音效的音调转入曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the pitch shift in curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OffsetShiftOut=指定一个音效的音调转出曲线。次数将取决于音效包括循环在内的总体长度。 /// Specifies the pitch shift out curve for a sound. The times are relative to the overall sound length including looping.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OverlapPitchDelta=指定用来比较相同素材中两个实例的阈，来决定它们是否交叠（交叠时最次要的音效将被静音）。应注意的是音调值指的是音调数据值，而非波形实际的音调。 /// Specifies the threshold for comparing two instances of the same asset to determine if they are overlapping (in which case the least important sounds are muted). Note that the pitch value refers to the Pitch data value, not the actual pitch of the waveform.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_OverlapTimeDelta=指定用来比较相同素材中两个实例的阈，来决定它们是否交叠（交叠时最次要的音效将被静音）。应注意的是音调值指的是音调数据值，而非波形实际的音调。 /// Specifies the threshold for comparing two instances of the same asset to determine if they are overlapping (in which case the least important sounds are muted). Note that the pitch value refers to the Pitch data value, not the actual pitch of the waveform.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Pan=指定扬声器的2D音效平移量。-1=全部左侧，+1=全部右侧，0=中间。默认设置为0。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Specifies the speaker pan amount for 2D sounds. -1 = full left, +1 = full right, 0 = center. Defaults to 0. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_PanLevel=配置FMOD通道3D平移等级参数（设置3D引擎对通道有多少影响效果，针对平移或扬声器混合而言）。0即表示100%使用“扬声器混合”值，完全不使用3D引擎。1即表示100%使用3D引擎，完全不使用“扬声器混合”值。 /// Configures the FMOD channel 3D pan level parameter (sets how much the 3d engine has an effect on the channel, versus that set by Pan or Speaker Mix).  0 is 100% using the Speaker Mix values and not using the 3D engine at all.  1 is 100% using the 3D engine and not using the Speaker Mix values at all.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_PanLevelNonLocal=The pan level to use for non local sounds. Less than zero means to use the value in pan level.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Pitch=为音效指定一个频率转换。这不是一个真正的八音度转换，虽然通过应用一个DSP（非常昂贵）来达到这个效果。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Specifies a frequency shift for the sound. This is not a true octave shift, although there is a DSP (which is expensive) that can be applied to accomplish that. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_PlayDelay=播放这一音效的延迟时间（毫秒）
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_PositionRandomOffset=音效的播放位置会随机地以该值为最大值来进行正向或负向偏移。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_PositionRandomOffsetPower=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ResourcePriority=被资源管理系统用来决定加载和储存这个音效至内存的重要程度。 /// Used by the resource management system to determine how important this sound is to load and keep in memory.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ReverbBalance=配置默认混响直达音和室内等级。 /// Configures the default reverb direct and room levels.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ReverbRolloffBlend=控制默认混响等级受音效与听者距离的影响程度。 /// Controls how much the default reverb levels are affected by a sound's distance from the listener.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_ReverbRolloffPoints=控制默认混响等级受音效与听者距离的影响程度。 /// Controls how much the default reverb levels are affected by a sound's distance from the listener.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Select=指定在循环播放所有素材或播放有相同音效的数个实例时，循环播放音效集的方法。按序意味着会播放这个音效中的每个素材然后再进行重复。无序的表示会随机地选择素材来进行播放。在所有素材都被播放后，将选择一个新的播放列表。相同的音效将永远不会被连续播放，除非它是有唯一一个素材，或者同一个素材在音效集内出现多次。 /// Specifies the way that we cycle through sounds in a set when looping over all assets or playing multiple instances of the same sound. Sequential means that we will play each of the assets in the sound before repeating. Shuffle means that we will randomly select assets until all of the assets have been played and then we will choose a new playlist. The same sound will never play back-to-back unless there is only one asset, or the same asset is in the set multiple times.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_SpeakerMix=配置每个扬声器的FMOD频道扬声器混合。此处最常被调整的选项是3D音效的LFE音量。 /// Configures the FMOD channel speaker mix per speaker. The most commonly adjusted setting here is adjusting the LFE volume for 3D sounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_SpeakerMixNonLocal=The speaker mix to use if this sound is played for a non local player. -1 means to use the value in SpeakerMix.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Spread=配置扬声器空间的FMOD频道3D伸展设定。当提高一个音效的伸展度时，立体声音效的左右两部分从它们的最初的位置旋转开，带来更强的“立体感”。单声道音效同样能通过这个参数来得到“伸展”。 /// Configures the FMOD channel 3D spread setting in speaker space. When increasing the spread of a sound, the left and right parts of a stereo sound rotate away from their original position to give it more "stereoness".  Mono sounds can also be "spread" with this parameter.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_SustainFade=指定一个音效被打断时的淡化行为（通常根据脚本或者其他游戏性）。 /// Specifies the fade behavior when a sound is interrupted (usually by scripts or other gameplay).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_SustainFadeBlend=指定一个音效被打断时的淡化行为（通常根据脚本或者其他游戏性）。 /// Specifies the fade behavior when a sound is interrupted (usually by scripts or other gameplay).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Timeout=指定在放弃或取消这一请求之前等待一个音效加载（也有可能下载）时间。这能有效地确保音效只在与它有关的时间点播放。 /// Specifies the amount of time that we wait for a sound to load (and maybe download) before we give up and cancel the request. Useful for making sure sounds don't play long after they are relevant.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VariationMinimum=指定一个无论音效选项面板中的音效质量设置如何，都必须可用的音效的最小素材数。 /// Specifies the minimum number of assets from a sound that must be available regardless of the sound quality setting in the sound options panel.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_Volume=配置一个音效在不应用任何混合和淡化的情况下的理想的音量。这个值可通过设置下限和上限，并在指定的范围内随机生成。这个值是已设置音量的乘数。 /// Configures the ideal volume of a sound without any mixing or fading applied. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds. This value is multiplied by the per-asset volume.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VolumeRolloffBlend=指定基于听者位置的3D音效音量调整行为。 /// Specifies the volume adjustment behavior for 3D sounds based on the listener position. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VolumeRolloffFadeBlend=指定基于听者位置的3D音效音量调整行为。 /// Specifies the volume adjustment behavior for 3D sounds based on the listener position. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VolumeRolloffFadeIn=指定基于听者位置的3D音效音量调整行为。 /// Specifies the volume adjustment behavior for 3D sounds based on the listener position. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VolumeRolloffFadeOut=指定基于听者位置的3D音效音量调整行为。 /// Specifies the volume adjustment behavior for 3D sounds based on the listener position. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSound_VolumeRolloffPoints=指定基于听者位置的3D音效音量调整行为。 /// Specifies the volume adjustment behavior for 3D sounds based on the listener position. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSoundtrack_CueArray=音轨中每个音效的CUE参数。这些参数还可以使你向该音轨添加新的轨段。 /// Cue parameters for each sound in the soundtrack. These parameters also let you add tracks to the soundtrack.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSoundtrack_Delay=在音轨中的歌曲之间的延迟 /// Delay time between songs in the soundtrack
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSoundtrack_Flags=音轨物品的标旗。 /// Flags for the soundtrack item.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CSoundtrack_Select=游戏从音轨中选择音效的顺序 /// Order in which the game selects sounds from the soundtrack
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTacticalOrder_Abil=战术指令对该单位发出的技能指令。 /// Ability order issued to the unit by the tactical order.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTacticalOrder_AbilCmdIndex=发送给单位的选定技能条目的索引。 /// The index of the chosen ability entry that is sent to the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTacticalOrder_Validator=对即将发出的指令运行的验证器。 /// Validator run against the order being issued.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTacticalSet_Array=发送给单位的战术指令数组。所有指令都会发送给单位，并会逐个验证。 /// The array of tactical orders that are sent to a unit. All orders will be sent to a unit, and validated against individually.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_EditorFlags=地形物件在《星际争霸II》编辑器中摆放时的标旗 /// Flags for the terrain object when it is placed in the StarCraft II Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_EditorIcon=《星际争霸II》编辑器中的地形物件图标 /// Icon for the terrain object in the StarCraft II Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_EditorModel=《星际争霸II》编辑器中的地形物件模型 /// Model for the terrain object in the StarCraft II Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_Footprint=地形物件的足印。游戏使用地形足印作为占位和碰撞检测。 /// Footprint for the terrain object. The game uses the terrain's footprint for placement and collision.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_Model=游戏中地形物件的模型 /// Model for the terrain object in the game
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_Radius=地形物件的碰撞距离 /// Collision range for the terrain object
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainObject_TexSets=地形物件的纹理集。用于在地形编辑器中进行归类。 /// Texture set for the terrain object. Used for organization in the terrain editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainTex_DoodadEntry=地形纹理生成的装饰物 /// Doodads generated by the terrain texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainTex_EditorIcon=该纹理在地形编辑器中的图标。 /// Icon for the texture in the terrain editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainTex_Normalmap=地形纹理的法线图 /// Normal map for the terrain texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrainTex_Texture=地形纹理的图片文件 /// Image file for the terrain texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_Ambience=地形类别的环境音乐 /// Ambient music for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_BlendTextures=纹理如何在地形类别中被混合 /// How textures are blended in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CliffSets=地形类别中的悬崖 /// Cliffs in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepBaseSpecularMap=地形类别的菌毯镜面光映射 /// Creep specular map for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepBaseTexture=地形类别中的菌毯基体纹理 /// Creep base texture in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepEdgeNormalMap=地形类别中的菌毯边缘纹理 /// Creep edge texture in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepHeightMap=在地形类别中的菌毯高度纹理 /// Creep height texture in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepNoiseMap=地形类别中的菌毯噪音纹理 /// Creep noise texture in the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_CreepSettingsArray=地形类别的菌毯参数 /// Creep parameters for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_DSPArray=用于音效分类的DPS
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_DSPArrayMasterOutput=用于主要输出的DPS
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FOWColor=地形类型的默认战场迷雾。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FixedSkyboxModel=地形类别的固定背景模型 /// Fixed background models for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FogColor=地形类别的默认迷雾颜色。 /// Default fog color for the terrain type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FogDensity=地形类别的默认迷雾浓度 /// Default fog density for the terrain type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FogEnabled=定义是否要为该地形类别启用默认迷雾。 /// Determines whether or not fog is on by default for the terrain type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_FoliageSettingsArray=地形类别的植物参数。游戏使用的植物设定由游戏的画质设定所决定的。 /// Foliage parameters for the terrain type. The foliage settings that are used by game are determined by the game's graphic settings.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_Gravity=地形类别的重力值 /// Gravity value for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_HardTiles=使用地形类别的地形贴图 /// Terrain tiles that use the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_HideLowestLevel=当启用后，地形类别中等级最低的地形将被隐藏。 /// When enabled, the lowest terrain level in the terrain type is hidden.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_Lighting=地形类别的光照设置 /// Lighting configuration for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_MinimapBackgroundColor=微缩地图上没有地形或没有水体的范围所显示的颜色。该值仅在最低地形等级为隐藏时使用，例如太空地形集。 /// The color of the minimap where there is no terrain or water. This value is only used when the lowest terrain level is hidden, such as space terrain sets.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_Name=地形类别的名称 /// Name of the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_NonFixedSkyboxModel=非固定地形类别的背景模型 /// Background model for the terrain type that is not fixed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_ReverbAmbient=地形类别的环境音效 /// Ambient sound effects for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_ReverbGlobal=地形类别的全局音效 /// Global sound effects for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_SoundDistanceFactor=地形类别的音效距离系数 /// Sound distance factor for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_SoundRolloffFactor=地形类别的音效滚降系数 /// Sound roll off factor for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTerrain_TilingFreq=地形类别的贴图样式重复频率 /// Frequency in which the tile patterns repeat for the terrain type
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_File=纹理的美术文件。这可能是一张静态图片（.dds格式）或者是一段视频（.ogv 格式） /// Art file for the texture. This can be a static image (.dds format) or a video (.ogv format).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_MovieSoundSettings5dot1=若被设置，当播放5.1环绕影片时，便会使用这些设置。若不设置则会使用MovieSoundSettings的默认设置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_MovieSoundSettingsStereo=若被设置，当播放立体声环绕影片时，便会使用这些设置。若不设置则会使用MovieSoundSettings的默认设置。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_Prefix=纹理的名称前缀。该前缀是用于帮助游戏在替换纹理时查找纹理。 /// Prefix for the name of the texture. This prefix helps the game find textures when it is replacing textures.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_PropsAdd=添加至纹理的贴图集属性 /// Tile set properties that are added to the texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_PropsRemove=从纹理中移除的贴图集属性 /// Tile set properties that are removed from the texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_PropsSet=该纹理的当前贴图集 /// Current tile set for the texture
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTexture_Slot=定义该纹理将会出现在模型上的纹理槽 /// Determines the slot on a models that the texture will appear
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTile_EditorIcon=《星际争霸II》编辑器中的地形贴图图标 /// Icon for the terrain tile in the StarCraft II Editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTile_Flags=纹理贴图的标旗 /// Flags for the texture tile
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTurret_Idle=当炮塔无目标时的动作 /// Movement of the turret when it does not have a target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTurret_YawArc=炮塔动作总角度 /// Total angle of movement  for the turret
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTurret_YawIdleRate=无目标时炮塔的动作速度 /// Speed of the turret's movements when it does not have a target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTurret_YawRate=有目标时炮塔的动作速度 /// Speed of the turret's movements when it has a target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CTurret_YawStart=炮塔的初始角度 /// Starting angle of the turret
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AIEvalConstant=指定一个将被添加至AI重要性计算中的平值。 /// Specifies a flat value to be added to the AI importance calculation.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AIEvalFactor=该值在添加常数之前将乘以AI重要性计算。 /// This value is multiplied by the AI importance calculation before the Constant is added.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AIEvaluateAlias=指定当评估单位重要性时， AI会将该单位视为何种类型。 /// Specifies the type of unit the AI will consider this unit when evaluating its importance.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AINotifyEffect=单位产生的通知效果 /// Notification effect that occurs for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AIOverideTargetPriority=当攻击单位由AI玩家控制时使用的单位优先级。当一个单位的优先级高于另一个单位时，拥有高优先级的单位将先遭到攻击。 /// Priority for the unit that is used when the attacking unit is controlled by an AI player. When one unit has a higher priority than other units, the higher priority unit is attacked first.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AbilArray=在该字段内添加给单位的任何技能都可以被该单位使用，前提是它们也被添加到“命令面板”中。技能通过将单位与一组将被执行的效果链接在一起，从而允许单位使用诸如“灵能风暴”等法术或者“强化剂”这种增益。 /// Any abilities added to the unit in this field will be available for use by this unit assuming they are also added to the Command Card. Abilities allow units to use spells like Psi Storm or buffs like Stim Pack by linking the Unit to a set of Effects that will be executed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Acceleration=单位加速到最大速度的速率 /// Rate of speed increase at which the unit reaches maximum speed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AcquireLeashRadius=负责定义该单位在执行所需命令并回归初始位置时，在附近允许移动的范围。 /// This determines the radius around this unit where it is allowed to move to while performing acquired orders before it must return to its original location.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AcquireLeashResetRadius=负责定义该单位如果超过其束缚范围并被命令返回初始位置时，在附近允许再次获取的范围。 /// This determines the radius around the unit where it is allowed to acquire again if the unit passed its leash radius and is being ordered to return to its original location.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AcquireMovementLimit=负责定义该单位为所需命令目标能够行进的最大距离。如果目标超过该距离则该单位将不会获取它。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AddOnOffsetX=附属建筑沿X轴出现的距离主体建筑的偏移位置点 /// Offset position from the host building along the X-axis at which the add-on appears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AddOnOffsetY=附属建筑沿Y轴出现的距离主体建筑的偏移位置点 /// Offset position from the host building along the Y-axis at which the add-on appears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AddedOnArray=单位的附属建筑参数。这些值决定附属建筑如何对主体单位产生影响。 /// Add-on parameters for the unit. These values determine how the add-on affects the host unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AttackSpeedMultiplierCreep=通过将该值乘以任意其他攻击速度乘数来提高在菌毯上的攻击速度。 /// Increases the attack speed while on creep by multiplying this value by any other attack speed multipliers.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_AttackTargetPriority=单位的优先级。优先级越高的单位，越容易会被默认的战术AI优先攻击。 /// Priority for the unit. When one unit has a higher priority than other units, the higher priority unit is attacked first by the default tactical AI.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Attributes=单位属性。这些属性决定武器和护甲如何影响单位。 /// Attributes for the unit. These attributes determine how weapons and armor affect the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_BehaviorArray=在该字段内添加给单位的任何行为都会在创建后自动对单位应用。行为可以修改单位的大多数固有属性，包括移动速度、护甲值以及隐形状态或侦测能力。 /// Any behaviors added to the unit in this field are automatically applied to the unit when it is created. Behaviors can modify most of the inherent attributes of a unit including movement speed, armor values, and cloaking/detection.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_BoostedCliffLevel=为请求单位足印的单元格指定悬崖层级改变的程度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_BoostedHeight=为请求单位足印的单元格指定地图高度提升的程度。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_BuildOnAs=允许你基于底层建筑的可堆叠建造列表来修改建造在另一个建筑上的建筑的类型。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_BuiltOn=该单位必须在其之上进行建造的现有单位 /// Existing unit on which the unit must be built
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_CardLayouts=每个单位的命令面板负责定义该单位在被玩家选中时所显示的一些列按钮，通常在屏幕的右下角以方格形式显示。这里显示的按钮可被用于启用或为技能瞄准目标，比如“攻击”或“强化剂”，但也可以用于其它目的，比如临时性将命令面板转换成一个完全不同的按钮“面板”，或者为该单位的被动行为显示一个按钮。 /// The command card for each unit defines a set of buttons for that unit to be displayed when that unit is selected, typically as a grid in the bottom right of the screen. The buttons displayed here can be used to activate or target an ability like Attack or Stim Pack, but can also be used for other purposes like temporarily switching the command card to a different 'card' of buttons or for displaying a button for a passive behavior on that unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_CargoOverlapFilters=当该单位从运输单位中卸载时，指定一组过滤器用来决定卸载位置附近的何种单位需要忽略。 /// Specifies a set of filters to use when unloading this unit from a transport to decide what units near the unload location should be ignored.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_CargoSize=单位占用的载物槽位数 /// Number of cargo slots for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Collide=同单位可碰撞的单位类型 /// Types of units with which the unit can collide
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_CostCategory=计分板面板使用费用类别来定义该单位是否被列为科技、经济或军队。 /// The Leader Panel uses Cost Category to determine whether this unit is listed as Technology, Economy, or Army.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_CostResource=建造、训练或修理该单位所需要的各资源量。 /// The amount of each resource that it will cost to build, train, or repair this unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DamageDealtXP=单位每造成一点伤害时所得的经验点数倍数 /// Multiplier for experience points the unit is awarded per point of damage it deals.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DamageTakenXP=单位每承受一点伤害时所得的经验点数倍数 /// Multiplier for experience points the unit is awarded per point of damage it takes.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeadFootprint=单位死亡时的路径足印 /// Pathing footprint of the unit when it is dead
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeadInnerRadius=单位死亡时可以与建筑交互的范围 /// Radius at which the unit can interact with buildings when it is dead
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeadRadius=该单位死亡状态下的碰撞半径 /// Collision radius of the unit when it is dead
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeathRevealDuration=单位死亡后持续暴露该单位死亡区域情况的时间量。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeathRevealFilters=当单位死亡时，它会触发一次战斗暴露，显示它周围所有通过这一过滤的死亡暴露范围内的敌人。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeathRevealRadius=单位死亡时周围暴露的范围大小。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeathRevealType=负责指定单位在被击杀时如何在周围区域赋予敌对单位的视野。 /// This will specify how a unit grants vision of hostile units in the surrounding area when it is killed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DeathTime=单位死亡所需要的时间。经过这段时间后，单位会被移除出游戏，无法再被引用。设为-1会使单位永远处于游戏中，即使是死后。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Deceleration=单位减速直至完全停止的速率 /// Rate at which the unit's speed decreases until it comes to a complete stop
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_DefaultAcquireLevel=如果单位处于闲置状态， 该值将定义如何允许技能来获取目标。 /// If the unit is idle, this determines how abilities are allowed to acquire targets.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Description=该单位的鼠标提示文本描述
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EditorFacingAlignment=负责定义单位被放置在《星际争霸II》编辑器中的朝向角度。 /// This determines the facing angle of the unit when placed in the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EditorFlags=设置单位放置在编辑器中时的不同选项和行为 /// Set the different options and behaviors of the unit when being placed in the editor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyArmor=如果EnergyDamageRatio大于零，当单位有剩余的能量值时可以抵消伤害的护甲。 /// Armor applied against damage when unit has energy remaining, if EnergyDamageRatio greater than zero.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyDamageGain=单位每承受一点伤害所获得的能量值 /// Amount of energy the unit gains per point of damage taken.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyDamageLeech=单位每造成一点伤害所获得的能量值 /// Amount of energy the unit gains per point of damage dealt.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyDamageRatio=如果大于零，伤害将优先用于能量值，然后才是生命值。没点消耗的能量值将吸收这些点的伤害值。 /// If greater than zero, damage will be applied to energy before life.  This many points of damage will be absorbed for each point of energy lost.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyMax=单位可以拥有的最大能量值 /// Maximum amount of energy the unit can have.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyRegenDelay=单位在损失能量直到开始恢复能量之间所需要的时间
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyRegenRate=单位每秒恢复的能量值。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyRegenRateCreep=单位在菌毯上时每秒恢复的能量值。 /// Amount of energy the unit regenerates every second while the unit is on creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EnergyStart=该单位最初拥有的能量值。初始能量值不能超过最大能量值。 /// Amount of energy with which the unit begins. The Energy Start cannot exceed the Energy Max.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_EquipmentArray=允许你在单位信息面板中显示额外的武器和装备。 /// Allows you to display additional weapons and capabilities within the unit info pane.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Facing=该单位在游戏和《星际争霸II》编辑器中的朝向角度。该值只能影响那些未被标记为可转动的单位。 /// Facing angle of the unit in the game and in the StarCraft II Editor. This value only effects units that are not flagged as turnable.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Fidget=用来在一个单位进入空闲状态时随机性地移动或渲染它。 /// Used to randomly move or animate a unit when a unit enters an idle state.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_FlagArray=单位的标识 /// Flags for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_FogVisibility=单位如何在战场迷雾中显示 /// How the unit appears under the fog of war
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Food=当启用该单位时，其所使用的人口或补给数。如果该值为正值，则该单位会提高补给上限。 /// Amount of food or supplies the unit uses when active. If this value is positive, the unit raises the supply limit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Footprint=该单位使用的足印 /// Footprint used by the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_GlossaryAlias=在单位词汇表中的单位显示类型。没有词汇表别名的单位将不会显示于词汇表中。 /// The display type of the unit in the unit glossary. A unit with no Glossary Alias will not be displayed in the glossary.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_GlossaryCategory=在单位帮助菜单中该单位属于哪个种族。 /// What race the unit falls under in the unit help menu.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_GlossaryPriority=该单位在单位帮助菜单中显示的位置点。较低值会显示在较高值前面。 /// The position the unit is displayed in the unit help menu. Lower values will show up ahead of higher values.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_GlossaryStrongArray=与当前单位对抗处于劣势的单位。 /// Units that this unit is considered strong against for cost.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_GlossaryWeakArray=与当前单位对抗处于优势的单位。 /// Units that this unit is considered weak against for cost.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Height=距单位所处地面的距离 /// Distance from the ground at which the unit appears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_HotkeyAlias=负责定义哪些单位共享相同的自定义快捷键。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_HotkeyCategory=定义一个单位在快捷键窗口中被归类为哪个种族。 /// Determines which race a unit is categorized under within the hotkey window.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_IdleCommand=允许你指定当单位没有其它指令时会对其发出哪一个技能命令 /// This allows you to specify which ability command will be issued while the unit has no other orders.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_InfoTooltipPriority=这将会影响“已生产单位信息”文本标签中已生产单位的顺序。如果值为0的话，该单位将不会在该列表中。 /// This will affect the order of produced units listed by the "Produced Unit Information" text tag. A value of 0 will exclude this unit from the list.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_InnerRadius=单位可与建筑物互动的范围 /// Radius at which the unit can interact with buildings
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Item=当被一个物品栏技能包含时该单位拥有的物品特定属性。物品属性由物品数据类型决定。 /// The item-specific properties this unit has when contained in by an inventory ability. The Item Properties are determined under the Items data type.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_KillDisplay=显示该单位的“击杀计数器”的选项 /// Options for displaying the Kill Counter for the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_KillResource=从杀死该单位中获得的资源。 /// Resources gained from killing this unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_KillXP=该单位奖励其击杀者的经验点数。 /// Number of experience points the unit awards to its killer.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LateralAcceleration=在达到其最大速度之前，该单位所获得的尾翼左右摆动速度值 /// Amount of side-to-side speed the unit gains until it reaches its maximum speed
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LeaderAlias=该单位在录像回放和观战统计计分板中显示的名称。没有“计分别名”的单位将不会显示在统计计分板中。 /// The display name of the unit in the replay and observer leaderboard. A unit with no Leader Alias will not be displayed on the leaderboard.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeArmor=该单位的护甲值 /// Amount of armor for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeArmorDisplayFlags=单位生命护甲的显示标旗。 /// Display flags for the unit's life armor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeArmorLevel=为单位显示的护甲等级。该值不会影响该单位的实际护甲值。 /// Displayed armor level for the unit. This value does not affect the unit's actual armor value.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeArmorName=单位护甲的名称 /// Name of the unit's armor
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeDamageGain=单位每承受一点伤害所获得的生命值 /// Amount of life the unit gains per point of damage taken.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeDamageLeech=单位每造成一点伤害所获得的生命值 /// Amount of life the unit gains per point of damage dealt.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeMax=单位生命值的最大总量 /// Maximum amount of life for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeRegenDelay=单位在损失生命直到开始恢复生命之间所需要的时间
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeRegenRate=单位每秒获得的生命值 /// Amount of life the unit gains per second.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeRegenRateCreep=单位在菌毯上时每秒获得的生命值 /// Amount of life the unit gains per second while the unit is on creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LifeStart=单位的起始生命值。该值不得超过该单位的最大生命值。 /// Amount of life with which the unit starts. This value cannot exceed the Life Max for the unit. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_LootArray=负责定义当该单位被击杀时如何选择掉落物品。 /// This determines how loot is selected when this unit type is killed.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Mass=单位的重量和体积。该值影响单位的推拉物理表现。 /// Weight and volume of the unit. This value affects the push and pull physics behavior for the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_MinimapRadius=该单位在微缩地图上的大小 /// Size of the unit on the minimap
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Mob=使用MOB作弊时，单位所属的组 /// Group to which the unit belongs when the MOB cheat is used
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Mover=该单位的移动器类型。该单位的移动器会影响该单位的路径点。 /// Mover type for the unit. The unit's mover affects the way the unit paths.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Name=单位的名称 /// Name of the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_OccludeHeight=指定该单位为要求调整视野线的足印的单元格调整视野线。 /// Specifies how much this unit adjusts the vision line of sight for cells in its footprint that request to do so.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_OrderDisplayMinimum=命令寻路点显示于地图上所需的队列命令数量。 /// Number of queued orders required for order waypoints to be displayed on the map.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_OverlapIndex=该值负责定义该单位在移动时会与其它的哪些单位重叠。指数可以是0、1或2。0即表示单位不能与其它单位重叠。一个单位设为1而另一个单位设为2，则它们可以相互重叠。1不能和另一个1重叠，2不能和另一个2重叠。如果两个单位允许重叠，那么这些单位的中心点必须相距X的距离，X是两个单位中半径较小的单位的半径距离。如果两个单位不能重叠，那么这些单位的中心点必须相距Y的距离，Y是两个单位半径相加后的距离。 /// This value determines what other units it may overlap with while moving. The index can be 0, 1, or 2. 0 means that the unit cannot overlap with other units. A unit set to 1 and another unit set to 2 can overlap with eachother. 1 cannot overlap with another 1, and 2 cannot overlap with another 2. If two units are allowed to overlap, then the center points of those units must be X distance away, where X is the smaller of two those units' radii. If the two units cannot overlap, then the center points of those units must be Y distance away, where Y is both of their radii added together.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PawnItemReduction=当作为一件使用变卖技能的物品出售时所返还的原始单位费用的百分比。 /// The percentage of the original unit's cost returned when sold as an item which uses the Pawn ability.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PlacementFootprint=放置区栅格的单位足印 /// Footprint of the unit for the placement grid
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PlaneArray=单位可被攻击的平面。如果开启地平面和空中平面，则单位可受到地面和空中的攻击。 /// Plane on which the unit can be attacked. If both Plane Air and Plane Ground are enabled, then the unit can be attacked by both land and air.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PowerupCost=强化物品消耗让你指定一项必须被用掉才能使用强化物品的资源、活力、充能或冷却时间。 /// Powerup Cost lets you specify a Resource, Vitals, Charge, or Cooldown that must be spent in order to use the Powerup.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PowerupEffect=该效果会在强化物品被使用时进行执行。 /// This effect will be executed when the Powerup is used.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PowerupFilters=允许你筛选出哪些单位可以使用强化物品。 /// Allows you to filter which units may use the Powerup.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PowerupRange=定义在多远距离外可以取得强化物品。 /// Determines the range at which the Powerup may be obtained.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_PushPriority=允许单位将较低优先级的单位从行进路径中推开。 /// Allows for units to push lower priority units out of the way.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Race=单位所属种族 /// Race to which the unit belongs
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Radius=单位可同其它单位互动的半径 /// Radius at which the unit can interact with other units
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_RankDisplay=显示该单位头衔的选项 /// Options for displaying the Rank of the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_RepairTime=修理单位所需时间 /// Time it takes to repair the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ResourceDropOff=当该单位作为资源交付站时所能接受的资源类型。采集单位会将这些类型的资源返回到该单位，并纳入到该玩家的总资源中。 /// Types of resources that the unit serves as a drop off for. Harvesting units will return these types of resources to this unit and add it to the player's resource pool.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ResourceState=该单位所包含的资源状态。可采集的表示该单位可以采集，原始的则表示该单位无法采集。 /// State of the resources contained by the unit. Harvestable means that resources can be harvested from the unit, raw cannot.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ResourceType=单位包含的资源类型 /// Type of resource the unit contains
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Response=单位受到伤害时的反映 /// Response from the unit when it takes damage
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ReviveDelay=单位死亡后被重新复活所需要的时间。 /// How long it takes for a unit to be revivable after it dies.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ReviveInfoBase=复活消耗是指复活该单位所需要的资源消耗。 /// Revive Cost determines the Resource cost required to revive the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ReviveInfoLevel=复活消耗按照等级负责定义在不同等级的情况下的复活消耗值 /// Revive Cost Per Level modifies the Revive Cost on a per level basis.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ReviveTime=复活单位所需要的大量时间，该时间也会被添加到受等级影响的复活时间中。 /// A flat amount of time it takes to revive the unit which is also added to the level-based revive time.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ReviveType=指定单位死亡时，复活后的单位类型（通常在单位类型为备选形态时，想要复活它为普通形态）。 /// Specifies the type of unit this unit should be revived as when it is dead (typically in case this unit type is an alternate form and you want it to revive as the normal form). 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ScoreKill=玩家击杀该单位时所获得的分数 /// Score that the Player gains when killing the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ScoreLost=单位死亡时玩家获得的分数 /// Score that the Player gains when the unit dies
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ScoreMake=单位建造完成时，玩家所获得的分数 /// Score that the Player gains when the unit is built
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ScoreResult=指定该单位类型是否显示于游戏结束后的得分画面的建造顺序标签中。 /// Specifies whether this unit type appears on the Build Order tab of the end-of-game score screen.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SelectAlias=玩家在双击选择该单位时， 所有特定类型的单位都会被自动选中。例如:跳虫和潜地的跳虫共用一个别名。 /// Unit types that are selected when the Player double-clicks on the unit. Example: Zerglings and Burrowed Zerglings share an alias.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SeparationRadius=空中编队中空中单位的间距 /// Distance between Air units in a squadron
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldArmor=如果ShieldDamageRatio大于零，当单位由剩余的护盾值时可以抵消伤害的护甲。 /// Armor applied against damage when unit has shield remaining, if ShieldDamageRatio greater than zero.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldArmorDisplayFlags=单位的护盾护甲显示标旗。 /// Display flags for the unit's shield armor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldArmorLevel=单位显示的护盾等级。该值不会影响该单位的实际护盾护甲值 /// Displayed shield level for the unit. This value does not affect the unit's actual shield armor value.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldArmorName=单位的护盾名称 /// Name of the unit's shield
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldDamageGain=单位每承受一点伤害所获得的护盾值 /// Amount of shield the unit gains per point of damage taken.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldDamageLeech=单位每造成一点伤害所获得的护盾值 /// Amount of shield the unit gains per point of damage dealt.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldDamageRatio=如果大于零，伤害将优先用于护盾，然后才是生命值。没点消耗的护盾将吸收这些点的伤害值。 /// If greater than zero, damage will be applied to shields before energy.  This many points of damage will be absorbed for each point of shields lost.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldRegenDelay=单位离开战斗后恢复护盾所需要的时间。 /// Time it takes for a unit's shield to regenerate after exiting combat.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldRegenRate=单位每秒恢复的护盾值 /// Amount of shield the unit regenerates per second.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldRegenRateCreep=单位在菌毯上时每秒恢复的护盾值 /// Amount of shield the unit regenerates per second while the unit is on creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldsMax=单位护盾最大总量 /// Maximum amount of shields for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_ShieldsStart=该单位护盾生效时的生命量。这个值不得超过该单位的最大能量值。 /// Amount of life with which the unit's shield begins. This value cannot exceed the Energy Max for the unit.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Sight=单位的视野范围。 /// The units sight radius.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SightBonus=根据时间段的不同而对单位的视野范围进行调整的修正符。 /// Modifiers to the unit's sight radius depending on the time of day.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Speed=单位的最大速度 /// Maximum speed for the unit
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SpeedBonusCreep=单位在菌毯上时的速度加成 /// Bonus speed when the unit is on creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SpeedDisplayFlags=定义单位的速度值在信息面板中的鼠标提示如何显示（是数字、等式还是某种组合）。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SpeedMultiplierCreep=当单位在菌毯上时的速度倍数。 /// Speed multiplier when the unit is on creep.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_StationaryTurningRate=单位静止时的转身速度 /// Speed at which the unit turns while stationary
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SubgroupAlias=定义该单位处于哪个子组。在这里为多个单位类型设置同样的值将会把他们分为同组。 /// Determines which subgroup this unit will be placed in. Setting the same value here for multiple unit types will let them be grouped together.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SubgroupPriority=这将定义当多种单位子组被选中时，它们在信息面板中的显示优先级。 /// This will determine the display priority within the info panel when multiple unit subgroups are selected.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_Subtitle=显示在单位主要名称下方的次级名称或称谓。 /// A secondary name or title that is displayed under a unit's primary name.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_SyncModelData=指定一个包含可能会被触发器询问的附着点的文件。 /// Specifies a file containing attach points which may be queried by triggers.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TacticalAI=负责指定当单位处于AI控制时哪一个战术AI数据该给该单位发布指令。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TacticalAIChannel=指定一个在指令正在被引导时应当被定期调用的触发器函数，从而让AI可以在需要的时候取消该指令。 /// Specifies a trigger function that should be called periodically while an order is being channeled so that the AI can cancel the order, if desired.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TacticalAIFilters=战术AI对目标响应的过滤设置 /// Filter set for the tactical artificial intelligence's responses to targets
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TacticalAIRange=单位的战术AI的范围引用 /// Range reference for the unit's tactical artificial intelligence
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TacticalAIThink=执行单位战术AI的函数或代码 /// Function or code that runs the unit's tactical artificial intelligence
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TauntDuration=负责指定单位的挑衅动作（用于"/跳舞"或者"/欢呼"命令）持续的时间长度。 /// This will specify the length of time that a units' taunts (for /cheer and /dance) will last for.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TechAliasArray=指定当定义需求时可能会用来指向该单位（或任意使用同样别名的其他目标）的备用识别符，这个标示符称为别名。 /// Specifies alternate identifiers called aliases that may be used to refer to this unit (or any others with the same alias) when defining requirements.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TechTreeProducedUnitArray=指定该单位类别下的单位，这些单位将会在科技树帮助画面中显示于该类型之下。 /// This specifies units which are produced by this unit type and will appear underneath it on the tech tree help screen.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TechTreeUnlockedUnitArray=指定哪些单位在科技树帮助画面中显示为由该单位解锁。 /// Specifies the units that are displayed as unlocked by this unit in the tech tree help screen.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TurningRate=单位移动中转向的速度 /// Speed at which the unit turns while moving
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_TurretArray=炮塔目标可能会用来允许单位进攻它们没有直接面对的目标。它们同样也可以如同导弹塔一样通过设置在空闲时进行旋转。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_VisionHeight=单位视野的高度 /// Height of the unit's field of vision
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_VitalBonusDensity=指定单位在密集地形或无法潜地的地形上的额外的生命值、护盾值或能量值的固定加成。 /// This specifies a flat additive bonus applied to a unit's life, shields, or energy while on terrain that is considered dense or unburrow-able.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_VitalMultiplierDensity=在密集地形或无法潜地的地形上通过将该值乘以任意其他活力乘数来提高单位的生命值、护盾值或能量值。 /// This increases a unit's life, shields, or energy by multiplying this value by any other vital multipliers while on terrain that is considered dense or unburrow-able.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUnit_WeaponArray=拥有攻击技能的单位将会使用这里指定的武器进行攻击。武器控制例如攻击速度、攻击射程以及有效攻击目标等参数。当武器开火时，其只会对单位造成伤害，或通过执行所设定的效果而应用其它修改器。 /// Units that have an Attack ability will attack with the weapons defined here. Weapons control parameters like attack speed, attack range, and which targets are valid for an attack. When the weapon fires, it can only damage a unit or apply other modifiers by executing the Effect that it is configured to use.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUpgrade_AffectedUnitArray=当一项升级被应用时，任何满足此处所列的单位种类的单位都会被通知其升级已经更改。这将导致一个升级演算体信息被发送，并且会更新每个单位的武器和技能的某项属性。要让您的升级能够对游戏数据造成影响，您应该对效果字段进行设置。 /// When an upgrade is applied, any units matching the unit types listed here will be notified that their upgrades have changed. This sends an Upgrade actor message as a result and will also update certain properties of Weapons and Abilities for each unit. To have your Upgrade actually affect game data, you need to configure the Effects field.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUpgrade_Alert=当升级完成时所发出的警示信息 /// Alert that occurs when the upgrade is complete
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUpgrade_EditorCategories=“编辑器类别”用于在《星际争霸II》编辑器中进行过滤筛选和分类。 /// Editor Categories are used for filtering and organization within the StarCraft II Editor.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_CUpgrade_EffectArray=研究这项升级会更改这个字段中所设置的游戏数据。比如：如果您希望某项升级能为陆战队员提高10点生命值，您需要添加一个效果；然后在“种类”下拉菜单中选择“单位”并在“物件”下拉菜单中选择陆战队员，最后在字段树中选择“最大生命值”。将“操作”更改为“添加”，“数值”设定为10。这样研究此项升级便会为陆战队员提高10点最大生命值。 /// Researching this upgrade will apply the changes to game data configured in this field. For example if you want the upgrade to add 10 health to a Marine, you need to add an effect, choose Unit from the Type dropdown, choose Marine from the Object dropdown, and choose Life Maximum from the Field tree. Change the Operation to Add and the Value to 10. Thus researching this upgrade will Add 10 to the Marine's Life Maximum field.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SActorDeathBodySquib_ModelAttachQuery=用于控制哪个附着点播放一个身体爆裂模型。虫群之心布娃娃死亡通常为此使用伤害附着点。 /// Used to control which attachment points play a body squib model.  The Heart of the Swarm ragdoll deaths typically use Damage attach points for this.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SActorDeathBodySquib_ModelSiteOps=用于自定义身体爆裂模型的位置和旋转。 /// Used to customize the position and rotation of the body squib model.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SActorDeathBodySquib_Name=由这个字段和其手足数据所指定的身体爆裂名称。这使自定义死亡能更容易得来共享身体爆裂而不用反复的重复数据。 /// The name of the body squib specified by this field and its sibling data.  Makes it easy for custom deaths to share body squibs without duplicating data repeatedly.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SActorDeathBodySquib_Sound=这个身体爆裂所播放的音效。如果为空，则不会播放音效。如果这个值已经被设置，但音效位置操作和音效附着查询为空时，则将为每个身体爆裂模型创建一个音效并关闭其主体。 /// The sound to play with this body squib.  If empty, no sound plays.  If this value is set, but SoundSiteOps and SoundAttachQuery are left empty, then a sound is created for and hosted off of each body squib model.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SActorDeathBodySquib_SoundAttachQuery=用于控制哪个附着点播放一个身体爆裂音效。通常在中央附着点上播放就足够了。这并不完全符合碎片到处四散的gib样式布娃娃模型，因为玩家有可能看到有一个身体爆裂模型的身体部件而没有与之关联的音效；反过来玩家可能看到一个没有身体爆裂的身体部件但播放了一个身体爆裂音效。不过在大多数情况下，此方法非常精准且难以被察觉，所以还是行之有效的方法。 /// Used to control which attachment points play a body squib sound.  It is often sufficient to simply play one on the Center attachment point.  This is not exact for gib-style ragdolls where pieces fly everywhere, because the player might see a body part with a body squib model that does not have an associated sound, and conversely, he might see a body part with no body squib that plays a body squib sound.  But in most cases it fairly accurate and it is hard to notice when it is not, so this technique is typically good enough.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Clearance=指定移动器产生出多少的额外高度。 /// Specifies how much additional height the mover creates.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ClearanceLookahead=距离发射物前方多远的位置时， 发射物才会躲避悬崖 /// How far ahead the missile will test for clearing cliffs
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Driver=驱动者控制该移动器如何出现对目标进行攻击 /// Driver controls for how the mover behaves and appears to hit the target
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_FlightTime=移动器在飞行中的时间 /// Amount of time the mover is in flight
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Gravity=添加到该移动器的引力拖拽量 /// Amount of gravitational pull that is added to the mover
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_IgnoresTerrain=该运动阶段是否忽略地形高度 /// Does this motion phase ignore the terrain height
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_MaxSpeed=移动器的最大速度 /// Maximum speed of the mover
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_MinSpeed=移动器的最小速度 /// Minimum speed of the mover
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Outro=移动器的位移或飞行混合退出
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_OutroAltitude=移动器开始末段的高度 /// Height at which the mover begins the Outro
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Overlays=移动器在不同运动阶段的刻度 /// Scale of the mover in various motion phases
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_PowerslideAngle=移动器进入动力滑行的角度 /// Angle at which the mover appears to powerslide
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_PowerslideDecel=移动器动力滑行时的减速度 /// Deceleration of the mover as it powerslides
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_RotationActorType=用于配置发射物在飞行时的旋转， 这样发射物就没有必要一定要贴合其实际的飞行线路。 /// Used to configure the rotation of the missile while it travels, so that its rotation doesn't necessarily relate to its actual travel path. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_RotationLaunchActorType=用于配置发射物在飞行时的旋转， 这样发射物就没有必要一定要贴合其实际的飞行线路。 /// Used to configure the rotation of the missile while it travels, so that its rotation doesn't necessarily relate to its actual travel path. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Speed=移动器将会移动的速度 /// Speed at which the mover will move
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_SpeedRange=移动器移动的速度范围 /// Speed range at which the mover moves
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ThrowBandPitch=类似“投掷带横摇”， 但是用于纵摇 /// Like ThrowBandYaw, but for pitch
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ThrowBandYaw=用于配置投掷沿横摇面的变化，  相当于核心投掷轴的一种偏斜。 /// Used to configure throw variance along the yaw plane, as a deflection with respect to the core throw axis.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ThrowForward=本地坐标系中的矢量，为矢量旋转类型设置任意朝向 /// A vector in local coordinate space that configures an arbitrary facing for the Vectored rotation type. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ThrowRotationType=投掷旋转类型 /// Rotation type of the throw
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_ThrowVector=投掷的局部坐标。它们不需要被规范化。 /// The local coordinates of the throw. They do not need to be normalized. 
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_Timeout=移动器消失前的时间 /// Time before the mover disappears
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_TurnType=发射物如何转向一个目标。 /// How a missile turns towards a target.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SMotionPhase_YawPitchRoll=移动器横摇、纵摇和滚摇的限制 /// Limits for the mover's Yaw, Pitch, and Roll.

EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAssetTemplate_FacialAnim=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAssetTemplate_FacialFile=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAssetTemplate_FacialGroup=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAssetTemplate_File=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAssetTemplate_PortraitAnim=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_FacialAnim=指定当这个音效通过传输信息或一个有面部控制设置模型的音效事件来播放时，应播放的动画。 /// Specifies the animation to play when this sound is played with a transmission or sound event from a model with a facial controller setup.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_FacialFile=指定做为一个模型来播放这个素材时，加载到面部控制器的FXA或FXE文件的位置。 /// Specifies the location of the FXA or FXE file that will be loaded into the facial controller for a model playing this asset.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_FacialGroup=指定在播放这个素材时，面部控制器实现动作需要的骨骼集合。 /// Specifies the set of bones in the facial controller to apply motion while playing this asset.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_File=指定素材的文件名。通常.ogg文件应该开启流媒体标旗。 /// Specifies the filename of the asset. Typically .ogg files should have their set data enable the Stream flag.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_LoopCount=指定一个素材在播放时会被重复的次数。 /// Specifies the number of times that an asset will be repeated when played.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_LoopTime=指定样本中的一个素材循环的范围（如果指定了一个循环计数）。 /// Specifies the range in samples that an asset will loop (if a loop count is specified).
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Offset=指定一个素材在播放时，样本进入素材的时间。例如， 要生产一个样本率为44kHz的音效来跳过该音效的前1秒， 则设置偏移为44000即可。 /// Specifies the time in samples into an asset will start when played. For example, to make a sound with a sample rate of 44kHz skip the first second of the sound, set the offset to 44000.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Pitch=指定在这个素材被播放时所使用的频率转换。这个值可通过设置下限和上限来执行随机。 /// Specifies the frequency shift that will be applied to this asset when played. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_PortraitActor=指定在这个素材被作为传输信息来播放时，所使用的头像演算体。 /// Specifies the portrait actor that will be used when this asset is played as a transmission.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_PortraitAnim=指定在这个素材被作为头像模型来播放时，所使用的动画。一般会设定为说话。 /// Specifies the animation to play when this asset is played for a portrait model. Typically this would be set to talk.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_PortraitModel=指定在这个素材被作为传输信息来播放时，所使用的头像模型。 /// Specifies the portrait model that will be used when this asset is played as a transmission.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Speaker=指定这个素材“讲话人”本地化后的名字。玩家在消息日志中可以了解到每句台词由谁所说。
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Subtitle=指定与这个素材关联的本地化文本。这将会同时在字幕UI和消息日志中出现，除非音效配置为隐藏字幕。 /// Specifies the localized text associated with this asset. This will appear in the subtitle UI and also the message log UI unless the sound is configured to hide the subtitle.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_SyncPoints=在样本中指定一组时间。应用于音轨系统中节拍匹配的多个音效。 /// Specifies a set of times in samples. Used for beat-matching multiple sounds in the soundtrack system.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_TemplateParam=
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Volume=配置一个音效在不应用任何混合和淡化的情况下的理想的音量。这个值可通过设置下限和上限，并在指定的范围内随机生成。这个值是已设置音量的乘数。 /// Configures the ideal volume of a sound without any mixing or fading applied. This value may be randomized by picking a lower and upper bounds. This value is multiplied by the set volume.
EDSTR_FIELDHINT_SSoundAsset_Weight=在0至100中指定一个音效集被播放时这个素材会被选择的几率。 /// Specifies the chance between 0 and 100 that this asset will be selected when a sound set is played.
